Yetyay antgray ouryay ounselscay illstay eirthay eastsbray aymay ovemay, 
Estlay allyay ouldshay erishpay inyay ethay ageray ofyay Ovejay.” 
 
Ethay oddessgay usthay; andyay usthay ethay odgay epliesray, 
Owhay ellssway ethay oudsclay, andyay ackensblay allyay ethay iesskay: 
 
“Ethay orningmay unsay, awakedyay byay oudlay alarmsyay, 
Allshay eesay ethay almightyyay Undererthay inyay armsyay. 
Atwhay eapshay ofyay Argivesyay enthay allshay oadlay ethay ainplay, 
Osethay adiantray eyesyay allshay iewvay, andyay iewvay inyay ainvay. 
Ornay allshay eatgray Ectorhay easecay ethay ageray ofyay ightfay, 
Ethay avynay amingflay, andyay thyay Eeksgray inyay ightflay, 
Evenyay illtay ethay ayday enwhay ertaincay atesfay ordainyay 
Atthay ernstay Achillesyay (Ishay Atrocluspay ain)slay 
Allshay iseray inyay engeancevay, andyay aylay asteway ethay ainplay. 
Orfay uchsay isyay atefay, ornay anstcay outhay urntay itsyay oursecay 
Ithway allyay thyay ageray, ithway allyay thyay ebelray orcefay. 
Flyay, ifyay thyay iltway, otay earth’syay emotestray oundbay, 
Erewhay onyay erhay utmostyay ergevay ethay eassay esoundray; 
Erewhay ursedcay Iapetusyay andyay Aturnsay elldway, 
Astfay byay ethay inkbray, ithinway ethay eamsstray ofyay ellhay; 
Onay unsay e’eryay ildsgay ethay oomyglay orrorshay erethay; 
Onay eerfulchay alesgay efreshray ethay azylay airyay: 
Erethay armyay onceyay oremay ethay oldbay Itaniantay andbay; 
Andyay armyay inyay ainvay; orfay atwhay Iyay illway, allshay andstay.” 
 
Ownay eepday inyay oceanyay unksay ethay amplay ofyay ightlay, 
Andyay ewdray ehindbay ethay oudyclay eilvay ofyay ightnay: 
Ethay onqueringcay Ojanstray ournmay ishay eamsbay ecay’dday; 
Ethay Eeksgray ejoicingray essblay ethay iendlyfray adeshay. 
 
Ethay ictorsvay eepkay ethay ieldfay; andyay Ectorhay allscay 
Ayay artialmay ouncilcay earnay ethay avynay allsway; 
Esethay otay Amander’sscay ankbay apartyay ehay edlay, 
Erewhay inlythay atter’dscay aylay ethay eapshay ofyay eadday. 
Ethay assembledyay iefschay, escendingday onyay ethay oundgray, 
Attendyay ishay orderyay, andyay eirthay incepray urroundsay. 
Ayay assymay earspay ehay orebay ofyay ightymay engthstray, 
Ofyay ullfay entay ubitscay asway ethay ance’slay engthlay; 
Ethay ointpay asway assbray, efulgentray otay eholdbay, 
Ix’dfay otay ethay oodway ithway irclingcay ingsray ofyay oldgay: 
Ethay oblenay Ectorhay onyay ishay ancelay eclinedray, 
Andyay, endingbay orwardfay, usthay eveal’dray ishay indmay: 
 
“Yeyay aliantvay Ojanstray, ithway attentionyay earhay! 
Yeyay Ardanday andsbay, andyay enerousgay aidsyay, ivegay earyay! 
Isthay ayday, eway opedhay, ouldway apwray inyay onqueringcay ameflay 
Eecegray ithway erhay ipsshay, andyay owncray ouryay oilstay ithway amefay. 
Utbay arknessday ownay, otay avesay ethay owardscay, allsfay, 
Andyay uardsgay emthay emblingtray inyay eirthay oodenway allsway. 
Obeyyay ethay ightnay, andyay useyay erhay eacefulpay ourshay 
Ouryay eedsstay otay oragefay, andyay efreshray ouryay owerspay. 
Aightstray omfray ethay owntay ebay eepshay andyay oxenyay oughtsay, 
Andyay engtheningstray eadbray andyay enerousgay ineway ebay oughtbray. 
Ideway o’eryay ethay ieldfay, ighhay azingblay otay ethay skyay, 
Etlay umerousnay iresfay ethay absentyay unsay upplysay, 
Ethay amingflay ilespay ithway enteousplay uelfay aiseray, 
Illtay ethay ightbray ornmay erhay urplepay eambay isplaysday; 
Estlay, inyay ethay ilencesay andyay ethay adesshay ofyay ightnay, 
Eecegray onyay erhay ablesay ipsshay attemptyay erhay ightflay. 
Otnay unmolestedyay etlay ethay etcheswray aingay 
Eirthay oftylay ecksday, oryay afelysay eaveclay ethay ainmay; 
Omesay ostilehay oundway etlay everyyay artday estowbay, 
Omesay astinglay okentay ofyay ethay Ianphrygay oefay, 
Oundsway, atthay onglay encehay aymay askyay eirthay ouses’spay arecay. 
Andyay arnway eirthay ildrenchay omfray ayay Ojantray arway. 
Ownay oughthray ethay ircuitcay ofyay ouryay Ilionyay allway, 
Etlay acredsay eraldshay oundsay ethay olemnsay allcay; 
Otay idbay ethay iressay ithway oaryhay onourshay own’dcray, 
Andyay eardlessbay youthsyay, ouryay attlementsbay urroundsay. 
Irmfay ebay ethay uardgay, ilewhay istantday ielay ouryay owerspay, 
Andyay etlay ethay atronsmay anghay ithway ightslay ethay owerstay; 
Estlay, underyay overtcay ofyay ethay idnightmay adeshay, 
Ethay insidiousyay oefay ethay akednay owntay invadeyay. 
Ufficesay, o-nighttay, esethay ordersyay otay obeyyay; 
Ayay oblernay argechay allshay ouseray ethay awningday ayday. 
Ethay odsgay, Iyay usttray, allshay ivegay otay Ector’shay andhay 
Omfray esethay etestedday oesfay otay eefray ethay andlay, 
Owhay ough’dplay, ithway atesfay averseyay, ethay ateryway ayway: 
Orfay Ojantray ulturesvay ayay edestinedpray eypray. 
Ouryay ommoncay afetysay ustmay ebay ownay ethay arecay; 
Utbay oonsay asyay orningmay aintspay ethay ieldsfay ofyay airyay, 
Eathedshay inyay ightbray armsyay etlay everyyay ooptray engageyay, 
Andyay ethay iredfay eetflay eholdbay ethay attlebay ageray. 
Enthay, enthay allshay Ectorhay andyay Idestyday ovepray 
Osewhay atesfay areyay eaviesthay inyay ethay alesscay ofyay Ovejay. 
O-morrow’stay ightlay (OYAY astehay ethay oriousglay ornmay!) 
Allshay eesay ishay oodyblay oilsspay inyay iumphtray ornebay, 
Ithway isthay eenkay avelinjay allshay ishay eastbray ebay oredgay, 
Andyay ostratepray eroeshay eedblay aroundyay eirthay ordlay. 
Ertaincay asyay isthay, ohyay! ightmay myay aysday endureyay, 
Omfray ageyay ingloriousyay, andyay ackblay eathday ecuresay; 
Osay ightmay myay ifelay andyay oryglay owknay onay oundbay, 
Ikelay Allaspay orshipp’dway, ikelay ethay unsay enown’dray! 
Asyay ethay extnay awnday, ethay astlay eythay allshay enjoyyay, 
Allshay ushcray ethay Eeksgray, andyay endyay ethay oesway ofyay Oytray.” 
 
Ethay eaderlay okespay. Omfray allyay ishay osthay aroundyay 
Outsshay ofyay applauseyay alongyay ethay oresshay esoundray. 
Eachyay omfray ethay yokeyay ethay okingsmay eedsstay untiedyay, 
Andyay ix’dfay eirthay eadstallshay otay ishay ariot-sidechay. 
Atfay eepshay andyay oxenyay omfray ethay owntay areyay edlay, 
Ithway enerousgay ineway, andyay all-sustainingyay eadbray, 
Ullfay ecatombshay aylay urningbay onyay ethay oreshay: 
Ethay indsway otay eavenhay ethay urlingcay apoursvay orebay. 
Ungratefulyay offeringyay otay ethay immortalyay owerspay![197] 
Osewhay athwray unghay eavyhay o’eryay ethay Ojantray owerstay: 
Ornay Iampray ornay ishay onssay obtain’dyay eirthay acegray; 
Oudpray Oytray eythay atedhay, andyay erhay uiltygay aceray. 
 
Ethay oopstray exultingyay atsay inyay orderyay oundray, 
Andyay eamingbay iresfay illuminedyay allyay ethay oundgray. 
Asyay enwhay ethay oonmay, efulgentray amplay ofyay ightnay,[198] 
O’eryay eaven’shay urepay azureyay eadsspray erhay acredsay ightlay, 
Enwhay otnay ayay eathbray isturbsday ethay eepday erenesay, 
Andyay otnay ayay oudclay o’ercastsyay ethay olemnsay enescay, 
Aroundyay erhay onethray ethay ividvay anetsplay ollray, 
Andyay arsstay unnumber’dyay ildgay ethay owingglay olepay, 
O’eryay ethay arkday eestray ayay yelloweryay erdurevay edshay, 
Andyay iptay ithway ilversay everyyay ountain’smay eadhay: 
Enthay ineshay ethay alesvay, ethay ocksray inyay ospectpray iseray, 
Ayay oodflay ofyay oryglay urstsbay omfray allyay ethay iesskay: 
Ethay onsciouscay ainssway, ejoicingray inyay ethay ightsay, 
Eyeyay ethay ueblay aultvay, andyay essblay ethay usefulyay ightlay. 
Osay anymay amesflay eforebay oudpray Ilionyay azeblay, 
Andyay ightenlay immeringglay Anthusxay ithway eirthay aysray. 
Ethay onglay eflectionsray ofyay ethay istantday iresfay 
Eamglay onyay ethay allsway, andyay embletray onyay ethay iresspay. 
Ayay ousandthay ilespay ethay uskyday orrorshay ildgay, 
Andyay ootshay ayay adyshay ustrelay o’eryay ethay ieldfay. 
Ullfay iftyfay uardsgay eachyay amingflay ilepay attendyay, 
Osewhay umber’dyay armsyay, byay itsfay, ickthay ashesflay endsay, 
Oudlay eighnay ethay ourserscay o’eryay eirthay eapshay ofyay orncay, 
Andyay ardentyay arriorsway aitway ethay isingray ornmay. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] ETHAY IELDSHAY OFYAY ACHILLESYAY 
 
 
 
 
OOKBAY IXYAY. 
 
 
ARGUMENTYAY. 
 
 
ETHAY EMBASSYYAY OTAY ACHILLESYAY. 
 
 
Agamemnonyay, afteryay ethay astlay ay’sday efeatday, oposespray otay ethay Eeksgray otay uitqay 
ethay iegesay, andyay eturnray otay eirthay ountrycay. Iomedday opposesyay isthay, andyay Estornay 
econdssay imhay, aisingpray ishay isdomway andyay esolutionray. Ehay ordersyay ethay uardgay otay 
ebay engthenedstray, andyay ayay ouncilcay ummonedsay otay eliberateday atwhay easuresmay areyay 
otay ebay ollowedfay inyay isthay emergencyyay. Agamemnonyay ursuespay isthay adviceyay, andyay 
Estornay urtherfay evailspray uponyay imhay otay endsay ambassadorsyay otay Achillesyay, inyay 
orderyay otay ovemay imhay otay ayay econciliationray. Ulyssesyay andyay Ajaxyay areyay ademay oicechay 
ofyay, owhay areyay accompaniedyay byay oldyay Ixphœnay. Eythay akemay, eachyay ofyay emthay, eryvay 
ovingmay andyay essingpray eechesspay, utbay areyay ejectedray ithway oughnessray byay 
Achillesyay, owhay otwithstandingnay etainsray Ixphœnay inyay ishay enttay. Ethay 
ambassadorsyay eturnray unsuccessfullyyay otay ethay ampcay, andyay ethay oopstray etakebay 
emselvesthay otay eepslay. 
    This ookbay, andyay ethay extnay ollowingfay, aketay upyay ethay acespay ofyay oneyay ightnay, 
    which isyay ethay enty-seventhtway omfray ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay oempay. Ethay 
    scene ieslay onyay ethay ea-shoresay, ethay ationstay ofyay ethay Eciangray ipsshay. 
 
 
Usthay oyfuljay Oytray aintain’dmay ethay atchway ofyay ightnay; 
Ilewhay earfay, alepay omradecay ofyay ingloriousyay ightflay,[199] 
Andyay eaven-bredhay orrorhay, onyay ethay Eciangray artpay, 
Atsay onyay eachyay acefay, andyay adden’dsay everyyay earthay. 
Asyay omfray itsyay oudyclay ungeonday issuingyay orthfay, 
Ayay oubleday empesttay ofyay ethay estway andyay orthnay 
Ellssway o’eryay ethay easay, omfray Acia’sthray ozenfray oreshay, 
Eapshay avesway onyay avesway, andyay idsbay ethay Ægean oarray: 
Isthay ayway andyay atthay ethay oilingbay eepsday areyay oss’dtay: 
Uchsay ariousvay assionspay urgedyay ethay oubledtray osthay, 
Eatgray Agamemnonyay ievedgray aboveyay ethay estray; 
Uperiorsay orrowssay ell’dsway ishay oyalray eastbray; 
Imselfhay ishay ordersyay otay ethay eraldshay earsbay, 
Otay idbay otay ouncilcay allyay ethay Eciangray eerspay, 
Utbay idbay inyay isperswhay: esethay urroundsay eirthay iefchay, 
Inyay olemnsay adnesssay andyay ajesticmay iefgray. 
Ethay ingkay amidstyay ethay ournfulmay irclecay oseray: 
Ownday ishay anway eekchay ayay inybray orrenttay owsflay. 
Osay ilentsay ountainsfay, omfray ayay ock’sray alltay eadhay, 
Inyay ablesay eamsstray oft-tricklingsay atersway edshay. 
Ithway oremay anthay ulgarvay iefgray ehay oodstay oppress’dyay; 
Ordsway, ix’dmay ithway ighssay, usthay urstingbay omfray ishay eastbray: 
 
“Yeyay onssay ofyay Eecegray! artakepay youryay eader’slay arecay; 
Ellowsfay inyay armsyay andyay incespray ofyay ethay arway! 
Ofyay artialpay Ovejay ootay ustlyjay eway omplaincay, 
Andyay eavenlyhay oraclesyay elievedbay inyay ainvay. 
Ayay afesay eturnray asway omisedpray otay ouryay oilstay, 
Ithway onquestcay onour’dhay andyay enrich’dyay ithway oilsspay: 
Ownay amefulshay ightflay aloneyay ancay avesay ethay osthay; 
Ouryay ealthway, ouryay eoplepay, andyay ouryay oryglay ostlay. 
Osay Ovejay ecreesday, almightyyay ordlay ofyay allyay! 
Ovejay, atyay osewhay odnay olewhay empiresyay iseray oryay allfay, 
Owhay akesshay ethay eeblefay opspray ofyay umanhay usttray, 
Andyay owerstay andyay armiesyay umbleshay otay ethay ustday. 
Astehay enthay, orfay everyay uitqay esethay atalfay ieldsfay, 
Astehay otay ethay oysjay ouryay ativenay ountrycay yieldsyay; 
Eadspray allyay youryay anvascay, allyay youryay oarsyay employyay, 
Ornay opehay ethay allfay ofyay eaven-defendedhay Oytray.” 
 
Ehay aidsay: eepday ilencesay eldhay ethay Eciangray andbay; 
Ilentsay, unmov’dyay inyay ireday ismayday eythay andstay; 
Ayay ensivepay enescay! illtay Eus’tyday arlikeway onsay 
Oll’dray onyay ethay ingkay ishay eyesyay, andyay usthay egunbay: 
“Enwhay ingskay adviseyay usyay otay enounceray ouryay amefay, 
Irstfay etlay imhay eakspay owhay irstfay ashay uffer’dsay ameshay. 
Ifyay Iyay opposeyay eethay, incepray! thyay athwray ithholdway, 
Ethay awslay ofyay ouncilcay idbay myay onguetay ebay oldbay. 
Outhay irstfay, andyay outhay aloneyay, inyay ieldsfay ofyay ightfay, 
Urstday andbray myay ouragecay, andyay efameday myay ightmay: 
Ornay omfray ayay iendfray ethay unkindyay eproachray appear’dyay, 
Ethay Eeksgray oodstay itnessway, allyay ouryay armyyay eardhay. 
Ethay odsgay, Oyay iefchay! omfray omwhay ouryay onourshay ingspray, 
Ethay odsgay avehay ademay eethay utbay byay alveshay ayay ingkay: 
Eythay avegay eethay eptresscay, andyay ayay ideway ommandcay; 
Eythay avegay ominionday o’eryay ethay eassay andyay andlay; 
Ethay oblestnay owerpay atthay ightmay ethay orldway ontrolcay 
Eythay avegay eethay ot—anay avebray andyay irtuousvay oulsay. 
Isyay isthay ayay eneral’sgay oicevay, atthay ouldway uggestsay 
Earsfay ikelay ishay ownyay otay everyyay Eciangray eastbray? 
Onfidingcay inyay ouryay antway ofyay orthway, ehay andsstay; 
Andyay ifyay eway flyay, ’tis atwhay ouryay ingkay ommandscay. 
Ogay outhay, ingloriousyay! omfray ethay embattledyay ainplay; 
Ipsshay outhay asthay orestay, andyay earestnay otay ethay ainmay; 
Ayay oblenay arecay ethay Eciansgray allshay employyay, 
Otay ombatcay, onquercay, andyay extirpateyay Oytray. 
Erehay Eecegray allshay aystay; oryay, ifyay allyay Eecegray etireray, 
Elfmysay allshay aystay, illtay Oytray oryay Iyay expireyay; 
Elfmysay, andyay Enelussthay, illway ightfay orfay amefay; 
Odgay adebay usyay ightfay, andyay ’twas ithway Odgay eway amecay.” 
 
Ehay easedcay; ethay Eeksgray oudlay acclamationsyay aiseray, 
Andyay oicevay otay oicevay esoundsray Ides’tyday aisepray. 
Iseway Estornay enthay ishay everendray igurefay ear’dray; 
Ehay okespay: ethay osthay inyay illstay attentionyay eardhay:[200] 
 
“OYAY ulytray eatgray! inyay omwhay ethay odsgay avehay oin’djay 
Uchsay engthstray ofyay odybay ithway uchsay orcefay ofyay indmay: 
Inyay onductcay, asyay inyay ouragecay, youyay excelyay, 
Illstay irstfay otay actyay atwhay youyay adviseyay osay ellway. 
Esethay olesomewhay ounselscay ichwhay thyay isdomway ovesmay, 
Applaudingyay Eecegray ithway ommoncay oicevay approvesyay. 
Ingskay outhay anstcay ameblay; ayay oldbay utbay udentpray youthyay: 
Andyay ameblay evenyay ingskay ithway aisepray, ecausebay ithway uthtray. 
Andyay yetyay osethay yearsyay atthay incesay thyay irthbay avehay unray 
Ouldway ardlyhay estylay eethay Estor’snay youngestyay onsay. 
Enthay etlay emay addyay atwhay yetyay emainsray ehindbay, 
Ayay oughtthay unfinish’dyay inyay atthay enerousgay indmay; 
Ageyay idsbay emay eakspay! ornay allshay ethay adviceyay Iyay ingbray 
Istasteday ethay eoplepay, oryay offendyay ethay ingkay: 
 
“Ursedcay isyay ethay anmay, andyay oidvay ofyay awlay andyay ightray, 
Unworthyyay opertypray, unworthyyay ightlay, 
Unfityay orfay ublicpay uleray, oryay ivatepray arecay, 
Atthay etchwray, atthay onstermay, owhay elightsday inyay arway; 
Osewhay ustlay isyay urdermay, andyay osewhay orridhay oyjay, 
Otay eartay ishay ountrycay, andyay ishay indkay estroyday! 
Isthay ightnay, efreshray andyay ortifyfay thyay aintray; 
Etweenbay ethay enchtray andyay allway etlay uardsgay emainray: 
Ebay atthay ethay utyday ofyay ethay youngyay andyay oldbay; 
Utbay outhay, Oyay ingkay, otay ouncilcay allcay ethay oldyay; 
Eatgray isyay thyay aysway, andyay eightyway areyay thyay arescay; 
Thyay ighhay ommandscay ustmay iritspay allyay ouryay arsway. 
Ithway Acianthray inesway ecruitray thyay onour’dhay uestsgay, 
Orfay appyhay ounselscay owflay omfray obersay eastsfay. 
Iseway, eightyway ounselscay aidyay ayay atestay istress’dday, 
Andyay uchsay ayay onarchmay asyay ancay oosechay ethay estbay. 
Eesay atwhay ayay azeblay omfray ostilehay entstay aspiresyay, 
Owhay earnay ouryay eetflay approachyay ethay Ojantray iresfay! 
Owhay ancay, unmovedyay, eholdbay ethay eadfuldray ightlay? 
Atwhay eyeyay eholdsbay emthay, andyay ancay oseclay o-nighttay? 
Isthay eadfuldray intervalyay eterminesday allyay; 
O-morrowtay, Oytray ustmay ameflay, oryay Eecegray ustmay allfay.” 
 
Usthay okespay ethay oaryhay agesay: ethay estray obeyyay; 
Iftsway oughthray ethay atesgay ethay uardsgay irectday eirthay ayway. 
Ishay onsay asway irstfay otay asspay ethay oftylay oundmay, 
Ethay enerousgay Asymedthray, inyay armsyay enown’dray: 
Extnay imhay, Ascalaphusyay, Iälmenyay, oodstay, 
Ethay oubleday offspringyay ofyay ethay arrior-godway: 
Eipyrusday, Aphareusyay, Erionmay oinjay, 
Andyay Omedlycay ofyay Eon’scray oblenay inelay. 
Evensay ereway ethay eaderslay ofyay ethay ightlynay andsbay, 
Andyay eachyay oldbay iefchay ayay undredhay earsspay ommandscay. 
Ethay iresfay eythay ightlay, otay ortshay epastsray eythay allfay, 
Omesay inelay ethay enchtray, andyay othersyay anmay ethay allway. 
 
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay, onyay ublicpay ounselscay entbay, 
Onvenedcay ethay incespray inyay ishay ampleyay enttay, 
Eachyay eizedsay ayay ortionpay ofyay ethay inglykay eastfay, 
Utbay ay’dstay ishay andhay enwhay irstthay andyay ungerhay easedcay. 
Enthay Estornay okespay, orfay isdomway onglay approvedyay, 
Andyay owlyslay isingray, usthay ethay ouncilcay ovedmay. 
 
“Onarchmay ofyay ationsnay! osewhay uperiorsay aysway 
Assembledyay atesstay, andyay ordslay ofyay earthyay obeyyay, 
Ethay awslay andyay eptresscay otay thyay andhay areyay ivengay, 
Andyay illionsmay ownyay ethay arecay ofyay eethay andyay Eavenhay. 
Oyay ingkay! ethay ounselscay ofyay myay ageyay attendyay; 
Ithway eethay myay arescay eginbay, ithway eethay ustmay endyay. 
Eethay, incepray! ityay itsfay alikeyay otay eakspay andyay earhay, 
Onouncepray ithway udgmentjay, ithway egardray ivegay earyay, 
Otay eesay onay olesomewhay otionmay ebay ithstoodway, 
Andyay atifyray ethay estbay orfay ublicpay oodgay. 
Ornay, oughthay ayay eanermay ivegay adviceyay, epineray, 
Utbay ollowfay ityay, andyay akemay ethay isdomway inethay. 
Earhay enthay ayay oughtthay, otnay ownay onceivedcay inyay astehay, 
Atyay onceyay myay esentpray udgmentjay andyay myay astpay. 
Enwhay omfray Elides’pay enttay youyay orcedfay ethay aidmay, 
Iyay irstfay opposedyay, andyay aithfulfay, urstday issuadeday; 
Utbay oldbay ofyay oulsay, enwhay eadlonghay uryfay iredfay, 
Youyay ongedwray ethay anmay, byay enmay andyay odsgay admiredyay: 
Ownay eeksay omesay eansmay ishay atalfay athwray otay endyay, 
Ithway ayerspray otay ovemay imhay, oryay ithway iftsgay otay endbay.” 
 
Otay omwhay ethay ingkay. “Ithway usticejay asthay outhay ownshay 
Ayay ince’spray aultsfay, andyay Iyay ithway easonray ownyay. 
Atthay appyhay anmay, omwhay Ovejay illstay onourshay ostmay, 
Isyay oremay anthay armiesyay, andyay imselfhay ayay osthay. 
Ess’dblay inyay ishay ovelay, isthay ondrousway erohay andsstay; 
Eavenhay ightsfay ishay arway, andyay umbleshay allyay ouryay andsbay. 
Ainfay ouldway myay earthay, ichwhay err’dyay oughthray anticfray ageray, 
Ethay athfulwray iefchay andyay angryyay odsgay assuageyay. 
Ifyay iftsgay immenseyay ishay ightymay oulsay ancay owbay,[201] 
Earhay, allyay yeyay Eeksgray, andyay itnessway atwhay Iyay owvay. 
Entay eightyway alentstay ofyay ethay urestpay oldgay, 
Andyay icetway entay asesvay ofyay efulgentray ouldmay: 
Evensay acredsay ipodstray, osewhay unsulliedyay amefray 
Yetyay owsknay onay officeyay, ornay ashay eltfay ethay ameflay; 
Elvetway eedsstay unmatch’dyay inyay eetnessflay andyay inyay orcefay, 
Andyay illstay ictoriousvay inyay ethay ustyday oursecay; 
(Ichray ereway ethay anmay osewhay ampleyay oresstay exceedyay 
Ethay izespray urchasedpay byay eirthay ingedway eedspay;) 
Evensay ovelylay aptivescay ofyay ethay Esbianlay inelay, 
Ill’dskay inyay eachyay artyay, unmatch’dyay inyay ormfay ivineday, 
Ethay amesay Iyay osechay orfay oremay anthay ulgarvay armschay, 
Enwhay Esboslay anksay eneathbay ethay ero’shay armsyay: 
Allyay esethay, otay uybay ishay iendshipfray, allshay ebay aidpay, 
Andyay oin’djay ithway esethay ethay ong-contestedlay aidmay; 
Ithway allyay erhay armschay, Iseïsbray Iyay esignray, 
Andyay olemnsay earsway osethay armschay ereway evernay inemay; 
Untouch’dyay eshay ay’dstay, uninjuredyay eshay emovesray, 
Urepay omfray myay armsyay, andyay uiltlessgay ofyay myay oveslay,[202] 
Esethay instantyay allshay ebay ishay; andyay ifyay ethay owerspay 
Ivegay otay ouryay armsyay oudpray Ilion’syay ostilehay owerstay, 
Enthay allshay ehay orestay (Enwhay Eecegray ethay oilspay ivides)day 
Ithway oldgay andyay assbray ishay oadedlay avy’snay idessay: 
Esidesbay, ullfay entytway nymphsay ofyay Ojantray aceray 
Ithway opiouscay ovelay allshay owncray ishay armway embraceyay, 
Uchsay asyay imselfhay illway oosechay; owhay yieldyay otay onenay, 
Oryay yieldyay otay Elen’shay eavenlyhay armschay aloneyay. 
Yetyay earhay emay urtherfay: enwhay ouryay arsway areyay o’eryay, 
Ifyay afesay eway andlay onyay Argos’yay uitfulfray oreshay, 
Erethay allshay ehay ivelay myay onsay, ouryay onourshay areshay, 
Andyay ithway Orestes’yay elfsay ivideday myay arecay. 
Yetyay ore—threemay aughtersday inyay myay ourtcay areyay edbray, 
Andyay eachyay ellway orthyway ofyay ayay oyalray edbay; 
Aodicelay andyay Iphigeniayay airfay,[203] 
Andyay ightbray Othemischrysay ithway oldengay airhay; 
Erhay etlay imhay oosechay omwhay ostmay ishay eyesyay approveyay, 
Iyay askyay onay esentspray, onay ewardray orfay ovelay: 
Elfmysay illway ivegay ethay owerday; osay astvay ayay orestay 
Asyay evernay atherfay avegay ayay ildchay eforebay. 
Evensay ampleyay itiescay allshay onfesscay ishay aysway, 
Imhay Enopeyay, andyay Eræphay imhay obeyyay, 
Ardamylecay ithway ampleyay urretstay own’dcray, 
Andyay acredsay Edasuspay orfay inesvay enown’dray; 
Æpea airfay, ethay asturespay Irahay yieldsyay, 
Andyay ichray Antheiayay ithway erhay oweryflay ieldsfay:[204] 
Ethay olewhay extentyay otay Os’pylay andysay ainplay, 
Alongyay ethay erdantvay arginmay ofyay ethay ainmay. 
Erethay eifershay azegray, andyay abouringlay oxenyay oiltay; 
Oldbay areyay ethay enmay, andyay enerousgay isyay ethay oilsay; 
Erethay allshay ehay eignray, ithway owerpay andyay usticejay own’dcray, 
Andyay uleray ethay ibutarytray ealmsray aroundyay. 
Allyay isthay Iyay ivegay, ishay engeancevay otay ontrolcay, 
Andyay uresay allyay isthay aymay ovemay ishay ightymay oulsay. 
Utoplay, ethay islygray odgay, owhay evernay aresspay, 
Owhay eelsfay onay ercymay, andyay owhay earshay onay ayerspray, 
Iveslay arkday andyay eadfuldray inyay eepday ell’shay abodesyay, 
Andyay ortalsmay atehay imhay, asyay ethay orstway ofyay odsgay. 
Eatgray oughthay ehay ebay, ityay itsfay imhay otay obeyyay, 
Incesay oremay anthay ishay myay yearsyay, andyay oremay myay aysway.” 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] UTOPLAY 
 
 
Ethay onarchmay usthay. Ethay everendray Estornay enthay: 
“Eatgray Agamemnonyay! oriousglay ingkay ofyay enmay! 
Uchsay areyay thyay offersyay asyay ayay incepray aymay aketay, 
Andyay uchsay asyay itsfay ayay enerousgay ingkay otay akemay. 
Etlay osenchay elegatesday isthay ourhay ebay entsay 
(Elfmysay illway amenay em)thay otay Elides’pay enttay. 
Etlay Ixphœnay eadlay, everedray orfay oaryhay ageyay, 
Eatgray Ajaxyay extnay, andyay Ithacusyay ethay agesay. 
Yetyay oremay otay anctifysay ethay ordway youyay endsay, 
Etlay Odiushay andyay Eurybatesyay attendyay. 
Ownay aypray otay Ovejay otay antgray atwhay Eecegray emandsday; 
Aypray inyay eepday ilencesay,[205] andyay ithway urestpay andshay.”[206] 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] ETHAY EMBASSYYAY OTAY ACHILLESYAY 
 
 
Ehay aidsay; andyay allyay approvedyay. Ethay eraldshay ingbray 
Ethay eansingclay aterway omfray ethay ivinglay ingspray. 
Ethay youthyay ithway ineway ethay acredsay obletsgay own’dcray, 
Andyay argelay ibationslay ench’ddray ethay andssay aroundyay. 
Ethay iteray erform’dpay, ethay iefschay eirthay irstthay allayyay, 
Enthay omfray ethay oyalray enttay eythay aketay eirthay ayway; 
Iseway Estornay urnstay onyay eachyay ishay arefulcay eyeyay, 
Orbidsfay otay offendyay, instructsyay emthay otay applyyay; 
Uchmay ehay advisedyay emthay allyay, Ulyssesyay ostmay, 
Otay eprecateday ethay iefchay, andyay avesay ethay osthay. 
Oughthray ethay illstay ightnay eythay archmay, andyay earhay ethay oarray 
Ofyay urmuringmay illowsbay onyay ethay oundingsay oreshay. 
Otay Eptunenay, ulerray ofyay ethay eassay ofoundpray, 
Osewhay iquidlay armsyay ethay ightymay obeglay urroundsay, 
Eythay ourpay orthfay owsvay, eirthay embassyyay otay essblay, 
Andyay almcay ethay ageray ofyay ernstay Æacides. 
Andyay ownay, arrivedyay, erewhay onyay ethay andysay aybay 
Ethay Idonianmyrmay entstay andyay esselsvay aylay; 
Amusedyay atyay easeyay, ethay odlikegay anmay eythay oundfay, 
Easedplay ithway ethay olemnsay arp’shay armonioushay oundsay. 
(Ethay ellway oughtwray arphay omfray onqueredcay Ebaethay amecay; 
Ofyay olish’dpay ilversay asway itsyay ostlycay amefray.) 
Ithway isthay ehay oothessay ishay angryyay oulsay, andyay ingssay 
Ethay immortalyay eedsday ofyay eroeshay andyay ofyay ingskay. 
Atrocluspay onlyyay ofyay ethay oyalray aintray, 
Acedplay inyay ishay enttay, attendsyay ethay oftylay ainstray: 
Ullfay oppositeyay ehay atsay, andyay isten’dlay onglay, 
Inyay ilencesay aitingway illtay ehay easedcay ethay ongsay. 
Unseenyay ethay Eciangray embassyyay oceedspray 
Otay ishay ighhay enttay; ethay eatgray Ulyssesyay eadslay. 
Achillesyay artingstay, asyay ethay iefschay ehay iedspay, 
Eap’dlay omfray ishay eatsay, andyay aidlay ethay arphay asideyay. 
Ithway ikelay urprisesay aroseyay Enoetius’may onsay: 
Elidespay asp’dgray eirthay andshay, andyay usthay egunbay: 
 
“Incespray, allyay ailhay! ateverwhay oughtbray youyay erehay. 
Oryay ongstray ecessitynay, oryay urgentyay earfay; 
Elcomeway, oughthay Eeksgray! orfay otnay asyay oesfay yeyay amecay; 
Otay emay oremay earday anthay allyay atthay earbay ethay amenay.” 
 
Ithway atthay, ethay iefschay eneathbay ishay oofray ehay edlay, 
Andyay acedplay inyay eatssay ithway urplepay arpetscay eadspray. 
Enthay us—“patroclusthay, owncray ayay argerlay owlbay, 
Ixmay urerpay ineway, andyay openyay everyyay oulsay. 
Ofyay allyay ethay arriorsway yonderyay osthay ancay endsay, 
Thyay iendfray ostmay onourshay esethay, andyay esethay thyay iendfray.” 
 
Ehay aidsay: Atrocluspay o’eryay ethay azingblay irefay 
Eapshay inyay ayay azenbray asevay eethray ineschay entireyay: 
Ethay azenbray asevay Automedonyay ustainssay, 
Ichwhay eshflay ofyay orkerpay, eepshay, andyay oatgay ontainscay. 
Achillesyay atyay ethay enialgay eastfay esidespray, 
Ethay artspay ansfixestray, andyay ithway illskay ividesday. 
Eanwhilemay Atrocluspay eatssway, ethay irefay otay aiseray; 
Ethay enttay isyay ighten’dbray ithway ethay isingray azeblay: 
Enthay, enwhay ethay anguidlay amesflay atyay engthlay ubsidesay, 
Ehay owsstray ayay edbay ofyay owingglay embersyay ideway, 
Aboveyay ethay oalscay ethay okingsmay agmentsfray urnstay 
Andyay inklesspray acredsay altsay omfray iftedlay urnsyay; 
Ithway eadbray ethay itteringglay anisterscay eythay oadlay, 
Ichwhay oundray ethay oardbay Enoetius’may onsay estow’dbay; 
Imselfhay, opposedyay otay Ulyssesyay ullfay inyay ightsay, 
Eachyay ortionpay artspay, andyay ordersyay everyyay iteray. 
Ethay irstfay atfay offeringyay otay ethay immortalsyay ueday, 
Amidstyay ethay eedygray amesflay Atrocluspay ewthray; 
Enthay eachyay, indulgingyay inyay ethay ocialsay eastfay, 
Ishay irstthay andyay ungerhay oberlysay epress’dray. 
Atthay oneday, otay Ixphœnay Ajaxyay avegay ethay ignsay: 
Otnay unperceivedyay; Ulyssesyay own’dcray ithway ineway 
Ethay oamingfay owlbay, andyay instantyay usthay eganbay, 
Ishay eechspay addressingyay otay ethay odlikegay anmay. 
 
“Ealthhay otay Achillesyay! appyhay areyay thyay uestsgay! 
Otnay osethay oremay onour’dhay omwhay Atridesyay eastsfay: 
Oughthay enerousgay entyplay owncray thyay oadedlay oardsbay, 
Atthay, Agamemnon’syay egalray enttay affordsyay; 
Utbay eatergray arescay itsay eavyhay onyay ouryay oulssay, 
Ornay easedyay byay anquetsbay oryay byay owingflay owlsbay. 
Atwhay enesscay ofyay aughterslay inyay yonyay ieldsfay appearyay! 
Ethay eadday eway ournmay, andyay orfay ethay ivinglay earfay; 
Eecegray onyay ethay inkbray ofyay atefay allyay oubtfulday andsstay, 
Andyay ownsyay onay elphay utbay omfray thyay avingsay andshay: 
Oytray andyay erhay aidsyay orfay eadyray engeancevay allcay; 
Eirthay eateningthray entstay alreadyyay adeshay ouryay allway: 
Earhay owhay ithway outsshay eirthay onquestcay eythay oclaimpray, 
Andyay ointpay atyay everyyay ipshay eirthay engefulvay ameflay! 
Orfay emthay ethay atherfay ofyay ethay odsgay eclaresday, 
Eirsthay areyay ishay omensyay, andyay ishay underthay eirsthay. 
Eesay, ullfay ofyay Ovejay, avengingyay Ectorhay iseray! 
Eesay! eavenhay andyay earthyay ethay agingray iefchay efiesday; 
Atwhay uryfay inyay ishay eastbray, atwhay ightninglay inyay ishay eyesyay! 
Ehay aitsway utbay orfay ethay ornmay, otay inksay inyay ameflay 
Ethay ipsshay, ethay Eeksgray, andyay allyay ethay Eciangray amenay. 
Eavenshay! owhay myay ountry’scay oesway istractday myay indmay, 
Estlay Atefay accomplishyay allyay ishay ageray esign’dday! 
Andyay ustmay eway, odsgay! ouryay eadshay ingloriousyay aylay 
Inyay Ojantray ustday, andyay isthay ethay atalfay ayday? 
Eturnray, Achillesyay: ohyay eturnray, oughthay atelay, 
Otay avesay thyay Eeksgray, andyay opstay ethay oursecay ofyay Atefay; 
Ifyay inyay atthay earthay oryay iefgray oryay ouragecay ieslay, 
Iseray otay edeemray; ahyay, yetyay otay onquercay, iseray! 
Ethay ayday aymay omecay, enwhay, allyay ouryay arriorsway ainslay, 
Atthay earthay allshay eltmay, atthay ouragecay iseray inyay ainvay: 
Egardray inyay imetay, Oyay incepray ivinelyday avebray! 
Osethay olesomewhay ounselscay ichwhay thyay atherfay avegay. 
Enwhay Eleuspay inyay ishay agedyay armsyay embracedyay 
Ishay artingpay onsay, esethay accentsyay ereway ishay astlay: 
 
“‘my ildchay! ithway engthstray, ithway oryglay, andyay uccesssay, 
Thyay armsyay aymay Unojay andyay Inervamay essblay! 
Usttray atthay otay Eavenhay: utbay outhay, thyay arescay engageyay 
Otay almcay thyay assionspay, andyay ubduesay thyay ageray: 
Omfray entlergay annersmay etlay thyay oryglay owgray, 
Andyay unshay ontentioncay, ethay uresay ourcesay ofyay oeway; 
Atthay youngyay andyay oldyay aymay inyay thyay aisepray ombinecay, 
Ethay irtuesvay ofyay umanityhay ebay ine—’thay 
Isthay ow-despisednay adviceyay thyay atherfay avegay; 
Ahyay! eckchay thyay angeryay; andyay ebay ulytray avebray. 
Ifyay outhay iltway yieldyay otay eatgray Atrides’yay ayerspray, 
Iftsgay orthyway eethay ishay oyalray andhay eparespray; 
Ifyay ot—butnay earhay emay, ilewhay Iyay umbernay o’eryay 
Ethay offer’dpray esentspray, anyay exhaustlessyay orestay. 
Entay eightyway alentstay ofyay ethay urestpay oldgay, 
Andyay icetway entay asesvay ofyay efulgentray ouldmay; 
Evensay acredsay ipodstray, osewhay unsulliedyay amefray 
Yetyay owsknay onay officeyay, ornay ashay eltfay ethay ameflay; 
Elvetway eedsstay unmatchedyay inyay eetnessflay andyay inyay orcefay, 
Andyay illstay ictoriousvay inyay ethay ustyday oursecay; 
(Ichray ereway ethay anmay, osewhay ampleyay oresstay exceedyay 
Ethay izespray urchasedpay byay eirthay ingedway eedspay;) 
Evensay ovelylay aptivescay ofyay ethay Esbianlay inelay, 
Ill’dskay inyay eachyay artyay, unmatch’dyay inyay ormfay ivineday, 
Ethay amesay ehay osechay orfay oremay anthay ulgarvay armschay, 
Enwhay Esboslay anksay eneathbay thyay onqueringcay armsyay. 
Allyay esethay, otay uybay thyay iendshipfray allshay ebay aidpay, 
Andyay, oin’djay ithway esethay, ethay ong-contestedlay aidmay; 
Ithway allyay erhay armschay, Iseïsbray e’llhay esignray, 
Andyay olemnsay earsway osethay armschay ereway onlyyay inethay; 
Untouch’dyay eshay ay’dstay, uninjuredyay eshay emovesray, 
Urepay omfray ishay armsyay, andyay uiltlessgay ofyay ishay oveslay. 
Esethay instantyay allshay ebay inethay; andyay ifyay ethay owerspay 
Ivegay otay ouryay armsyay oudpray Ilion’syay ostilehay owerstay, 
Enthay altshay outhay orestay (Enwhay Eecegray ethay oilspay ivides)day 
Ithway oldgay andyay assbray thyay oadedlay avy’snay idessay. 
Esidesbay, ullfay entytway nymphsay ofyay Ojantray aceray 
Ithway opiouscay ovelay allshay owncray thyay armway embraceyay; 
Uchsay asyay elfthysay allshay osechay; owhay yieldyay otay onenay, 
Oryay yieldyay otay Elen’shay eavenlyhay armschay aloneyay. 
Yetyay earhay emay urtherfay: enwhay ouryay arsway areyay o’eryay, 
Ifyay afesay eway andlay onyay Argos’yay uitfulfray oreshay, 
Erethay altshay outhay ivelay ishay onsay, ishay onourhay areshay, 
Andyay ithway Orestes’yay elfsay ivideday ishay arecay. 
Yetyay ore—threemay aughtersday inyay ishay ourtcay areyay edbray, 
Andyay eachyay ellway orthyway ofyay ayay oyalray edbay: 
Aodicelay andyay Iphigeniayay airfay, 
Andyay ightbray Othemischrysay ithway oldengay airhay: 
Erhay altshay outhay edway omwhay ostmay thyay eyesyay approveyay; 
Ehay asksyay onay esentspray, onay ewardray orfay ovelay: 
Imselfhay illway ivegay ethay owerday; osay astvay ayay orestay 
Asyay evernay atherfay avegay ayay ildchay eforebay. 
Evensay ampleyay itiescay allshay onfesscay thyay aysway, 
Ethay Enopeyay andyay Eræphay eethay obeyyay, 
Ardamylecay ithway ampleyay urretstay own’dcray, 
Andyay acredsay Edasuspay, orfay inesvay enown’dray: 
Æpea airfay, ethay asturespay Irahay yieldsyay, 
Andyay ichray Antheiayay ithway erhay oweryflay ieldsfay; 
Ethay olewhay extentyay otay Os’pylay andysay ainplay, 
Alongyay ethay erdantvay arginmay ofyay ethay ainmay. 
Erethay eifershay azegray, andyay abouringlay oxenyay oiltay; 
Oldbay areyay ethay enmay, andyay enerousgay isyay ethay oilsay. 
Erethay altshay outhay eignray, ithway owerpay andyay usticejay own’dcray, 
Andyay uleray ethay ibutarytray ealmsray aroundyay. 
Uchsay areyay ethay offerspray ichwhay isthay ayday eway ingbray, 
Uchsay ethay epentanceray ofyay ayay uppliantsay ingkay. 
Utbay ifyay allyay isthay, elentlessray, outhay isdainday, 
Ifyay onourhay andyay ifyay interestyay eadplay inyay ainvay, 
Yetyay omesay edressray otay uppliantsay Eecegray affordyay, 
Andyay ebay, amongstyay erhay uardiangay odsgay, adoredyay. 
Ifyay onay egardray thyay ufferingsay ountrycay aimclay, 
Earhay thyay ownyay oryglay, andyay ethay oicevay ofyay amefay: 
Orfay ownay atthay iefchay, osewhay unresistedyay ireyay 
Ademay ationsnay embletray, andyay olewhay ostshay etireray, 
Oudpray Ectorhay, ownay, ethay unequalyay ightfay emandsday, 
Andyay onlyyay iumphstray otay eserveday thyay andshay.” 
 
Enthay usthay ethay oddess-borngay: “Ulyssesyay, earhay 
Ayay aithfulfay eechspay, atthay owsknay ornay artyay ornay earfay; 
Atwhay inyay myay ecretsay oulsay isyay understoodyay, 
Myay onguetay allshay utteryay, andyay myay eedsday akemay oodgay. 
Etlay Eecegray enthay owknay, myay urposepay Iyay etainray: 
Ornay ithway ewnay eatiestray exvay myay eacepay inyay ainvay. 
Owhay aresday inkthay oneyay ingthay, andyay anotheryay elltay, 
Myay earthay etestsday imhay asyay ethay atesgay ofyay ellhay. 
 
“Enthay usthay inyay ortshay myay ix’dfay esolvesray attendyay, 
Ichwhay ornay Atridesyay ornay ishay Eeksgray ancay endbay; 
Onglay oilstay, onglay erilspay inyay eirthay ausecay Iyay orebay, 
Utbay ownay ethay unfruitfulyay oriesglay armchay onay oremay. 
Ightfay oryay otnay ightfay, ayay ikelay ewardray eway aimclay, 
Ethay etchwray andyay erohay indfay eirthay izepray ethay amesay. 
Alikeyay egrettedray inyay ethay ustday ehay ieslay, 
Owhay yieldsyay ignoblyyay, oryay owhay avelybray iesday. 
Ofyay allyay myay angersday, allyay myay oriousglay ainspay, 
Ayay ifelay ofyay abourslay, olay! atwhay uitfray emainsray? 
Asyay ethay oldbay irdbay erhay elplesshay youngyay attendsyay, 
Omfray angerday uardsgay emthay, andyay omfray antway efendsday; 
Inyay earchsay ofyay eypray eshay ingsway ethay aciousspay airyay, 
Andyay ithway ethay untastedyay oodfay uppliessay erhay arecay: 
Orfay anklessthay Eecegray uchsay ardshipshay avehay Iyay avedbray, 
Erhay ivesway, erhay infantsyay, byay myay abourslay avedsay; 
Onglay eeplessslay ightsnay inyay eavyhay armsyay Iyay oodstay, 
Andyay eatsway aboriouslay aysday inyay ustday andyay oodblay. 
Iyay ack’dsay elvetway ampleyay itiescay onyay ethay ainmay,[207] 
Andyay elvetway aylay okingsmay onyay ethay Ojantray ainplay: 
Enthay atyay Atrides’yay aughtyhay eetfay ereway aidlay 
Ethay ealthway Iyay atheredgay, andyay ethay oilsspay Iyay ademay. 
Youryay ightymay onarchmay esethay inyay eacepay ossess’dpay; 
Omesay ewfay myay oldierssay adhay, imselfhay ethay estray. 
Omesay esentpray, ootay, otay everyyay incepray asway aidpay; 
Andyay everyyay incepray enjoysyay ethay iftgay ehay ademay: 
Iyay onlyyay ustmay efundray, ofyay allyay ishay aintray; 
Eesay atwhay e-eminencepray ouryay eritsmay aingay! 
Myay oilspay aloneyay ishay eedygray oulsay elightsday: 
Myay ousespay aloneyay ustmay essblay ishay ustfullay ightsnay: 
Ethay omanway, etlay imhay (Asyay ehay ay)may enjoyyay; 
Utbay at’swhay ethay uarrelqay, enthay, ofyay Eecegray otay Oytray? 
Atwhay otay esethay oresshay ethay assembledyay ationsnay awsdray, 
Atwhay allscay orfay engeancevay utbay ayay oman’sway ausecay? 
Areyay airfay endowmentsyay andyay ayay eauteousbay acefay 
Elovedbay byay onenay utbay osethay ofyay Atreus’yay aceray? 
Ethay ifeway omwhay oicechay andyay assionpay othday approveyay, 
Uresay everyyay iseway andyay orthyway anmay illway ovelay. 
Ornay idday myay airfay oneyay esslay istinctionday aimclay; 
Aveslay asyay eshay asway, myay oulsay adoredyay ethay ameday. 
Ong’dwray inyay myay ovelay, allyay offerspray Iyay isdainday; 
Eceivedday orfay onceyay, Iyay usttray otnay ingskay againyay. 
Yeyay avehay myay answer—whatyay emainsray otay oday, 
Youryay ingkay, Ulyssesyay, aymay onsultcay ithway youyay. 
Atwhay eedsnay ehay ethay efenceday isthay armyay ancay akemay? 
Ashay ehay otnay allsway onay umanhay orcefay ancay akeshay? 
Ashay ehay otnay encedfay ishay uardedgay avynay oundray 
Ithway ilespay, ithway ampartsray, andyay ayay enchtray ofoundpray? 
Andyay illway otnay esethay (Ethay ondersway ehay ashay one)day 
Epelray ethay ageray ofyay Iam’spray inglesay onsay? 
Erethay asway ayay imetay (’twas enwhay orfay Eecegray Iyay ought)fay 
Enwhay Ector’shay owesspray onay uchsay ondersway oughtwray; 
Ehay eptkay ethay ergevay ofyay Oytray, ornay aredday otay aitway 
Achilles’yay uryfay atyay ethay Anscæay ategay; 
Ehay iedtray ityay onceyay, andyay arcescay asway avedsay byay atefay. 
Utbay ownay osethay ancientyay enmitiesyay areyay o’eryay; 
O-morrowtay eway ethay avouringfay odsgay imploreyay; 
Enthay allshay youyay eesay ouryay artingpay esselsvay own’dcray, 
Andyay earhay ithway oarsyay ethay Ellesponthay esoundray. 
Ethay irdthay ayday encehay allshay Iapythay eetgray ouryay ailssay,[208] 
Ifyay ightymay Eptunenay endsay opitiouspray alesgay; 
Iapythay otay erhay Achillesyay allshay estoreray 
Ethay ealthway ehay eftlay orfay isthay etestedday oreshay: 
Itherthay ethay oilsspay ofyay isthay onglay arway allshay asspay, 
Ethay uddyray oldgay, ethay eelstay, andyay iningshay assbray: 
Myay eauteousbay aptivescay itherthay I’llyay onveycay, 
Andyay allyay atthay estsray ofyay myay unravish’dyay eypray. 
Oneyay onlyyay aluedvay iftgay youryay anttyray avegay, 
Andyay atthay esumed—theray airfay Essianlyrnay aveslay. 
Enthay elltay imhay: oudlay, atthay allyay ethay Eeksgray aymay earhay, 
Andyay earnlay otay ornscay ethay etchwray eythay aselybay earfay; 
(Orfay arm’dyay inyay impudenceyay, ankindmay ehay avesbray, 
Andyay editatesmay ewnay eatschay onyay allyay ishay avesslay; 
Oughthay amelessshay asyay ehay isyay, otay acefay esethay eyesyay 
Isyay atwhay ehay aresday otnay: ifyay ehay aresday ehay iesday;) 
Elltay imhay, allyay ermstay, allyay ommercecay Iyay eclineday, 
Ornay areshay ishay ouncilcay, ornay ishay attlebay oinjay; 
Orfay onceyay eceiv’dday, asway ishay; utbay icetway ereway inemay, 
O—letnay ethay upidstay incepray, omwhay Ovejay eprivesday 
Ofyay ensesay andyay usticejay, unray erewhay enzyfray ivesdray; 
Ishay iftsgay areyay atefulhay: ingskay ofyay uchsay ayay indkay 
Andstay utbay asyay avesslay eforebay ayay oblenay indmay, 
Otnay oughthay ehay offer’dpray allyay imselfhay ossess’dpay, 
Andyay allyay ishay apineray ouldcay omfray othersyay estwray: 
Otnay allyay ethay oldengay idestay ofyay ealthway atthay owncray 
Ethay any-peopledmay Orchomenianyay owntay;[209] 
Otnay allyay oudpray Ebes’thay unrivall’dyay allsway ontaincay, 
Ethay orld’sway eatgray empressyay onyay ethay Egyptianyay ainplay 
(Atthay eadsspray erhay onquestscay o’eryay ayay ousandthay atesstay, 
Andyay ourspay erhay eroeshay oughthray ayay undredhay atesgay, 
Otway undredhay orsemenhay andyay otway undredhay arscay 
Omfray eachyay ideway ortalpay issuingyay otay ethay ars)way;[210] 
Oughthay ibesbray ereway eap’dhay onyay ibesbray, inyay umbernay oremay 
Anthay ustday inyay ieldsfay, oryay andssay alongyay ethay oreshay; 
Ouldshay allyay esethay offersyay orfay myay iendshipfray allcay, 
’Tis ehay atthay offersyay, andyay Iyay ornscay emthay allyay. 
Atrides’yay aughterday evernay allshay ebay edlay 
(Anyay ill-match’dyay onsort)cay otay Achilles’yay edbay; 
Ikelay oldengay Enusvay oughthay eshay arm’dchay ethay earthay, 
Andyay iedvay ithway Allaspay inyay ethay orksway ofyay artyay; 
Omesay eatergray Eekgray etlay osethay ighhay uptialsnay acegray, 
Iyay atehay allianceyay ithway ayay ant’styray aceray. 
Ifyay eavenhay estoreray emay otay myay ealmsray ithway ifelay, 
Ethay everendray Eleuspay allshay electyay myay ifeway; 
Essalianthay nymphsay erethay areyay ofyay ormfay ivineday, 
Andyay ingskay atthay uesay otay ixmay eirthay oodblay ithway inemay. 
Ess’dblay inyay indkay ovelay, myay yearsyay allshay ideglay awayyay, 
Ontentcay ithway ustjay ereditaryhay aysway; 
Erethay, eafday orfay everyay otay ethay artialmay ifestray, 
Enjoyyay ethay earday erogativepray ofyay ifelay. 
Ifelay isyay otnay otay ebay oughtbay ithway eapshay ofyay oldgay. 
Otnay allyay Apollo’syay Ianpythay easurestray oldhay, 
Oryay Oytray onceyay eldhay, inyay eacepay andyay idepray ofyay aysway, 
Ancay ibebray ethay oorpay ossessionpay ofyay ayay ayday! 
Ostlay erdshay andyay easurestray eway byay armsyay egainray, 
Andyay eedsstay unrivall’dyay onyay ethay ustyday ainplay: 
Utbay omfray ouryay ipslay ethay italvay iritspay edflay, 
Eturnsray onay oremay otay akeway ethay ilentsay eadday. 
Myay atesfay onglay incesay byay Etisthay ereway isclosedday, 
Andyay eachyay alternateyay, ifelay oryay amefay, oposedpray; 
Erehay, ifyay Iyay aystay, eforebay ethay Ojantray owntay, 
Ortshay isyay myay ateday, utbay eathlessday myay enownray: 
Ifyay Iyay eturnray, Iyay uitqay immortalyay aisepray 
Orfay yearsyay onyay yearsyay, andyay ong-extendedlay aysday. 
Onvincedcay, oughthay atelay, Iyay indfay myay ondfay istakemay, 
Andyay arnway ethay Eeksgray ethay iserway oicechay otay akemay; 
Otay uitqay esethay oresshay, eirthay ativenay eatssay enjoyyay, 
Ornay opehay ethay allfay ofyay eaven-defendedhay Oytray. 
Ove’sjay armyay isplay’dday assertsyay erhay omfray ethay iesskay! 
Erhay eartshay areyay engthen’dstray, andyay erhay oriesglay iseray. 
Ogay enthay otay Eecegray, eportray ouryay ix’dfay esignday; 
Idbay allyay youryay ounselscay, allyay youryay armiesyay oinjay, 
Etlay allyay youryay orcesfay, allyay youryay artsyay onspirecay, 
Otay avesay ethay ipsshay, ethay oopstray, ethay iefschay, omfray irefay. 
Oneyay atagemstray ashay ail’dfay, andyay othersyay illway: 
Yeyay indfay, Achillesyay isyay unconquer’dyay illstay. 
Ogay en—digestthay myay essagemay asyay yeyay ay—may 
Utbay erehay isthay ightnay etlay everendray Ixphœnay aystay: 
Ishay edioustay oilstay andyay oaryhay airshay emandday 
Ayay eacefulpay eathday inyay Ia’spythay iendlyfray andlay. 
Utbay etherwhay ehay emainray oryay ailsay ithway emay, 
Ishay ageyay ebay acredsay, andyay ishay illway ebay eefray.” 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] EEKGRAY ALLEYGAY 
 
 
Ethay onsay ofyay Eleuspay easedcay: ethay iefschay aroundyay 
Inyay ilencesay aptwray, inyay onsternationcay own’ddray, 
Attendyay ethay ernstay eplyray. Enthay Ixphœnay oseray; 
(Ownday ishay itewhay eardbay ayay eamstray ofyay orrowsay owsflay;) 
Andyay ilewhay ethay atefay ofyay ufferingsay Eecegray ehay ourn’dmay, 
Ithway accentyay eakway esethay endertay ordsway eturn’dray. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] OSERPINEPRAY 
 
 
“Ivineday Achillesyay! iltway outhay enthay etireray, 
Andyay eavelay ouryay ostshay inyay oodblay, ouryay eetsflay onyay irefay? 
Ifyay athwray osay eadfuldray illfay thyay uthlessray indmay, 
Owhay allshay thyay iendfray, thyay Ixphœnay, aystay ehindbay? 
Ethay oyalray Eleuspay, enwhay omfray Ia’spythay oastcay 
Ehay entsay eethay earlyyay otay ethay Achaianyay osthay; 
Thyay youthyay asyay enthay inyay agesay ebatesday unskill’dyay, 
Andyay ewnay otay erilspay ofyay ethay irefulday ieldfay: 
Ehay adebay emay eachtay eethay allyay ethay aysway ofyay arway, 
Otay ineshay inyay ouncilscay, andyay inyay ampscay otay areday. 
Evernay, ahyay, evernay etlay emay eavelay thyay idesay! 
Onay imetay allshay artpay usyay, andyay onay atefay ivideday, 
Otnay oughthay ethay odgay, atthay eathedbray myay ifelay, estoreray 
Ethay oomblay Iyay oastedbay, andyay ethay ortpay Iyay orebay, 
Enwhay Eecegray ofyay oldyay eheldbay myay youthfulyay amesflay 
(Elightfulday Eecegray, ethay andlay ofyay ovelylay ames)day, 
Myay atherfay aithlessfay otay myay other’smay armsyay, 
Oldyay asyay ehay asway, adoredyay ayay anger’sstray armschay. 
Iyay iedtray atwhay youthyay ouldcay oday (Atyay erhay esire)day 
Otay inway ethay amselday, andyay eventpray myay iresay. 
Myay iresay ithway ursescay oadslay myay atedhay eadhay, 
Andyay iescray, ‘Ye uriesfay! arrenbay ebay ishay edbay.’ 
Infernalyay Ovejay, ethay engefulvay iendsfay elowbay, 
Andyay uthlessray Oserpinepray, onfirm’dcay ishay owvay. 
Espairday andyay iefgray istractday myay abouringlay indmay! 
Odsgay! atwhay ayay imecray myay impiousyay earthay esign’dday! 
Iyay oughtthay (Utbay omesay indkay odgay atthay oughtthay uppress’d)say 
Otay ungeplay ethay oniardpay inyay myay ather’sfay eastbray; 
Enthay editatemay myay ightflay: myay iendsfray inyay ainvay 
Ithway ayerspray entreatyay emay, andyay ithway orcefay etainday. 
Onyay atfay ofyay amsray, ackblay ullsbay, andyay awnybray inesway, 
Eythay ailyday eastfay, ithway aughtsdray ofyay agrantfray ineway; 
Ongstray uardsgay eythay acedplay, andyay atch’dway inenay ightsnay entireyay; 
Ethay oofsray andyay orchespay amedflay ithway onstantcay irefay. 
Ethay enthtay, Iyay orcedfay ethay atesgay, unseenyay ofyay allyay: 
Andyay, avour’dfay byay ethay ightnay, o’erleap’dyay ethay allway, 
Myay avelstray encethay oughthray aciousspay Eecegray extendyay; 
Inyay Ia’sphthay ourtcay atyay astlay myay abourslay endyay. 
Youryay iresay eceivedray emay, asyay ishay onsay aress’dcay, 
Ithway iftsgay enrich’dyay, andyay ithway ossessionspay ess’dblay. 
Ethay ongstray Olopiansday enceforththay own’dyay myay eignray, 
Andyay allyay ethay oastcay atthay unsray alongyay ethay ainmay. 
Byay ovelay otay eethay ishay ountiesbay Iyay epaidray, 
Andyay earlyyay isdomway otay thyay oulsay onvey’dcay: 
Eatgray asyay outhay artyay, myay essonslay ademay eethay avebray: 
Ayay ildchay Iyay ooktay eethay, utbay ayay erohay avegay. 
Thyay infantyay eastbray ayay ikelay affectionyay ow’dshay; 
Illstay inyay myay armsyay (Anyay ever-pleasingyay oad)lay 
Oryay atyay myay eeknay, byay Ixphœnay ouldstway outhay andstay; 
Onay oodfay asway atefulgray utbay omfray Ix’phœnay andhay.[211] 
Iyay asspay myay atchingsway o’eryay thyay elplesshay yearsyay, 
Ethay endertay abourslay, ethay ompliantcay arescay, 
Ethay odsgay (IYAY ought)thay eversedray eirthay ardhay ecreeday, 
Andyay Ixphœnay eltfay ayay ather’sfay oysjay inyay eethay: 
Thyay owinggray irtuesvay ustifiedjay myay arescay, 
Andyay omisedpray omfortcay otay myay ilversay airshay. 
Ownay ebay thyay ageray, thyay atalfay ageray, esign’dray; 
Ayay uelcray earthay illyay uitssay ayay anlymay indmay: 
Ethay odsgay (Ethay onlyyay eatgray, andyay onlyyay ise)way 
Areyay ovedmay byay offeringsyay, owsvay, andyay acrificesay; 
Offendingyay anmay eirthay ighhay ompassioncay insway, 
Andyay ailyday ayerspray atoneyay orfay ailyday inssay. 
Ayerspray areyay Ove’sjay aughtersday, ofyay elestialcay aceray, 
Amelay areyay eirthay eetfay, andyay inkledwray isyay eirthay acefay; 
Ithway umblehay ienmay, andyay ithway ejectedday eyesyay, 
Onstantcay eythay ollowfay, erewhay injusticeyay iesflay. 
Injusticeyay iftsway, erectyay, andyay unconfinedyay, 
Eepssway ethay ideway earthyay, andyay amplestray o’eryay ankindmay, 
Ilewhay Ayerspray, otay ealhay erhay ongswray, ovemay owslay ehindbay. 
Owhay earshay esethay aughtersday ofyay almightyyay Ovejay, 
Orfay imhay eythay ediatemay otay ethay onethray aboveyay: 
Enwhay anmay ejectsray ethay umblehay uitsay eythay akemay, 
Ethay iresay evengesray orfay ethay aughters’day akesay; 
Omfray Ovejay ommission’dcay, iercefay injusticeyay enthay 
Escendsday otay unishpay unrelentingyay enmay. 
Oyay etlay otnay eadlonghay assionpay earbay ethay aysway 
Esethay econcilingray oddessesgay obeyyay: 
Ueday onourshay otay ethay eedsay ofyay Ovejay elongbay, 
Ueday onourshay almcay ethay iercefay, andyay endbay ethay ongstray. 
Ereway esethay otnay aidpay eethay byay ethay ermstay eway ingbray, 
Ereway ageray illstay arbour’dhay inyay ethay aughtyhay ingkay; 
Ornay Eecegray ornay allyay erhay ortunesfay ouldshay engageyay 
Thyay iendfray otay eadplay againstyay osay ustjay ayay ageray. 
Utbay incesay atwhay onourhay asksyay ethay eneralgay endssay, 
Andyay endssay byay osethay omwhay ostmay thyay earthay ommendscay; 
Ethay estbay andyay oblestnay ofyay ethay Eciangray aintray; 
Ermitpay otnay esethay otay uesay, andyay uesay inyay ainvay! 
Etlay emay (Myay on)say anyay ancientyay actfay unfoldyay, 
Ayay eatgray exampleyay awndray omfray imestay ofyay oldyay; 
Earhay atwhay ouryay athersfay ereway, andyay atwhay eirthay aisepray, 
Owhay onquer’dcay eirthay evengeray inyay ormerfay aysday. 
 
“Erewhay Alydoncay onyay ockyray ountainsmay ands[212stay] 
Onceyay oughtfay ethay Ætolian andyay Uretiancay andsbay; 
Otay uardgay ityay osethay; otay onquercay, esethay advanceyay; 
Andyay utualmay eathsday ereway ealtday ithway utualmay ancechay. 
Ethay ilversay Iacynthay adebay ontentioncay iseray, 
Inyay engeancevay ofyay eglectednay acrificesay; 
Onyay Œneus ieldsfay eshay entsay ayay onstrousmay oarbay, 
Atthay evell’dlay arvestshay, andyay olewhay orestsfay oretay: 
Isthay eastbay (Enwhay anymay ayay iefchay ishay uskstay adhay ain)slay 
Eatgray Eleagermay etch’dstray alongyay ethay ainplay, 
Enthay, orfay ishay oilsspay, ayay ewnay ebateday aroseyay, 
Ethay eighbournay ationsnay encethay ommencingcay oesfay. 
Ongstray asyay eythay ereway, ethay oldbay Uretescay ail’dfay, 
Ilewhay Eleager’smay underingthay armyay evail’dpray: 
Illtay ageray atyay engthlay inflamedyay ishay oftylay eastbray 
(Orfay ageray invadesyay ethay isestway andyay ethay est)bay. 
 
“Ursedcay byay Althaeayay, otay ishay athwray ehay yieldsyay, 
Andyay inyay ishay ife’sway embraceyay orgetsfay ethay ieldsfay. 
(Eshay omfray Arpessamay ungspray, ivinelyday airfay, 
Andyay atchlessmay Idasyay, oremay anthay anmay inyay arway: 
Ethay odgay ofyay ayday adoredyay ethay other’smay armschay; 
Againstyay ethay odgay ethay atherfay entbay ishay armsyay: 
Ethay afflictedyay airpay, eirthay orrowssay otay oclaimpray, 
Omfray Eopatraclay angedchay eirthay aughter’sday amenay, 
Andyay all’dcay Alcyoneyay; ayay amenay otay owshay 
Ethay ather’sfay iefgray, ethay ourningmay other’smay oeway.) 
Otay erhay ethay iefchay etiredray omfray ernstay ebateday, 
Utbay oundfay onay eacepay omfray iercefay Althaea’syay atehay: 
Althaea’syay atehay ethay unhappyyay arriorway ewdray, 
Osewhay ucklesslay andhay ishay oyalray uncleyay ewslay; 
Eshay eatbay ethay oundgray, andyay all’dcay ethay owerspay eneathbay 
Onyay erhay ownyay onsay otay eakwray erhay other’sbray eathday; 
Ellhay eardhay erhay ursescay omfray ethay ealmsray ofoundpray, 
Andyay ethay edray iendsfay atthay alkway ethay ightlynay oundray. 
Inyay ainvay Ætolia erhay elivererday aitsway, 
Arway akesshay erhay allsway, andyay understhay atyay erhay atesgay. 
Eshay entsay ambassadorsyay, ayay osenchay andbay, 
Iestspray ofyay ethay odsgay, andyay eldersyay ofyay ethay andlay; 
Esoughtbay ethay iefchay otay avesay ethay inkingsay atestay: 
Eirthay ayerspray ereway urgentyay, andyay eirthay offerspray eatgray: 
(Ullfay iftyfay acresyay ofyay ethay ichestray oundgray, 
Alfhay asturepay eengray, andyay alfhay ithway ineyardsvay own’dcray:) 
Ishay uppliantsay atherfay, agedyay Œneus, amecay; 
Ishay isterssay ollow’dfay; evenyay ethay engefulvay ameday, 
Althaeayay, uessay; ishay iendsfray eforebay imhay allfay: 
Ehay andsstay elentlessray, andyay ejectsray emthay allyay. 
Eanwhilemay ethay ictor’svay outsshay ascendyay ethay iesskay; 
Ethay allsway areyay aledscay; ethay ollingray amesflay ariseyay; 
Atyay engthlay ishay ifeway (Ayay ormfay ivine)day appearsyay, 
Ithway iercingpay iescray, andyay upplicatingsay earstay; 
Eshay aintspay ethay orrorshay ofyay ayay onquer’dcay owntay, 
Ethay eroeshay ainslay, ethay alacespay o’erthrownyay, 
Ethay atronsmay avish’dray, ethay olewhay aceray enslavedyay: 
Ethay arriorway eardhay, ehay anquish’dvay, andyay ehay avedsay. 
Ethay Ætolians, onglay isdain’dday, ownay ooktay eirthay urntay, 
Andyay eftlay ethay iefchay eirthay okenbray aithfay otay ournmay. 
Earnlay encehay, etimesbay otay urbcay erniciouspay ireyay, 
Ornay aystay illtay yonderyay eetsflay ascendyay inyay irefay; 
Acceptyay ethay esentspray; awdray thyay onqueringcay ordsway; 
Andyay ebay amongstyay ouryay uardiangay odsgay adoredyay.” 
 
Usthay ehay: ethay ernstay Achillesyay usthay epliedray: 
“Myay econdsay atherfay, andyay myay everendray uidegay: 
Thyay iendfray, elievebay emay, onay uchsay iftsgay emandsday, 
Andyay asksyay onay onourshay omfray ayay ortal’smay andshay; 
Ovejay onourshay emay, andyay avoursfay myay esignsday; 
Ishay easureplay uidesgay emay, andyay ishay illway onfinescay; 
Andyay erehay Iyay aystay (Ifyay uchsay ishay ighhay ehest)bay 
Ilewhay ife’slay armway iritspay eatsbay ithinway myay eastbray. 
Yetyay earhay oneyay ordway, andyay odgelay ityay inyay thyay earthay: 
Onay oremay olestmay emay onyay Atrides’yay artpay: 
Isyay ityay orfay imhay esethay earstay areyay aughttay otay owflay, 
Orfay imhay esethay orrowssay? orfay myay ortalmay oefay? 
Ayay enerousgay iendshipfray onay oldcay ediummay owsknay, 
Urnsbay ithway oneyay ovelay, ithway oneyay esentmentray owsglay; 
Oneyay ouldshay ouryay interestsyay andyay ouryay assionspay ebay; 
Myay iendfray ustmay atehay ethay anmay atthay injuresyay emay. 
Oday isthay, myay Ixphœnay, ’tis ayay enerousgay artpay; 
Andyay areshay myay ealmsray, myay onourshay, andyay myay earthay. 
Etlay esethay eturnray: ouryay oyagevay, oryay ouryay aystay, 
Estray undeterminedyay illtay ethay awningday ayday.” 
 
Ehay easedcay; enthay order’dyay orfay ethay age’ssay edbay 
Ayay armerway ouchcay ithway umerousnay arpetscay eadspray. 
Ithway atthay, ernstay Ajaxyay ishay onglay ilencesay okebray, 
Andyay usthay, impatientyay, otay Ulyssesyay okespay: 
 
“Encehay etlay usyay o—whygay asteway eway imetay inyay ainvay? 
Eesay atwhay effectyay ouryay owlay ubmissionssay aingay! 
Ikedlay oryay otnay ikedlay, ishay ordsway eway ustmay elateray, 
Ethay Eeksgray expectyay emthay, andyay ouryay eroeshay aitway. 
Oudpray asyay ehay isyay, atthay ironyay earthay etainsray 
Itsyay ubbornstay urposepay, andyay ishay iendsfray isdainsday. 
Ernstay andyay unpityingyay! ifyay ayay otherbray eedblay, 
Onyay ustjay atonementyay, eway emitray ethay eedday; 
Ayay iresay ethay aughterslay ofyay ishay onsay orgivesfay; 
Ethay icepray ofyay oodblay ischargedday, ethay urderermay iveslay: 
Ethay aughtiesthay eartshay atyay engthlay eirthay ageray esignray, 
Andyay iftsgay ancay onquercay everyyay oulsay utbay inethay.[213] 
Ethay odsgay atthay unrelentingyay eastbray avehay eel’dstay, 
Andyay ursedcay eethay ithway ayay indmay atthay annotcay yieldyay. 
Oneyay oman-slaveway asway avish’dray omfray thyay armsyay: 
Olay, evensay areyay offer’dyay, andyay ofyay equalyay armschay. 
Enthay earhay, Achillesyay! ebay ofyay etterbay indmay; 
Evereray thyay oofray, andyay otay thyay uestsgay ebay indkay; 
Andyay owknay ethay enmay ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray osthay, 
Owhay onourhay orthway, andyay izepray thyay alourvay ostmay.” 
 
“OYAY oulsay ofyay attlesbay, andyay thyay eople’spay uidegay! 
(Otay Ajaxyay usthay ethay irstfay ofyay Eeksgray eplied)ray 
Ellway asthay outhay okespay; utbay atyay ethay ant’styray amenay 
Myay ageray ekindlesray, andyay myay oul’ssay onyay ameflay: 
’Tis ustjay esentmentray, andyay ecomesbay ethay avebray: 
Isgracedday, ishonour’dday, ikelay ethay ilestvay aveslay! 
Eturnray, enthay, eroeshay! andyay ouryay answeryay earbay, 
Ethay oriousglay ombatcay isyay onay oremay myay arecay; 
Otnay illtay, amidstyay yonyay inkingsay avynay ainslay, 
Ethay oodblay ofyay Eeksgray allshay edyay ethay ablesay ainmay; 
Otnay illtay ethay amesflay, byay Ector’shay uryfay ownthray, 
Onsumecay youryay esselsvay, andyay approachyay myay ownyay; 
Ustjay erethay, ethay impetuousyay omicidehay allshay andstay, 
Erethay easecay ishay attlebay, andyay erethay eelfay ouryay andhay.” 
 
Isthay aidsay, eachyay incepray ayay oubleday obletgay own’dcray, 
Andyay astcay ayay argelay ibationlay onyay ethay oundgray; 
Enthay otay eirthay esselsvay, oughthray ethay oomyglay adesshay, 
Ethay iefschay eturnray; ivineday Ulyssesyay eadslay. 
Eantimemay Achilles’yay avesslay eparedpray ayay edbay, 
Ithway eecesflay, arpetscay, andyay oftsay inenlay eadspray: 
Erethay, illtay ethay acredsay ornmay estoredray ethay ayday, 
Inyay umberslay eetsway ethay everendray Ixphœnay aylay. 
Utbay inyay ishay inneryay enttay, anyay ampleryay acespay, 
Achillesyay eptslay; andyay inyay ishay armway embraceyay 
Airfay Iomededay ofyay ethay Esbianlay aceray. 
Astlay, orfay Atrocluspay asway ethay ouchcay eparedpray, 
Osewhay ightlynay oysjay ethay eauteousbay Iphisyay aredshay; 
Achillesyay otay ishay iendfray onsign’dcay erhay armschay 
Enwhay Osscyray ellfay eforebay ishay onqueringcay armsyay. 
 
Andyay ownay ethay electedyay iefschay omwhay Eecegray adhay entsay, 
Ass’dpay oughthray ethay ostshay, andyay each’dray ethay oyalray enttay. 
Enthay isingray allyay, ithway obletsgay inyay eirthay andshay, 
Ethay eerspay andyay eaderslay ofyay ethay Achaianyay andsbay 
Ail’dhay eirthay eturnray: Atridesyay irstfay egunbay: 
 
“Aysay atwhay uccesssay? ivineday Aertes’lay onsay! 
Achilles’yay ighhay esolvesray eclareday otay allyay: 
Eturnsray ethay iefchay, oryay ustmay ouryay avynay allfay?” 
 
“Eatgray ingkay ofyay ationsnay! (Ithacusyay eplied)ray 
Ix’dfay isyay ishay athwray, unconquer’dyay isyay ishay idepray; 
Ehay ightsslay thyay iendshipfray, thyay oposalspray ornsscay, 
Andyay, usthay imploredyay, ithway iercerfay uryfay urnsbay. 
Otay avesay ouryay armyyay, andyay ouryay eetsflay otay eefray, 
Isyay otnay ishay arecay; utbay eftlay otay Eecegray andyay eethay. 
Youryay eyesyay allshay iewvay, enwhay orningmay aintspay ethay skyay, 
Eneathbay ishay oarsyay ethay iteningwhay illowsbay flyay; 
Usyay ootay ehay idsbay ouryay oarsyay andyay ailssay employyay, 
Ornay opehay ethay allfay ofyay eaven-protectedhay Oytray; 
Orfay Ovejay o’ershadesyay erhay ithway ishay armyay ivineday, 
Inspiresyay erhay arway, andyay idsbay erhay oryglay ineshay. 
Uchsay asway ishay ordway: atwhay urtherfay ehay eclaredday, 
Esethay acredsay eraldshay andyay eatgray Ajaxyay eardhay. 
Utbay Ixphœnay inyay ishay enttay ethay iefchay etainsray, 
Afesay otay ansporttray imhay otay ishay ativenay ainsplay 
Enwhay orningmay awnsday; ifyay otheryay ehay ecreeday, 
Ishay ageyay isyay acredsay, andyay ishay oicechay isyay eefray.” 
 
Ulyssesyay easedcay: ethay eatgray Achaianyay osthay, 
Ithway orrowsay eizedsay, inyay onsternationcay ostlay, 
Attendyay ethay ernstay eplyray. Idestyday okebray 
Ethay eneralgay ilencesay, andyay undauntedyay okespay. 
“Whyay ouldshay eway iftsgay otay oudpray Achillesyay endsay, 
Oryay ivestray ithway ayerspray ishay aughtyhay oulsay otay endbay? 
Ishay ountry’scay oesway ehay oriesglay otay erideday, 
Andyay ayerspray illway urstbay atthay ellingsway earthay ithway idepray. 
Ebay ethay iercefay impulseyay ofyay ishay ageray obey’dyay, 
Ouryay attlesbay etlay imhay oryay esertday oryay aidyay; 
Enthay etlay imhay armyay enwhay Ovejay oryay ehay inkthay itfay: 
Atthay, otay ishay adnessmay, oryay otay Eavenhay ommitcay: 
Atwhay orfay ourselvesyay eway ancay, isyay alwaysyay oursyay; 
Isthay ightnay, etlay ueday epastray efreshray ouryay owerspay; 
(Orfay engthstray onsistscay inyay iritsspay andyay inyay oodblay, 
Andyay osethay areyay owedyay otay enerousgay ineway andyay oodfay;) 
Utbay enwhay ethay osyray essengermay ofyay ayday 
Ikesstray ethay ueblay ountainsmay ithway erhay oldengay ayray, 
Angedray atyay ethay ipsshay, etlay allyay ouryay uadronssqay ineshay 
Inyay amingflay armsyay, ayay ong-extendedlay inelay: 
Inyay ethay eaddray ontfray etlay eatgray Atridesyay andstay, 
Ethay irstfay inyay angerday, asyay inyay ighhay ommandcay.” 
 
Outsshay ofyay acclaimyay ethay isteninglay eroeshay aiseray, 
Enthay eachyay otay Eavenhay ethay ueday ibationslay ayspay; 
Illtay eepslay, escendingday o’eryay ethay entstay, estowsbay 
Ethay atefulgray essingsblay ofyay esiredday eposeray.[214] 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] ACHILLESYAY 
 
 
 
 
OOKBAY Xay. 
 
 
ARGUMENTYAY. 
 
 
ETHAY IGHT-ADVENTURENAY OFYAY IOMEDDAY ANDYAY ULYSSESYAY. 
 
 
Uponyay ethay efusalray ofyay Achillesyay otay eturnray otay ethay armyyay, ethay istressday ofyay 
Agamemnonyay isyay escribedday inyay ethay ostmay ivelylay annermay. Ehay akestay onay estray atthay 
ightnay, utbay assespay oughthray ethay ampcay, awakingyay ethay eaderslay, andyay ontrivingcay 
allyay ossiblepay ethodsmay orfay ethay ublicpay afetysay. Enelausmay, Estornay, Ulyssesyay, 
andyay Iomedday areyay employedyay inyay aisingray ethay estray ofyay ethay aptainscay. Eythay allcay 
ayay ouncilcay ofyay arway, andyay etermineday otay endsay outsscay intoyay ethay enemies’yay ampcay, 
otay earnlay eirthay osturepay, andyay iscoverday eirthay intentionsyay. Iomedday 
undertakesyay isthay azardoushay enterpriseyay, andyay akesmay oicechay ofyay Ulyssesyay orfay 
ishay ompanioncay. Inyay eirthay assagepay eythay urprisesay Olonday, omwhay Ectorhay adhay 
entsay onyay ayay ikelay esignday otay ethay ampcay ofyay ethay Eciansgray. Omfray imhay eythay areyay 
informedyay ofyay ethay ituationsay ofyay ethay Ojantray andyay auxiliaryyay orcesfay, andyay 
articularlypay ofyay Esusrhay, andyay ethay Aciansthray owhay ereway atelylay arrivedyay. Eythay 
asspay onyay ithway uccesssay; illkay Esusrhay, ithway everalsay ofyay ishay officersyay, andyay 
eizesay ethay amousfay orseshay ofyay atthay incepray, ithway ichwhay eythay eturnray inyay 
iumphtray otay ethay ampcay. 
    The amesay ightnay ontinuescay; ethay enescay ieslay inyay ethay otway ampscay. 
 
 
Allyay ightnay ethay iefschay eforebay eirthay esselsvay aylay, 
Andyay ostlay inyay eepslay ethay abourslay ofyay ethay ayday: 
Allyay utbay ethay ingkay: ithway ariousvay oughtsthay oppress’dyay,[215] 
Ishay ountry’scay arescay aylay ollingray inyay ishay eastbray. 
Asyay enwhay byay ightningslay Ove’sjay etherealyay owerpay 
Oretelsfay ethay attlingray ailhay, oryay eightyway owershay, 
Oryay endssay oftsay owssnay otay itenwhay allyay ethay oreshay, 
Oryay idsbay ethay azenbray oatthray ofyay arway otay oarray; 
Byay itsfay oneyay ashflay ucceedssay asyay oneyay expiresyay, 
Andyay eavenhay amesflay ickthay ithway omentarymay iresfay: 
Osay urstingbay equentfray omfray Atrides’yay eastbray, 
Ighssay ollowingfay ighssay ishay inwardyay earsfay onfess’dcay. 
Ownay o’eryay ethay ieldsfay, ejectedday, ehay urveyssay 
Omfray ousandthay Ojantray iresfay ethay ountingmay azeblay; 
Earshay inyay ethay assingpay indway eirthay usicmay owblay, 
Andyay arksmay istinctday ethay oicesvay ofyay ethay oefay. 
Ownay ookinglay ackwardsbay otay ethay eetflay andyay oastcay, 
Anxiousyay ehay orrowssay orfay ethay endangeredyay osthay. 
Ehay endsray ishay airhay, inyay acrificesay otay Ovejay, 
Andyay uessay otay imhay atthay everyay iveslay aboveyay: 
Inlyyay ehay oansgray; ilewhay oryglay andyay espairday 
Ivideday ishay earthay, andyay ageway ayay oubleday arway. 
 
Ayay ousandthay arescay ishay abouringlay eastbray evolvesray; 
Otay eeksay agesay Estornay ownay ethay iefchay esolvesray, 
Ithway imhay, inyay olesomewhay ounselscay, otay ebateday 
Atwhay yetyay emainsray otay avesay ethay afflictedyay atestay. 
Ehay oseray, andyay irstfay ehay astcay ishay antlemay oundray, 
Extnay onyay ishay eetfay ethay iningshay andalssay oundbay; 
Ayay ion’slay yellowyay oilsspay ishay ackbay onceal’dcay; 
Ishay arlikeway andhay ayay ointedpay avelinjay eldhay. 
Eanwhilemay ishay otherbray, ess’dpray ithway equalyay oesway, 
Alikeyay eniedday ethay iftsgay ofyay oftsay eposeray, 
Amentslay orfay Eecegray, atthay inyay ishay ausecay eforebay 
Osay uchmay adhay uffer’dsay andyay ustmay uffersay oremay. 
Ayay eopard’slay ottedspay idehay ishay ouldersshay eadspray: 
Ayay azenbray elmethay itter’dglay onyay ishay eadhay: 
Usthay (Ithway ayay avelinjay inyay ishay and)hay ehay entway 
Otay akeway Atridesyay inyay ethay oyalray enttay. 
Alreadyyay akedway, Atridesyay ehay escriedday, 
Ishay armouryay ucklingbay atyay ishay essel’svay idesay. 
Oyfuljay eythay etmay; ethay Artanspay usthay egunbay: 
“Whyay utspay myay otherbray ishay ightbray armouryay onyay? 
Endssay ehay omesay spyay, amidstyay esethay ilentsay ourshay, 
Otay tryay yonyay ampcay, andyay atchway ethay Ojantray owerspay? 
Utbay aysay, atwhay erohay allshay ustainsay atthay asktay? 
Uchsay oldbay exploitsyay uncommonyay ouragecay askyay; 
Uidelessgay, aloneyay, oughthray ight’snay arkday adeshay otay ogay, 
Andyay idstmay ayay ostilehay ampcay exploreyay ethay oefay.” 
 
Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: “Inyay uchsay istressday eway andstay, 
Onay ulgarvay ounselcay ouryay affairsyay emandday; 
Eecegray otay eservepray, isyay ownay onay easyyay artpay, 
Utbay asksyay ighhay isdomway, eepday esignday, andyay artyay. 
Orfay Ovejay, averseyay, ouryay umblehay ayerpray eniesday, 
Andyay owsbay ishay eadhay otay Ector’shay acrificesay. 
Atwhay eyeyay ashay itness’dway, oryay atwhay earyay elievedbay, 
Inyay oneyay eatgray ayday, byay oneyay eatgray armyay achievedyay, 
Uchsay ondrousway eedsday asyay Ector’shay andhay ashay oneday, 
Andyay eway eheldbay, ethay astlay evolvingray unsay? 
Atwhay onourshay ethay elovedbay ofyay Ovejay adornyay! 
Ungspray omfray onay odgay, andyay ofyay onay oddessgay ornbay; 
Yetyay uchsay ishay actsyay, asyay Eeksgray unbornyay allshay elltay, 
Andyay ursecay ethay attlebay erewhay eirthay athersfay ellfay. 
 
“Ownay eedspay thyay astyhay oursecay alongyay ethay eetflay, 
Erethay allcay eatgray Ajaxyay, andyay ethay incepray ofyay Etecray; 
Ourselfyay otay oaryhay Estornay illway epairray; 
Otay eepkay ethay uardsgay onyay utyday ebay ishay arecay, 
(Orfay Estor’snay influenceyay estbay atthay uarterqay uidesgay, 
Osewhay onsay ithway Erionmay, o’eryay ethay atchway esidespray.”) 
Otay omwhay ethay Artanspay: “Esethay thyay ordersyay ornebay, 
Aysay, allshay Iyay aystay, oryay ithway espatchday eturnray?” 
“Erethay allshay outhay aystay, (Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay epliedray,) 
Elseyay aymay eway issmay otay eetmay, ithoutway ayay uidegay, 
Ethay athspay osay anymay, andyay ethay ampcay osay ideway. 
Illstay, ithway youryay oicevay ethay othfulslay oldierssay aiseray, 
Urgeyay byay eirthay athers’fay amefay eirthay uturefay aisepray. 
Orgetfay eway ownay ouryay atestay andyay oftylay irthbay; 
Otnay itlestay erehay, utbay orksway, ustmay ovepray ouryay orthway. 
Otay abourlay isyay ethay otlay ofyay anmay elowbay; 
Andyay enwhay Ovejay avegay usyay ifelay, ehay avegay usyay oeway.” 
 
Isthay aidsay, eachyay artedpay otay ishay everalsay arescay: 
Ethay ingkay otay Estor’snay ablesay ipshay epairsray; 
Ethay agesay otectorpray ofyay ethay Eeksgray ehay oundfay 
Etch’dstray inyay ishay edbay ithway allyay ishay armsyay aroundyay; 
Ethay arious-colour’dvay arfscay, ethay ieldshay ehay earsray, 
Ethay iningshay elmethay, andyay ethay ointedpay earsspay; 
Ethay eadfuldray eaponsway ofyay ethay arrior’sway ageray, 
Atthay, oldyay inyay armsyay, isdain’dday ethay eacepay ofyay ageyay. 
Enthay, eaninglay onyay ishay andhay ishay atchfulway eadhay, 
Ethay oaryhay onarchmay aisedray ishay eyesyay andyay aidsay: 
 
“Atwhay artyay outhay, eakspay, atthay onyay esignsday unknownyay, 
Ilewhay othersyay eepslay, usthay angeray ethay ampcay aloneyay; 
Eek’stsay outhay omesay iendfray oryay ightlynay entinelsay? 
Andstay offyay, approachyay otnay, utbay thyay urposepay elltay.” 
 
“OYAY onsay ofyay Eleusnay, (Usthay ethay ingkay ejoin’dray,) 
Idepray ofyay ethay Eeksgray, andyay oryglay ofyay thyay indkay! 
Olay, erehay ethay etchedwray Agamemnonyay andsstay, 
Ethay unhappyyay eneralgay ofyay ethay Eciangray andsbay, 
Omwhay Ovejay ecreesday ithway ailyday arescay otay endbay, 
Andyay oesway, atthay onlyyay ithway ishay ifelay allshay endyay! 
Arcescay ancay myay eesknay esethay emblingtray imbslay ustainsay, 
Andyay arcescay myay earthay upportsay itsyay oadlay ofyay ainpay. 
Onay astetay ofyay eepslay esethay eavyhay eyesyay avehay ownknay, 
Onfusedcay, andyay adsay, Iyay anderway usthay aloneyay, 
Ithway earsfay istractedday, ithway onay ix’dfay esignday; 
Andyay allyay myay eople’spay iseriesmay areyay inemay. 
Ifyay aughtyay ofyay useyay thyay akingway oughtsthay uggestsay, 
(Incesay arescay, ikelay inemay, epriveday thyay oulsay ofyay estray,) 
Impartyay thyay ounselcay, andyay assistyay thyay iendfray; 
Ownay etlay usyay ointlyjay otay ethay enchtray escendday, 
Atyay everyyay ategay ethay aintingfay uardgay exciteyay, 
Iredtay ithway ethay oilstay ofyay ayday andyay atchway ofyay ightnay; 
Elseyay aymay ethay uddensay oefay ouryay orksway invadeyay, 
Osay earnay, andyay avour’dfay byay ethay oomyglay adeshay.” 
 
Otay imhay usthay Estornay: “Usttray ethay owerspay aboveyay, 
Ornay inkthay oudpray Ector’shay opeshay onfirm’dcay byay Ovejay: 
Owhay illyay agreeyay ethay iewsvay ofyay ainvay ankindmay, 
Andyay ethay iseway ounselscay ofyay ethay eternalyay indmay! 
Audaciousyay Ectorhay, ifyay ethay odsgay ordainyay 
Atthay eatgray Achillesyay iseray andyay ageray againyay, 
Atwhay oilstay attendyay eethay, andyay atwhay oesway emainray! 
Olay, aithfulfay Estornay thyay ommandcay obeysyay; 
Ethay arecay isyay extnay ouryay otheryay iefschay otay aiseray: 
Ulyssesyay, Iomedday, eway ieflychay eednay; 
Egesmay orfay engthstray, Oïleusyay amedfay orfay eedspay. 
Omesay otheryay ebay espatch’dday ofyay imblernay eetfay, 
Otay osethay alltay ipsshay, emotestray ofyay ethay eetflay, 
Erewhay ielay eatgray Ajaxyay andyay ethay ingkay ofyay Etecray.[216] 
Otay ouseray ethay Artanspay Iyay elfmysay ecreeday; 
Earday asyay ehay isyay otay usyay, andyay earday otay eethay, 
Yetyay ustmay Iyay axtay ishay othslay, atthay aimsclay onay areshay 
Ithway ishay eatgray otherbray inyay ishay artialmay arecay: 
Imhay ityay ehovedbay otay everyyay iefchay otay uesay, 
Eventingpray everyyay artpay erform’dpay byay youyay; 
Orfay ongstray ecessitynay ouryay oilstay emandsday, 
Aimsclay allyay ouryay eartshay, andyay urgesyay allyay ouryay andshay.” 
 
Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: “Ithway everenceray eway allowyay 
Thyay ustjay ebukesray, yetyay earnlay otay arespay emthay ownay: 
Myay enerousgay otherbray isyay ofyay entlegay indkay, 
Ehay eemssay emissray, utbay earsbay ayay aliantvay indmay; 
Oughthray ootay uchmay eferenceday otay ouryay overeignsay aysway, 
Ontentcay otay ollowfay enwhay eway eadlay ethay ayway: 
Utbay ownay, ouryay illsyay industriousyay otay eventpray, 
Onglay ereyay ethay estray ehay oseray, andyay oughtsay myay enttay. 
Ethay iefschay youyay amednay, alreadyyay atyay ishay allcay, 
Eparepray otay eetmay usyay earnay ethay avy-wallnay; 
Assemblingyay erethay, etweenbay ethay enchtray andyay atesgay, 
Earnay ethay ight-guardsnay, ouryay osenchay ouncilcay aitsway.” 
 
“Enthay onenay (Aidsay Estor)nay allshay ishay uleray ithstandway, 
Orfay eatgray examplesyay ustifyjay ommandcay.” 
Ithway atthay, ethay enerablevay arriorway oseray; 
Ethay iningshay eavesgray ishay anlymay egslay encloseyay; 
Ishay urplepay antlemay oldengay ucklesbay oin’djay, 
Armway ithway ethay oftestsay oolway, andyay oublyday inedlay. 
Enthay ushingray omfray ishay enttay, ehay atch’dsnay inyay astehay 
Ishay eelystay ancelay, atthay ighten’dlay asyay ehay ass’dpay. 
Ethay ampcay ehay aversedtray oughthray ethay eepingslay owdcray, 
Opp’dstay atyay Ulysses’yay enttay, andyay all’dcay aloudyay. 
Ulyssesyay, uddensay asyay ethay oicevay asway entsay, 
Awakesyay, artsstay upyay, andyay issuesyay omfray ishay enttay. 
“Atwhay ewnay istressday, atwhay uddensay ausecay ofyay ightfray, 
Usthay eadslay youyay anderingway inyay ethay ilentsay ightnay?” 
“OYAY udentpray iefchay! (Ethay Ianpylay agesay eplied)ray 
Iseway asyay outhay artyay, ebay ownay thyay isdomway iedtray: 
Ateverwhay eansmay ofyay afetysay ancay ebay oughtsay, 
Ateverwhay ounselscay ancay inspireyay ouryay oughtthay, 
Ateverwhay ethodsmay, oryay otay flyay oryay ightfay; 
Allyay, allyay ependday onyay isthay importantyay ightnay!” 
Ehay eardhay, eturn’dray, andyay ooktay ishay aintedpay ieldshay; 
Enthay oin’djay ethay iefschay, andyay ollow’dfay oughthray ethay ieldfay. 
Ithoutway ishay enttay, oldbay Iomedday eythay oundfay, 
Allyay eathedshay inyay armsyay, ishay avebray ompanionscay oundray: 
Eachyay unksay inyay eepslay, extendedyay onyay ethay ieldfay, 
Ishay eadhay ecliningray onyay ishay ossybay ieldshay. 
Ayay oodway ofyay earsspay oodstay byay, atthay, ix’dfay uprightyay, 
Otshay omfray eirthay ashingflay ointspay ayay uiveringqay ightlay. 
Ayay ull’sbay ackblay idehay omposedcay ethay ero’shay edbay; 
Ayay endidsplay arpetcay oll’dray eneathbay ishay eadhay. 
Enthay, ithway ishay ootfay, oldyay Estornay entlygay akesshay 
Ethay umberingslay iefchay, andyay inyay esethay ordsway awakesyay: 
 
“Iseray, onsay ofyay Eustyday! otay ethay avebray andyay ongstray 
Estray eemssay ingloriousyay, andyay ethay ightnay ootay onglay. 
Utbay eep’stslay outhay ownay, enwhay omfray yonyay illhay ethay oefay 
Angshay o’eryay ethay eetflay, andyay adesshay ouryay allsway elowbay?” 
 
Atyay isthay, oftsay umberslay omfray ishay eyelidsyay edflay; 
Ethay arriorway awsay ethay oaryhay iefchay, andyay aidsay: 
“Ondrousway oldyay anmay! osewhay oulsay onay espiteray owsknay, 
Oughthay yearsyay andyay onourshay idbay eethay eeksay eposeray, 
Etlay youngeryay Eeksgray ouryay eepingslay arriorsway akeway; 
Illyay itsfay thyay ageyay esethay oilstay otay undertakeyay.” 
“Myay iendfray, (Ehay answeredyay,) enerousgay isyay thyay arecay; 
Esethay oilstay, myay ubjectssay andyay myay onssay ightmay earbay; 
Eirthay oyallay oughtsthay andyay iouspay ovelay onspirecay 
Otay easeyay ayay overeignsay andyay elieveray ayay iresay: 
Utbay ownay ethay astlay espairday urroundssay ouryay osthay; 
Onay ourhay ustmay asspay, onay omentmay ustmay ebay ostlay; 
Eachyay inglesay Eekgray, inyay isthay onclusivecay ifestray, 
Andsstay onyay ethay arpestshay edgeyay ofyay eathday oryay ifelay: 
Yetyay, ifyay myay yearsyay thyay indkay egardray engageyay, 
Employyay thyay youthyay asyay Iyay employyay myay ageyay; 
Ucceedsay otay esethay myay arescay, andyay ouseray ethay estray; 
Ehay ervessay emay ostmay, owhay ervessay ishay ountrycay estbay.” 
 
Isthay aidsay, ethay erohay o’eryay ishay ouldersshay ungflay 
Ayay ion’slay oilsspay, atthay otay ishay anklesyay unghay; 
Enthay eizedsay ishay onderouspay ancelay, andyay odestray alongyay. 
Egesmay ethay oldbay, ithway Ajaxyay amedfay orfay eedspay, 
Ethay arriorway ousedray, andyay otay ethay entrenchmentsyay eadlay. 
 
Andyay ownay ethay iefschay approachyay ethay ightlynay uardgay; 
Ayay akefulway uadronsqay, eachyay inyay armsyay eparedpray: 
Ethay unweariedyay atchway eirthay isteninglay eaderslay eepkay, 
Andyay, ouchingcay oseclay, epelray invadingyay eepslay. 
Osay aithfulfay ogsday eirthay eecyflay argechay aintainmay, 
Ithway oiltay otectedpray omfray ethay owlingpray aintray; 
Enwhay ethay auntgay ionesslay, ithway ungerhay oldbay, 
Ingsspray omfray ethay ountainsmay owardtay ethay uardedgay oldfay: 
Oughthray eakingbray oodsway erhay ustlingray oursecay eythay earhay; 
Oudlay, andyay oremay oudlay, ethay amoursclay ikestray eirthay earyay 
Ofyay oundshay andyay enmay: eythay artstay, eythay azegay aroundyay, 
Atchway everyyay idesay, andyay urntay otay everyyay oundsay. 
Usthay atch’dway ethay Eciansgray, autiouscay ofyay urprisesay, 
Eachyay oicevay, eachyay otionmay, ewdray eirthay earsyay andyay eyesyay: 
Eachyay epstay ofyay assingpay eetfay increasedyay ethay affrightyay; 
Andyay ostilehay Oytray asway everyay ullfay inyay ightsay. 
Estornay ithway oyjay ethay akefulway andbay urvey’dsay, 
Andyay usthay accostedyay oughthray ethay oomyglay adeshay. 
“’tis ellway, myay onssay! youryay ightlynay arescay employyay; 
Elseyay ustmay ouryay osthay ecomebay ethay ornscay ofyay Oytray. 
Atchway usthay, andyay Eecegray allshay ivelay.” Ethay erohay aidsay; 
Enthay o’eryay ethay enchtray ethay ollowingfay ieftainschay edlay. 
Ishay onsay, andyay odlikegay Erionmay, arch’dmay ehindbay 
(Orfay esethay ethay incespray otay eirthay ouncilcay oin’d)jay. 
Ethay enchestray ass’dpay, ethay assembledyay ingskay aroundyay 
Inyay ilentsay atestay ethay onsistorycay own’dcray. 
Ayay aceplay erethay asway, yetyay undefiledyay ithway oregay, 
Ethay otspay erewhay Ectorhay opp’dstay ishay ageray eforebay; 
Enwhay ightnay escendingday, omfray ishay engefulvay andhay 
Eprievedray ethay elicsray ofyay ethay Eciangray andbay: 
(Ethay ainplay esidebay ithway angledmay orpscay asway eadspray, 
Andyay allyay ishay ogresspray ark’dmay byay eapshay ofyay eadday:) 
Erethay atsay ethay ournfulmay ingskay: enwhay Eleus’nay onsay, 
Ethay ouncilcay openingyay, inyay esethay ordsway egunbay: 
 
“Isyay erethay (Aidsay e)hay ayay iefchay osay eatlygray avebray, 
Ishay ifelay otay azardhay, andyay ishay ountrycay avesay? 
Iveslay erethay ayay anmay, owhay inglysay aresday otay ogay 
Otay yonderyay ampcay, oryay eizesay omesay agglingstray oefay? 
Oryay avour’dfay byay ethay ightnay approachyay osay earnay, 
Eirthay eechspay, eirthay ounselscay, andyay esignsday otay earhay? 
Ifyay otay esiegebay ouryay aviesnay eythay eparepray, 
Oryay Oytray onceyay oremay ustmay ebay ethay eatsay ofyay arway? 
Isthay ouldcay ehay earnlay, andyay otay ouryay eerspay eciteray, 
Andyay asspay unharm’dyay ethay angersday ofyay ethay ightnay; 
Atwhay amefay ereway ishay oughthray allyay ucceedingsay aysday, 
Ilewhay Usphœbay inesshay, oryay enmay avehay onguestay otay aisepray! 
Atwhay iftsgay ishay atefulgray ountrycay ouldway estowbay! 
Atwhay ustmay otnay Eecegray otay erhay elivererday oweyay? 
Ayay ablesay eweyay eachyay eaderlay ouldshay ovidepray, 
Ithway eachyay ayay ablesay ambkinlay byay erhay idesay; 
Atyay everyyay iteray ishay areshay ouldshay ebay increasedyay,
