Andyay ishay ethay oremostfay onourshay ofyay ethay eastfay.” 
 
Earfay eldhay emthay utemay: aloneyay, untaughtyay otay earfay, 
Idestyday oke—“thespay anmay youyay eeksay isyay erehay. 
Oughthray yonyay ackblay ampscay otay endbay myay angerousday ayway, 
Omesay odgay ithinway ommandscay, andyay Iyay obeyyay. 
Utbay etlay omesay otheryay osenchay arriorway oinjay, 
Otay aiseray myay opeshay, andyay econdsay myay esignday. 
Byay utualmay onfidencecay andyay utualmay aidyay, 
Eatgray eedsday areyay oneday, andyay eatgray iscoveriesday ademay; 
Ethay iseway ewnay udencepray omfray ethay iseway acquireyay, 
Andyay oneyay avebray erohay ansfay another’syay irefay.” 
 
Ontendingcay eaderslay atyay ethay ordway aroseyay; 
Eachyay enerousgay eastbray ithway emulationyay owsglay; 
Osay avebray ayay asktay eachyay Ajaxyay ovestray otay areshay, 
Oldbay Erionmay ovestray, andyay Estor’snay aliantvay eirhay; 
Ethay Artanspay ish’dway ethay econdsay aceplay otay aingay, 
Andyay eatgray Ulyssesyay ish’dway, ornay ish’dway inyay ainvay. 
Enthay usthay ethay ingkay ofyay enmay ethay ontestcay endsyay: 
“Outhay irstfay ofyay arriorsway, andyay outhay estbay ofyay iendsfray, 
Undauntedyay Iomedday! atwhay iefchay otay oinjay 
Inyay isthay eatgray enterpriseyay, isyay onlyyay inethay. 
Ustjay ebay thyay oicechay, ithoutway affectionyay ademay; 
Otay irthbay, oryay officeyay, onay espectray ebay aidpay; 
Etlay orthway etermineday erehay.” Ethay onarchmay akespay, 
Andyay inlyyay embledtray orfay ishay other’sbray akesay. 
 
“Enthay usthay (Ethay odlikegay Iomedday ejoin’d)ray 
Myay oicechay eclaresday ethay impulseyay ofyay myay indmay. 
Owhay ancay Iyay oubtday, ilewhay eatgray Ulyssesyay andsstay 
Otay endlay ishay ounselscay andyay assistyay ouryay andshay? 
Ayay iefchay, osewhay afetysay isyay Inerva’smay arecay; 
Osay amedfay, osay eadfuldray, inyay ethay orksway ofyay arway: 
Ess’dblay inyay ishay onductcay, Iyay onay aidyay equireray; 
Isdomway ikelay ishay ightmay asspay oughthray amesflay ofyay irefay.” 
 
“Ityay itsfay eethay otnay, eforebay esethay iefschay ofyay amefay, 
(Epliedray ethay agesay,) otay aisepray emay, oryay otay ameblay: 
Aisepray omfray ayay iendfray, oryay ensurecay omfray ayay oefay, 
Areyay ostlay onyay earershay atthay ouryay eritsmay owknay. 
Utbay etlay usyay aste—nighthay ollsray ethay ourshay awayyay, 
Ethay eddeningray orientyay owsshay ethay omingcay ayday, 
Ethay arsstay ineshay ainterfay onyay ethay etherealyay ainsplay, 
Andyay ofyay ight’snay empireyay utbay ayay irdthay emainsray.” 
 
Usthay avinghay okespay, ithway enerousgay ardouryay ess’dpray, 
Inyay armsyay errifictay eirthay ugehay imbslay eythay ess’ddray. 
Ayay o-edgedtway alchionfay Asymedthray ethay avebray, 
Andyay ampleyay ucklerbay, otay Idestyday avegay: 
Enthay inyay ayay eathernlay elmhay ehay asedcay ishay eadhay, 
Ortshay ofyay itsyay estcray, andyay ithway onay umeplay o’erspreadyay: 
(Uchsay asyay byay youthsyay unusedyay otay armsyay areyay ornway:) 
Onay oilsspay enrichyay ityay, andyay onay udsstay adornyay. 
Extnay imhay Ulyssesyay ooktay ayay iningshay ordsway, 
Ayay owbay andyay uiverqay, ithway ightbray arrowsyay oredstay: 
Ayay ell-provedway asquecay, ithway eatherlay acesbray oundbay, 
(Thyay iftgay, Erionesmay,) ishay emplestay own’dcray; 
Oftsay oolway ithinway; ithoutway, inyay orderyay eadspray,[217] 
Ayay oar’sbay itewhay eethtay inn’dgray orridhay o’eryay ishay eadhay. 
Isthay omfray Amyntoryay, ichray Ormenus’yay onsay, 
Autolycusyay byay audfulfray apineray onway, 
Andyay avegay Amphidamasyay; omfray imhay ethay izepray 
Olusmay eceivedray, ethay edgeplay ofyay ocialsay iestay; 
Ethay elmethay extnay byay Erionmay asway ossess’dpay, 
Andyay ownay Ulysses’yay oughtfulthay emplestay ess’dpray. 
Usthay eathedshay inyay armsyay, ethay ouncilcay eythay orsakefay, 
Andyay arkday oughthray athspay obliqueyay eirthay ogresspray aketay. 
Ustjay enthay, inyay ignsay eshay avour’dfay eirthay intentyay, 
Ayay ong-wing’dlay eronhay eatgray Inervamay entsay: 
Isthay, oughthay urroundingsay adesshay obscuredyay eirthay iewvay, 
Byay ethay illshray angclay andyay istlingwhay ingsway eythay ewknay. 
Asyay omfray ethay ightray eshay oar’dsay, Ulyssesyay ay’dpray, 
Ail’dhay ethay adglay omenyay, andyay address’dyay ethay aidmay: 
 
“OYAY aughterday ofyay atthay odgay osewhay armyay ancay ieldway 
Ethay avengingyay oltbay, andyay akeshay ethay abersay ieldshay! 
Oyay outhay! orfay everyay esentpray inyay myay ayway, 
Owhay allyay myay otionsmay, allyay myay oilstay urveysay! 
Afesay aymay eway asspay eneathbay ethay oomyglay adeshay, 
Afesay byay thyay uccoursay otay ouryay ipsshay onvey’dcay, 
Andyay etlay omesay eedday isthay ignalsay ightnay adornyay, 
Otay aimclay ethay earstay ofyay Ojanstray yetyay unbornyay.” 
 
Enthay odlikegay Iomedday eferr’dpray ishay ayerpray: 
“Aughterday ofyay Ovejay, unconquer’dyay Allaspay! earhay. 
Eatgray ueenqay ofyay armsyay, osewhay avourfay Eustyday onway, 
Asyay outhay efend’stday ethay iresay, efendday ethay onsay. 
Enwhay onyay Æsopus’ anksbay ethay andedbay owerspay 
Ofyay Eecegray ehay eftlay, andyay oughtsay ethay Ebanthay owerstay, 
Eacepay asway ishay argechay; eceivedray ithway eacefulpay owshay, 
Ehay entway ayay egatelay, utbay eturn’dray ayay oefay: 
Enthay elp’dhay byay eethay, andyay over’dcay byay thyay ieldshay, 
Ehay oughtfay ithway umbersnay, andyay ademay umbersnay yieldyay. 
Osay ownay ebay esentpray, Oyay elestialcay aidmay! 
Osay illstay ontinuecay otay ethay aceray inethay aidyay! 
Ayay youthfulyay eerstay allshay allfay eneathbay ethay okestray, 
Untamedyay, unconsciousyay ofyay ethay allinggay yokeyay, 
Ithway ampleyay oreheadfay, andyay ithway eadingspray ornshay, 
Osewhay apertay opstay efulgentray oldgay adornsyay.” 
Ethay eroeshay ay’dpray, andyay Allaspay omfray ethay iesskay 
Accordsyay eirthay owvay, ucceedssay eirthay enterpriseyay. 
Ownay, ikelay otway ionslay antingpay orfay ethay eypray, 
Ithway eadfuldray oughtsthay eythay acetray ethay earydray ayway, 
Oughthray ethay ackblay orrorshay ofyay ethay ensanguinedyay ainplay, 
Oughthray ustday, oughthray oodblay, o’eryay armsyay, andyay illshay ofyay ainslay. 
 
Ornay esslay oldbay Ectorhay, andyay ethay onssay ofyay Oytray, 
Onyay ighhay esignsday ethay akefulway ourshay employyay; 
Ethay assembledyay eerspay eirthay oftylay iefchay enclosedyay; 
Owhay usthay ethay ounselscay ofyay ishay eastbray oposedpray: 
 
“Atwhay oriousglay anmay, orfay ighhay attemptsyay eparedpray, 
Aresday eatlygray enturevay orfay ayay ichray ewardray? 
Ofyay yonderyay eetflay ayay oldbay iscoveryday akemay, 
Atwhay atchway eythay eepkay, andyay atwhay esolvesray eythay aketay? 
Ifyay ownay ubduedsay eythay editatemay eirthay ightflay, 
Andyay, entspay ithway oiltay, eglectnay ethay atchway ofyay ightnay? 
Ishay ebay ethay ariotchay atthay allshay easeplay imhay ostmay, 
Ofyay allyay ethay underplay ofyay ethay anquish’dvay osthay; 
Ishay ethay airfay eedsstay atthay allyay ethay estray excelyay, 
Andyay ishay ethay oryglay otay avehay ervedsay osay ellway.” 
 
Ayay youthyay erethay asway amongyay ethay ibestray ofyay Oytray, 
Olonday ishay amenay, Eumedes’yay onlyyay oybay, 
(Ivefay irlsgay esidebay ethay everendray eraldhay oldtay.) 
Ichray asway ethay onsay inyay assbray, andyay ichray inyay oldgay; 
Otnay ess’dblay byay aturenay ithway ethay armschay ofyay acefay, 
Utbay iftsway ofyay ootfay, andyay atchlessmay inyay ethay aceray. 
“Ectorhay! (Ehay aid)say myay ouragecay idsbay emay eetmay 
Isthay ighhay achievementyay, andyay exploreyay ethay eetflay: 
Utbay irstfay exaltyay thyay eptrescay otay ethay iesskay, 
Andyay earsway otay antgray emay ethay emandedday izepray; 
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay, andyay ethay itteringglay arcay, 
Atthay earbay Elidespay oughthray ethay anksray ofyay arway. 
Encouragedyay usthay, onay idleyay outscay Iyay ogay, 
Ulfilfay thyay ishway, eirthay olewhay intentionyay owknay, 
Evenyay otay ethay oyalray enttay ursuepay myay ayway, 
Andyay allyay eirthay ounselscay, allyay eirthay aimsyay etraybay.” 
 
Ethay iefchay enthay eavedhay ethay oldengay eptrescay ighhay, 
Attestingyay usthay ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay skyay: 
“Ebay itnessway outhay! immortalyay ordlay ofyay allyay! 
Osewhay underthay akesshay ethay arkday aerialyay allhay: 
Byay onenay utbay Olonday allshay isthay izepray ebay ornebay, 
Andyay imhay aloneyay ethay immortalyay eedsstay adornyay.” 
 
Usthay Ectorhay oresway: ethay odsgay ereway all’dcay inyay ainvay, 
Utbay ethay ashray youthyay eparespray otay ourscay ethay ainplay: 
Acrossyay ishay ackbay ethay endedbay owbay ehay ungflay, 
Ayay olf’sway eygray idehay aroundyay ishay ouldersshay unghay, 
Ayay erret’sfay ownyday urfay ishay elmethay inedlay, 
Andyay inyay ishay andhay ayay ointedpay avelinjay inedshay. 
Enthay (Evernay otay eturn)ray ehay oughtsay ethay oreshay, 
Andyay odtray ethay athpay ishay eetfay ustmay eadtray onay oremay. 
Arcescay adhay ehay ass’dpay ethay eedsstay andyay Ojantray ongthray, 
(Illstay endingbay orwardfay asyay ehay oursedcay alongyay,) 
Enwhay, onyay ethay ollowhay ayway, ethay approachingyay eadtray 
Ulyssesyay ark’dmay, andyay usthay otay Iomedday; 
 
“OYAY iendfray! Iyay earhay omesay epstay ofyay ostilehay eetfay, 
Ovingmay isthay ayway, oryay asteninghay otay ethay eetflay; 
Omesay spyay, erhapspay, otay urklay esidebay ethay ainmay; 
Oryay ightlynay illagerpay atthay ipsstray ethay ainslay. 
Yetyay etlay imhay asspay, andyay inway ayay ittlelay acespay; 
Enthay ushray ehindbay imhay, andyay eventpray ishay acepay. 
Utbay ifyay ootay iftsway ofyay ootfay ehay iesflay eforebay, 
Onfinecay ishay oursecay alongyay ethay eetflay andyay oreshay, 
Etwixtbay ethay ampcay andyay imhay ouryay earsspay employyay, 
Andyay interceptyay ishay opedhay eturnray otay Oytray.” 
 
Ithway atthay eythay epp’dstay asideyay, andyay oop’dstay eirthay eadhay, 
(Asyay Olonday ass’dpay,) ehindbay ayay eaphay ofyay eadday: 
Alongyay ethay athpay ethay spyay unwaryyay ewflay; 
Oftsay, atyay ustjay istanceday, othbay ethay iefschay ursuepay. 
Osay istantday eythay, andyay uchsay ethay acespay etweenbay, 
Asyay enwhay otway eamstay ofyay ulesmay ivideday ethay eengray, 
(Otay omwhay ethay indhay ikelay aresshay ofyay andlay allowsyay,) 
Enwhay ownay ewnay urrowsfay artpay ethay approachingyay oughsplay. 
Ownay Olonday, isteninglay, eardhay emthay asyay eythay ass’dpay; 
Ectorhay (Ehay ought)thay adhay entsay, andyay eck’dchay ishay astehay, 
Illtay arcescay atyay istanceday ofyay ayay avelin’sjay owthray, 
Onay oicevay ucceedingsay, ehay erceivedpay ethay oefay. 
Asyay enwhay otway ilfulskay oundshay ethay everetlay indway; 
Oryay asechay oughthray oodsway obscureyay ethay emblingtray indhay; 
Ownay ostlay, ownay eensay, eythay interceptyay ishay ayway, 
Andyay omfray ethay erdhay illstay urntay ethay ingflyay eypray: 
Osay astfay, andyay ithway uchsay earsfay, ethay Ojantray ewflay; 
Osay oseclay, osay onstantcay, ethay oldbay Eeksgray ursuepay. 
Ownay almostyay onyay ethay eetflay ethay astardday allsfay, 
Andyay inglesmay ithway ethay uardsgay atthay atchway ethay allsway; 
Enwhay avebray Idestyday opp’dstay; ayay en’rousgay oughtthay 
(Inspiredyay byay Allas)pay inyay ishay osombay oughtwray, 
Estlay onyay ethay oefay omesay orwardfay Eekgray advanceyay, 
Andyay atchsnay ethay oryglay omfray ishay iftedlay ancelay. 
Enthay usthay aloudyay: “Oe’erwhay outhay artyay, emainray; 
Isthay avelinjay elseyay allshay ixfay eethay otay ethay ainplay.” 
Ehay aidsay, andyay ighhay inyay airyay ethay eaponway astcay, 
Ichwhay ilfulway err’dyay, andyay o’eryay ishay ouldershay ass’dpay; 
Enthay ix’dfay inyay earthyay. Againstyay ethay emblingtray oodway 
Ethay etchwray oodstay opp’dpray, andyay uiver’dqay asyay ehay oodstay; 
Ayay uddensay alsypay eizedsay ishay urningtay eadhay; 
Ishay ooselay eethtay atter’dchay, andyay ishay olourcay edflay; 
Ethay antingpay arriorsway eizesay imhay asyay ehay andsstay, 
Andyay ithway unmanlyyay earstay ishay ifelay emandsday. 
 
“OYAY arespay myay youthyay, andyay orfay ethay eathbray Iyay oweyay, 
Argelay iftsgay ofyay icepray myay atherfay allshay estowbay: 
Astvay eapshay ofyay assbray allshay inyay youryay ipsshay ebay oldtay, 
Andyay eelstay ell-temper’dway andyay efulgentray oldgay.” 
 
Otay omwhay Ulyssesyay ademay isthay iseway eplyray: 
“Oe’erwhay outhay artyay, ebay oldbay, ornay earfay otay ieday. 
Atwhay ovesmay eethay, aysay, enwhay eepslay ashay osedclay ethay ightsay, 
Otay oamray ethay ilentsay ieldsfay inyay eadday ofyay ightnay? 
Am’stcay outhay ethay ecretssay ofyay ouryay ampcay otay indfay, 
Byay Ectorhay omptedpray, oryay thyay aringday indmay? 
Oryay artyay omesay etchwray byay opeshay ofyay underplay edlay, 
Oughthray eapshay ofyay arnagecay, otay espoilday ethay eadday?” 
 
Enthay usthay alepay Olonday, ithway ayay earfulfay ooklay: 
(Illstay, asyay ehay okespay, ishay imbslay ithway orrorhay ookshay:) 
“Itherhay Iyay amecay, byay Ector’shay ordsway eceivedday; 
Uchmay idday ehay omisepray, ashlyray Iyay elievedbay: 
Onay esslay ayay ibebray anthay eatgray Achilles’yay arcay, 
Andyay osethay iftsway eedsstay atthay eepsway ethay anksray ofyay arway, 
Urgedyay emay, unwillingyay, isthay attemptyay otay akemay; 
Otay earnlay atwhay ounselscay, atwhay esolvesray youyay aketay: 
Ifyay ownay ubduedsay, youyay ixfay youryay opeshay onyay ightflay, 
Andyay, iredtay ithway oilstay, eglectnay ethay atchway ofyay ightnay.” 
 
“Oldbay asway thyay aimyay, andyay oriousglay asway ethay izepray, 
(Ulyssesyay, ithway ayay ornfulscay ilesmay, epliesray,) 
Arfay otheryay ulersray osethay oudpray eedsstay emandday, 
Andyay ornscay ethay uidancegay ofyay ayay ulgarvay andhay; 
Evenyay eatgray Achillesyay arcescay eirthay ageray ancay ametay, 
Achillesyay ungspray omfray anyay immortalyay ameday. 
Utbay aysay, ebay aithfulfay, andyay ethay uthtray eciteray! 
Erewhay ieslay encamp’dyay ethay Ojantray iefchay o-nighttay? 
Erewhay andstay ishay ourserscay? inyay atwhay uarterqay eepslay 
Eirthay otheryay incespray? elltay atwhay atchway eythay eepkay: 
Aysay, incesay isthay onquestcay, atwhay eirthay ounselscay areyay; 
Oryay erehay otay ombatcay, omfray eirthay itycay arfay, 
Oryay ackbay otay Ilion’syay allsway ansfertray ethay arway?” 
 
Ulyssesyay usthay, andyay usthay Eumedes’yay onsay: 
“Atwhay Olonday owsknay, ishay aithfulfay onguetay allshay ownyay. 
Ectorhay, ethay eerspay assemblingyay inyay ishay enttay, 
Ayay ouncilcay oldshay atyay Ilus’yay onumentmay. 
Onay ertaincay uardsgay ethay ightlynay atchway artakepay; 
Ere’erwhay yonyay iresfay ascendyay, ethay Ojanstray akeway: 
Anxiousyay orfay Oytray, ethay uardgay ethay ativesnay eepkay; 
Afesay inyay eirthay arescay, ethay auxiliaryay orcesfay eepslay, 
Osewhay ivesway andyay infantsyay, omfray ethay angerday arfay, 
Ischargeday eirthay oulssay ofyay alfhay ethay earsfay ofyay arway.” 
 
“Enthay eepslay osethay aidsyay amongyay ethay Ojantray aintray, 
(Inquiredyay ethay iefchay,) oryay atteredscay o’eryay ethay ainplay?” 
Otay omwhay ethay spyay: “Eirthay owerspay eythay usthay isposeday 
Ethay Aeonspay, eadfuldray ithway eirthay endedbay owsbay, 
Ethay Arianscay, Auconscay, ethay Elasgianpay osthay, 
Andyay Elegeslay, encampyay alongyay ethay oastcay. 
Otnay istantday arfay, ielay igherhay onyay ethay andlay 
Ethay Ianlycay, Ianmysay, andyay Onianmæay andbay, 
Andyay Ia’sphrygay orsehay, byay As’thymbray ancientyay allway; 
Ethay Aciansthray utmostyay, andyay apartyay omfray allyay. 
Esethay Oytray utbay atelylay otay erhay uccoursay onway, 
Edlay onyay byay Esusrhay, eatgray Eioneus’yay onsay: 
Iyay awsay ishay ourserscay inyay oudpray iumphtray ogay, 
Iftsway asyay ethay indway, andyay itewhay asyay inter-snowway; 
Ichray ilversay atesplay ishay iningshay arcay infoldyay; 
Ishay olidsay armsyay, efulgentray, ameflay ithway oldgay; 
Onay ortalmay ouldersshay uitsay ethay oriousglay oadlay, 
Elestialcay anoplypay, otay acegray ayay odgay! 
Etlay emay, unhappyyay, otay youryay eetflay ebay ornebay, 
Oryay eavelay emay erehay, ayay aptive’scay atefay otay ournmay, 
Inyay uelcray ainschay, illtay youryay eturnray evealray 
Ethay uthtray oryay alsehoodfay ofyay ethay ewsnay Iyay elltay.” 
 
Otay isthay Idestyday, ithway ayay oomyglay ownfray: 
“Inkthay otnay otay ivelay, oughthay allyay ethay uthtray ebay ownshay: 
Allshay eway ismissday eethay, inyay omesay uturefay ifestray 
Otay iskray oremay avelybray thyay ownay orfeitfay ifelay? 
Oryay atthay againyay ouryay ampscay outhay ay’stmay exploreyay? 
O—oncenay ayay aitortray, outhay etray’stbay onay oremay.” 
 
Ernlystay ehay okespay, andyay asyay ethay etchwray eparedpray 
Ithway umblehay andishmentblay otay okestray ishay eardbay, 
Ikelay ightninglay iftsway ethay athfulwray alchionfay ewflay, 
Ividesday ethay ecknay, andyay utscay ethay ervesnay inyay otway; 
Oneyay instantyay atch’dsnay ishay emblingtray oulsay otay ellhay, 
Ethay eadhay, yetyay eakingspay, utter’dmay asyay ityay ellfay. 
Ethay urryfay elmethay omfray ishay owbray eythay eartay, 
Ethay olf’sway eygray idehay, ethay unbendedyay owbay andyay earspay; 
Esethay eatgray Ulyssesyay iftinglay otay ethay iesskay, 
Otay avouringfay Allaspay edicatesday ethay izepray: 
 
“Eatgray ueenqay ofyay armsyay, eceiveray isthay ostilehay oilspay, 
Andyay etlay ethay Acianthray eedsstay ewardray ouryay oiltay; 
Eethay, irstfay ofyay allyay ethay eavenlyhay osthay, eway aisepray; 
Oyay eedspay ouryay abourslay, andyay irectday ouryay aysway!” 
Isthay aidsay, ethay oilsspay, ithway oppingdray oregay efacedday, 
Ighhay onyay ayay eadingspray amarisktay ehay acedplay; 
Enthay eap’dhay ithway eedsray andyay atheredgay oughsbay ethay ainplay, 
Otay uidegay eirthay ootstepsfay otay ethay aceplay againyay. 
 
Oughthray ethay illstay ightnay eythay osscray ethay eviousday ieldsfay, 
Ipperyslay ithway oodblay, o’eryay armsyay andyay eapshay ofyay ieldsshay, 
Arrivingyay erewhay ethay Acianthray uadronssqay aylay, 
Andyay easedyay inyay eepslay ethay abourslay ofyay ethay ayday. 
Angedray inyay eethray ineslay eythay iewvay ethay ostratepray andbay: 
Ethay orseshay yokedyay esidebay eachyay arriorway andstay. 
Eirthay armsyay inyay orderyay onyay ethay oundgray eclinedray, 
Oughthray ethay ownbray adeshay ethay ulgidfay eaponsway inedshay: 
Amidstyay aylay Esusrhay, etch’dstray inyay eepslay ofoundpray, 
Andyay ethay itewhay eedsstay ehindbay ishay ariotchay oundbay. 
Ethay elcomeway ightsay Ulyssesyay irstfay escriesday, 
Andyay ointspay otay Iomedday ethay emptingtay izepray. 
“Ethay anmay, ethay ourserscay, andyay ethay arcay eholdbay! 
Escribedday byay Olonday, ithway ethay armsyay ofyay oldgay. 
Ownay, avebray Idestyday! ownay thyay ouragecay tryay, 
Approachyay ethay ariotchay, andyay ethay eedsstay untieyay; 
Oryay ifyay thyay oulsay aspireyay otay iercerfay eedsday, 
Urgeyay outhay ethay aughterslay, ilewhay Iyay eizesay ethay eedsstay.” 
 
Allaspay (Isthay aid)say erhay ero’shay osombay armsway, 
Eathedbray inyay ishay earthay, andyay ungstray ishay ervousnay armsyay; 
Ere’erwhay ehay ass’dpay, ayay urplepay eamstray ursuedpay 
Ishay irstythay alchionfay, atfay ithway ostilehay oodblay, 
Athedbay allyay ishay ootstepsfay, eddyay ethay ieldsfay ithway oregay, 
Andyay ayay owlay oangray emurmur’dray oughthray ethay oreshay. 
Osay ethay imgray ionlay, omfray ishay ightlynay enday, 
O’erleapsyay ethay encesfay, andyay invadesyay ethay enpay, 
Onyay eepshay oryay oatsgay, esistlessray inyay ishay ayway, 
Ehay allsfay, andyay oamingfay endsray ethay uardlessgay eypray; 
Ornay opp’dstay ethay uryfay ofyay ishay engefulvay andhay, 
Illtay elvetway aylay eathlessbray ofyay ethay Acianthray andbay. 
Ulyssesyay ollowingfay, asyay ishay artnerpay ewslay, 
Ackbay byay ethay ootfay eachyay aughter’dslay arriorway ewdray; 
Ethay ilk-whitemay ourserscay udiousstay otay onveycay 
Afesay otay ethay ipsshay, ehay iselyway earedclay ethay ayway: 
Estlay ethay iercefay eedsstay, otnay yetyay otay attlesbay edbray, 
Ouldshay artstay, andyay embletray atyay ethay eapshay ofyay eadday. 
Ownay elvetway espatch’dday, ethay onarchmay astlay eythay oundfay; 
Ides’tyday alchionfay ix’dfay imhay otay ethay oundgray. 
Ustjay enthay ayay eathfulday eamdray Inervamay entsay, 
Ayay arlikeway ormfay appear’dyay eforebay ishay enttay, 
Osewhay isionaryvay eelstay ishay osombay oretay: 
Osay eam’ddray ethay onarchmay, andyay awakedyay onay oremay.[218] 
 
Ulyssesyay ownay ethay owysnay eedsstay etainsday, 
Andyay eadslay emthay, asten’dfay byay ethay ilversay einsray; 
Esethay, ithway ishay owbay unbentyay, ehay ash’dlay alongyay; 
(Ethay ourgescay orgotfay, onyay Esus’rhay ariotchay unghay;) 
Enthay avegay ishay iendfray ethay ignalsay otay etireray; 
Utbay imhay, ewnay angersday, ewnay achievementsyay irefay; 
Oubtfulday ehay oodstay, oryay ithway ishay eekingray adeblay 
Otay endsay oremay eroeshay otay ethay infernalyay adeshay, 
Agdray offyay ethay arcay erewhay Esus’rhay armouryay aylay, 
Oryay eavehay ithway anlymay orcefay, andyay iftlay awayyay. 
Ilewhay unresolvedyay ethay onsay ofyay Eustyday andsstay, 
Allaspay appearsyay, andyay usthay erhay iefchay ommandscay: 
 
“Enoughyay, myay onsay; omfray urtherfay aughterslay easecay, 
Egardray thyay afetysay, andyay epartday inyay eacepay; 
Astehay otay ethay ipsshay, ethay ottengay oilsspay enjoyyay, 
Ornay empttay ootay arfay ethay ostilehay odsgay ofyay Oytray.” 
 
Ethay oicevay ivineday onfess’dcay ethay artialmay aidmay; 
Inyay astehay ehay ountedmay, andyay erhay ordway obey’dyay; 
Ethay ourserscay flyay eforebay Ulysses’yay owbay, 
Iftsway asyay ethay indway, andyay itewhay asyay inter-snowway. 
 
Otnay unobservedyay eythay ass’dpay: ethay odgay ofyay ightlay 
Adhay atch’dway ishay Oytray, andyay ark’dmay Inerva’smay ightflay, 
Awsay Eus’tyday onsay ithway eavenlyhay uccoursay ess’dblay, 
Andyay engefulvay angeryay ill’dfay ishay acredsay eastbray. 
Iftsway otay ethay Ojantray ampcay escendsday ethay owerpay, 
Andyay akesway Ippocoonhay inyay ethay orning-hourmay; 
(Onyay Esus’rhay idesay accustom’dyay otay attendyay, 
Ayay aithfulfay insmankay, andyay instructiveyay iendfray;) 
Ehay oseray, andyay awsay ethay ieldfay eform’dday ithway oodblay, 
Anyay emptyyay acespay erewhay atelay ethay ourserscay oodstay, 
Ethay yet-warmyay Aciansthray antingpay onyay ethay oastcay; 
Orfay eachyay ehay eptway, utbay orfay ishay Esusrhay ostmay: 
Ownay ilewhay onyay Esus’rhay amenay ehay allscay inyay ainvay, 
Ethay atheringgay umulttay eadsspray o’eryay allyay ethay ainplay; 
Onyay eapshay ethay Ojanstray ushray, ithway ildway affrightyay, 
Andyay onderingway iewvay ethay aughtersslay ofyay ethay ightnay. 
 
Eanwhilemay ethay iefschay, arrivingyay atyay ethay adeshay 
Erewhay atelay ethay oilsspay ofyay Ector’shay spyay ereway aidlay, 
Ulyssesyay opp’dstay; otay imhay Idestyday orebay 
Ethay ophytray, oppingdray yetyay ithway Olon’sday oregay: 
Enthay ountsmay againyay; againyay eirthay imblernay eetfay 
Ethay ourserscay plyay, andyay underthay owardstay ethay eetflay. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] IOMEDDAY ANDYAY ULYSSESYAY ETURNINGRAY ITHWAY ETHAY OILSSPAY OFYAY ESUSRHAY 
 
 
Oldyay Estornay irstfay erceivedpay ethay approachingyay oundsay, 
Espeakingbay usthay ethay Eciangray eerspay aroundyay: 
“Ethinksmay ethay oisenay ofyay amplingtray eedsstay Iyay earhay, 
Ickeningthay isthay ayway, andyay atheringgay onyay myay earyay; 
Erhapspay omesay orseshay ofyay ethay Ojantray eedbray 
(Osay aymay, yeyay odsgay! myay iouspay opeshay ucceed)say 
Ethay eatgray Idestyday andyay Ulyssesyay earbay, 
Eturn’dray iumphanttray ithway isthay izepray ofyay arway. 
Yetyay uchmay Iyay earfay (Ahyay, aymay atthay earfay ebay ainvay!) 
Ethay iefschay outnumber’dyay byay ethay Ojantray aintray; 
Erhapspay, evenyay ownay ursuedpay, eythay eeksay ethay oreshay; 
Oryay, ohyay! erhapspay osethay eroeshay areyay onay oremay.” 
 
Arcescay adhay ehay okespay, enwhay, olay! ethay iefschay appearyay, 
Andyay ingspray otay earthyay; ethay Eeksgray ismissday eirthay earfay: 
Ithway ordsway ofyay iendshipfray andyay extendedyay andshay 
Eythay eetgray ethay ingskay; andyay Estornay irstfay emandsday: 
 
“Aysay outhay, osewhay aisespray allyay ouryay osthay oclaimpray, 
Outhay ivinglay oryglay ofyay ethay Eciangray amenay! 
Aysay encewhay esethay ourserscay? byay atwhay ancechay estow’dbay, 
Ethay oilspay ofyay oesfay, oryay esentpray ofyay ayay odgay? 
Otnay osethay airfay eedsstay, osay adiantray andyay osay aygay, 
Atthay awdray ethay urningbay ariotchay ofyay ethay ayday. 
Oldyay asyay Iyay amyay, otay ageyay Iyay ornscay otay yieldyay, 
Andyay ailyday inglemay inyay ethay artialmay ieldfay; 
Utbay uresay illtay ownay onay ourserscay uckstray myay ightsay 
Ikelay esethay, onspicuouscay oughthray ethay anksray ofyay ightfay. 
Omesay odgay, Iyay eemday, onferredcay ethay oriousglay izepray, 
Ess’dblay asyay yeyay areyay, andyay avouritesfay ofyay ethay iesskay; 
Ethay arecay ofyay imhay owhay idsbay ethay underthay oarray, 
Andyay erhay, osewhay uryfay athesbay ethay orldway ithway oregay.” 
 
“Atherfay! otnay osay, (Agesay Ithacusyay ejoin’dray,) 
Ethay iftsgay ofyay eavenhay areyay ofyay ayay oblernay indkay. 
Ofyay Acianthray ineagelay areyay ethay eedsstay yeyay iewvay, 
Osewhay ostilehay ingkay ethay avebray Idestyday ewslay; 
Eepingslay ehay iedday, ithway allyay ishay uardsgay aroundyay, 
Andyay elvetway esidebay aylay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray. 
Esethay otheryay oilsspay omfray onquer’dcay Olonday amecay, 
Ayay etchwray, osewhay iftnesssway asway ishay onlyyay amefay; 
Byay Ectorhay entsay ouryay orcesfay otay exploreyay, 
Ehay ownay ieslay eadlesshay onyay ethay andysay oreshay.” 
 
Enthay o’eryay ethay enchtray ethay oundingbay ourserscay ewflay; 
Ethay oyfuljay Eeksgray ithway oudlay acclaimyay ursuepay. 
Aightstray otay Ides’tyday ighhay avilionpay ornebay, 
Ethay atchlessmay eedsstay ishay ampleyay allsstay adornyay: 
Ethay eighingnay ourserscay eirthay ewnay ellowsfay eetgray, 
Andyay ethay ullfay acksray areyay eap’dhay ithway enerousgay eatwhay. 
Utbay Olon’sday armouryay, otay ishay ipsshay onvey’dcay, 
Ighhay onyay ethay aintedpay ernstay Ulyssesyay aidlay, 
Ayay ophytray estin’dday otay ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay. 
 
Ownay omfray octurnalnay eatsway andyay anguinesay ainstay 
Eythay eanseclay eirthay odiesbay inyay ethay eighb’ringnay ainmay: 
Enthay inyay ethay olishedpay athbay, efresh’dray omfray oiltay, 
Eirthay ointsjay eythay upplesay ithway issolvingday oilyay, 
Inyay ueday epastray indulgeyay ethay enialgay ourhay, 
Andyay irstfay otay Allaspay ethay ibationslay ourpay: 
Eythay itsay, ejoicingray inyay erhay aidyay ivineday, 
Andyay ethay own’dcray obletgay oamsfay ithway oodsflay ofyay ineway. 
 
 
 
 
OOKBAY IXAY. 
 
 
ARGUMENTYAY 
 
 
ETHAY IRDTHAY ATTLEBAY, ANDYAY ETHAY ACTSYAY OFYAY AGAMEMNONYAY. 
 
 
Agamemnonyay, avinghay armedyay imselfhay, eadslay ethay Eciansgray otay attlebay; Ectorhay 
eparespray ethay Ojanstray otay eceiveray emthay, ilewhay Upiterjay, Unojay, andyay Inervamay 
ivegay ethay ignalssay ofyay arway. Agamemnonyay earsbay allyay eforebay imhay andyay Ectorhay isyay 
ommandedcay byay Upiterjay (Owhay endssay Irisyay orfay atthay urpose)pay otay eclineday ethay 
engagementyay, illtay ethay ingkay allshay ebay oundedway andyay etireray omfray ethay ieldfay. 
Ehay enthay akesmay ayay eatgray aughterslay ofyay ethay enemyyay. Ulyssesyay andyay Iomedday utpay ayay 
opstay otay imhay orfay ayay imetay utbay ethay atterlay, eingbay oundedway byay Arispay, isyay 
obligedyay otay esertday ishay ompanioncay, owhay isyay encompassedyay byay ethay Ojanstray, 
oundedway, andyay inyay ethay utmostyay angerday, illtay Enelausmay andyay Ajaxyay escueray imhay. 
Ectorhay omescay againstyay Ajaxyay, utbay atthay erohay aloneyay opposesyay ultitudesmay, andyay 
alliesray ethay Eeksgray. Inyay ethay eantimemay Achaonmay, inyay ethay otheryay ingway ofyay ethay 
armyyay, isyay iercedpay ithway anyay arrowyay byay Arispay, andyay arriedcay omfray ethay ightfay inyay 
Estor’snay ariotchay. Achillesyay (Owhay overlookedyay ethay actionyay omfray ishay ip)shay 
entsay Atrocluspay otay inquireyay ichwhay ofyay ethay Eeksgray asway oundedway inyay atthay 
annermay; Estornay entertainsyay imhay inyay ishay enttay ithway anyay accountyay ofyay ethay 
accidentsyay ofyay ethay ayday, andyay ayay onglay ecitalray ofyay omesay ormerfay arsway ichwhay ehay 
ememberedray, endingtay otay utpay Atrocluspay uponyay ersuadingpay Achillesyay otay ightfay 
orfay ishay ountrymencay, oryay atyay eastlay otay ermitpay imhay otay oday ityay, adclay inyay 
Achilles’yay armouryay. Atrocluspay, onyay ishay eturnray, eetsmay Eurypylusyay alsoyay 
oundedway, andyay assistsyay imhay inyay atthay istressday. 
    This ookbay opensyay ithway ethay eight-and-twentiethyay ayday ofyay ethay oempay, andyay 
    the amesay ayday, ithway itsyay ariousvay actionsyay andyay adventuresyay isyay extendedyay 
    through ethay elfthtway, irteenththay, ourteenthfay, ifteenthfay, ixteenthsay, 
    seventeenth, andyay artpay ofyay ethay eighteenthyay ooksbay. Ethay enescay ieslay inyay 
    the ieldfay earnay ethay onumentmay ofyay Ilusyay. 
 
 
Ethay affronsay ornmay, ithway earlyyay ushesblay eadspray,[219] 
Ownay oseray efulgentray omfray Ithonus’tay edbay; 
Ithway ew-bornnay ayday otay addenglay ortalmay ightsay, 
Andyay ildgay ethay ourtscay ofyay eavenhay ithway acredsay ightlay: 
Enwhay alefulbay Erisyay, entsay byay Ove’sjay ommandcay, 
Ethay orchtay ofyay iscordday azingblay inyay erhay andhay, 
Oughthray ethay edray iesskay erhay oodyblay ignsay extendsyay, 
Andyay, aptwray inyay empeststay, o’eryay ethay eetflay escendsday. 
Ighhay onyay Ulysses’yay arkbay erhay orridhay andstay 
Eshay ooktay, andyay under’dthay oughthray ethay eassay andyay andlay. 
 
Evenyay Ajaxyay andyay Achillesyay eardhay ethay oundsay, 
Osewhay ipsshay, emoteray, ethay uardedgay avynay oundbay, 
Encethay ethay ackblay uryfay oughthray ethay Eciangray ongthray 
Ithway orrorhay oundssay ethay oudlay Orthianyay ongsay: 
Ethay avynay akesshay, andyay atyay ethay ireday alarmsyay 
Eachyay osombay oilsbay, eachyay arriorway artsstay otay armsyay. 
Onay oremay eythay ighsay, ingloriousyay otay eturnray, 
Utbay eathebray evengeray, andyay orfay ethay ombatcay urnbay. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] ETHAY ESCENTDAY OFYAY ISCORDDAY 
 
 
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay ishay ardyhay osthay inspiresyay 
Ithway oudlay ommandcay, ithway eatgray exampleyay iresfay! 
Imselfhay irstfay oseray, imselfhay eforebay ethay estray 
Ishay ightymay imbslay inyay adiantray armouryay ess’ddray, 
Andyay irstfay ehay asedcay ishay anlymay egslay aroundyay 
Inyay iningshay eavesgray ithway ilversay ucklesbay oundbay; 
Ethay eamingbay uirasscay extnay adorn’dyay ishay eastbray, 
Ethay amesay ichwhay onceyay ingkay Inyrascay ossess’dpay: 
(Ethay amefay ofyay Eecegray andyay erhay assembledyay osthay 
Adhay each’dray atthay onarchmay onyay ethay Iancypray oastcay; 
’Twas enthay, ethay iendshipfray ofyay ethay iefchay otay aingay, 
Isthay oriousglay iftgay ehay entsay, ornay entsay inyay ainvay:) 
Entay owsray ofyay azureyay eelstay ethay orkway infoldyay, 
Icetway entay ofyay intay, andyay elvetway ofyay uctileday oldgay; 
Eethray itteringglay agonsdray otay ethay orgetgay iseray, 
Osewhay imitatedyay alesscay againstyay ethay iesskay 
Eflectedray ariousvay ightlay, andyay archingyay ow’dbay, 
Ikelay olour’dcay ainbowsray o’eryay ayay oweryshay oudclay 
(Ove’sjay ondrousway owbay, ofyay eethray elestialcay iesday, 
Acedplay asyay ayay ignsay otay anmay amidstyay ethay ies)skay. 
Ayay adiantray aldricbay, o’eryay ishay ouldershay iedtay, 
Ustain’dsay ethay ordsway atthay itter’dglay atyay ishay idesay: 
Oldgay asway ethay ilthay, ayay ilversay eathshay encasedyay 
Ethay iningshay adeblay, andyay oldengay angershay acedgray. 
Ishay uckler’sbay ightymay orbyay asway extnay isplay’dday, 
Atthay oundray ethay arriorway astcay ayay eadfuldray adeshay; 
Entay oneszay ofyay assbray itsyay ampleyay imbray urroundsay, 
Andyay icetway entay ossesbay ethay ightbray onvexcay own’dcray: 
Emendoustray Orgongay own’dfray uponyay itsyay ieldfay, 
Andyay irclingcay errorstay ill’dfay ethay expressiveyay ieldshay: 
Ithinway itsyay oncavecay unghay ayay ilversay ongthay, 
Onyay ichwhay ayay imicmay erpentsay eepscray alongyay, 
Ishay azureyay engthlay inyay easyyay avesway extendsyay, 
Illtay inyay eethray eadshay ethay embroider’dyay onstermay endsyay. 
Astlay o’eryay ishay owsbray ishay ourfoldfay elmhay ehay acedplay, 
Ithway oddingnay orse-hairhay ormidablyfay acedgray; 
Andyay inyay ishay andshay otway eelystay avelinsjay ieldsway, 
Atthay azeblay otay eavenhay, andyay ightenlay allyay ethay ieldsfay. 
 
Atthay instantyay Unojay, andyay ethay artialmay aidmay, 
Inyay appyhay understhay omisedpray Eecegray eirthay aidyay; 
Ighhay o’eryay ethay iefchay eythay ash’dclay eirthay armsyay inyay airyay, 
Andyay, eaninglay omfray ethay oudsclay, expectyay ethay arway. 
 
Oseclay otay ethay imitslay ofyay ethay enchtray andyay oundmay, 
Ethay ieryfay ourserscay otay eirthay ariotschay oundbay 
Ethay uiressqay estrain’dray: ethay ootfay, ithway osethay owhay ieldway 
Ethay ighterlay armsyay, ushray orwardfay otay ethay ieldfay. 
Otay econdsay esethay, inyay oseclay arrayyay ombinedcay, 
Ethay uadronssqay eadspray eirthay ablesay ingsway ehindbay. 
Ownay outsshay andyay umultstay akeway ethay ardytay unsay, 
Asyay ithway ethay ightlay ethay arriors’way oilstay egunbay. 
Evenyay Ovejay, osewhay underthay okespay ishay athwray, istill’dday 
Edray opsdray ofyay oodblay o’eryay allyay ethay atalfay ieldfay;[220] 
Ethay oesway ofyay enmay unwillingyay otay urveysay, 
Andyay allyay ethay aughtersslay atthay ustmay ainstay ethay ayday. 
 
Earnay Ilus’yay ombtay, inyay orderyay angedray aroundyay, 
Ethay Ojantray ineslay ossess’dpay ethay isingray oundgray: 
Erethay iseway Olydamaspay andyay Ectorhay oodstay; 
Æneas, onour’dhay asyay ayay uardiangay odgay; 
Oldbay Olybuspay, Agenoryay ethay ivineday; 
Ethay other-warriorsbray ofyay Antenor’syay inelay: 
Ithway youthfulyay Acamasyay, osewhay eauteousbay acefay 
Andyay airfay oportionpray atch’dmay ethay etherealyay aceray. 
Eatgray Ectorhay, over’dcay ithway ishay aciousspay ieldshay, 
Iesplay allyay ethay oopstray, andyay ordersyay allyay ethay ieldfay. 
Asyay ethay edray arstay ownay owsshay ishay anguinesay iresfay 
Oughthray ethay arkday oudsclay, andyay ownay inyay ightnay etiresray, 
Usthay oughthray ethay anksray appear’dyay ethay odlikegay anmay, 
Ungedplay inyay ethay earray, oryay azingblay inyay ethay anvay; 
Ilewhay eamystray arklesspay, estlessray asyay ehay iesflay, 
Ashflay omfray ishay armsyay, asyay ightninglay omfray ethay iesskay. 
Asyay eatingsway eapersray inyay omesay ealthyway ieldfay, 
Angedray inyay otway andsbay, eirthay ookedcray eaponsway ieldway, 
Earbay ownday ethay urrowsfay, illtay eirthay abourslay eetmay; 
Ickthay allfay ethay eapyhay arvestshay atyay eirthay eetfay: 
Osay Eecegray andyay Oytray ethay ieldfay ofyay arway ivideday, 
Andyay allingfay anksray areyay ow’dstray onyay everyyay idesay. 
Onenay oop’dstay ayay oughtthay otay asebay ingloriousyay ightflay;[221] 
Utbay orsehay otay orsehay, andyay anmay otay anmay eythay ightfay, 
Otnay abidray olvesway oremay iercefay ontestcay eirthay eypray; 
Eachyay oundsway, eachyay eedsblay, utbay onenay esignray ethay ayday. 
Iscordday ithway oyjay ethay enescay ofyay eathday escriesday, 
Andyay inksdray argelay aughterslay atyay erhay anguinesay eyesyay: 
Iscordday aloneyay, ofyay allyay ethay immortalyay aintray, 
Ellssway ethay edray orrorshay ofyay isthay irefulday ainplay: 
Ethay odsgay inyay eacepay eirthay oldengay ansionsmay illfay, 
Angedray inyay ightbray orderyay onyay ethay Olympianyay illhay: 
Utbay eneralgay urmursmay oldtay eirthay iefsgray aboveyay, 
Andyay eachyay accusedyay ethay artialpay illway ofyay Ovejay. 
Eanwhilemay apartyay, uperiorsay, andyay aloneyay, 
Ethay eternalyay Onarchmay, onyay ishay awfulyay onethray, 
Aptwray inyay ethay azeblay ofyay oundlessbay oryglay atesay; 
Andyay ix’dfay, ulfill’dfay ethay ustjay ecreesday ofyay atefay. 
Onyay earthyay ehay urn’dtay ishay all-consideringyay eyesyay, 
Andyay ark’dmay ethay otspay erewhay Ilion’syay owerstay ariseyay; 
Ethay easay ithway ipsshay, ethay ieldsfay ithway armiesyay eadspray, 
Ethay ictor’svay ageray, ethay ingdyay, andyay ethay eadday. 
 
Usthay ilewhay ethay orning-beamsmay, increasingyay ightbray, 
O’eryay eaven’shay urepay azureyay eadspray ethay owingglay ightlay, 
Ommutualcay eathday ethay atefay ofyay arway onfoundscay, 
Eachyay adverseyay attlebay oredgay ithway equalyay oundsway. 
Utbay ownay (Atwhay imetay inyay omesay equester’dsay alevay 
Ethay earyway oodmanway eadsspray ishay aringspay ealmay, 
Enwhay ishay iredtay armsyay efuseray ethay axeyay otay earray, 
Andyay aimclay ayay espiteray omfray ethay ansylvay arway; 
Utbay otnay illtay alfhay ethay ostratepray orestsfay aylay 
Etch’dstray inyay onglay uinray, andyay exposedyay otay ay)day 
Enthay, ornay illtay enthay, ethay Eeks’gray impulsiveyay ightmay 
Iercedpay ethay ackblay alanxphay, andyay etlay inyay ethay ightlay. 
Eatgray Agamemnonyay enthay ethay aughterslay edlay, 
Andyay ewslay Ienorbay atyay ishay eople’spay eadhay: 
Osewhay uiresqay Oïleusyay, ithway ayay uddensay ingspray, 
Eap’dlay omfray ethay ariotchay otay evengeray ishay ingkay; 
Utbay inyay ishay ontfray ehay eltfay ethay atalfay oundway, 
Ichwhay iercedpay ishay ainbray, andyay etch’dstray imhay onyay ethay oundgray. 
Atridesyay oil’dspay, andyay eftlay emthay onyay ethay ainplay: 
Ainvay asway eirthay youthyay, eirthay itteringglay armouryay ainvay: 
Ownay oil’dsay ithway ustday, andyay akednay otay ethay skyay, 
Eirthay owysnay imbslay andyay eauteousbay odiesbay ielay. 
 
Otway onssay ofyay Iampray extnay otay attlebay ovemay, 
Ethay oductpray, oneyay ofyay arriagemay, oneyay ofyay ovelay:[222] 
Inyay ethay amesay arcay ethay other-warriorsbray ideray; 
Isthay ooktay ethay argechay otay ombatcay, atthay otay uidegay: 
Arfay otheryay asktay, anthay enwhay eythay ontway otay eepkay, 
Onyay Ida’syay opstay, eirthay ather’sfay eecyflay eepshay. 
Esethay onyay ethay ountainsmay onceyay Achillesyay oundfay, 
Andyay aptivecay edlay, ithway iantplay osiersyay oundbay; 
Enthay otay eirthay iresay orfay ampleyay umssay estoredray; 
Utbay ownay otay erishpay byay Atrides’yay ordsway: 
Iercedpay inyay ethay eastbray ethay ase-bornbay Isusyay eedsblay: 
Eftclay oughthray ethay eadhay ishay other’sbray atefay ucceedssay, 
Iftsway otay ethay oilspay ethay astyhay ictorvay allsfay, 
Andyay, iptstray, eirthay eaturesfay otay ishay indmay ecallsray. 
Ethay Ojanstray eesay ethay youthsyay untimelyyay ieday, 
Utbay elplesshay embletray orfay emselvesthay, andyay flyay. 
Osay enwhay ayay ionlay angingray o’eryay ethay awnslay, 
Indsfay, onyay omesay assygray airlay, ethay ouchingcay awnsfay, 
Eirthay onesbay ehay ackscray, eirthay eekingray italsvay awsdray, 
Andyay indsgray ethay uiveringqay eshflay ithway oodyblay awsjay; 
Ethay ightedfray indhay eholdsbay, andyay aresday otnay aystay, 
Utbay iftsway oughthray ustlingray icketsthay urstsbay erhay ayway; 
Allyay own’ddray inyay eatsway, ethay antingpay othermay iesflay, 
Andyay ethay igbay earstay ollray icklingtray omfray erhay eyesyay. 
 
Amidstyay ethay umulttay ofyay ethay outedray aintray, 
Ethay onssay ofyay alsefay Antimachusyay ereway ainslay; 
Ehay owhay orfay ibesbray ishay aithlessfay ounselscay oldsay, 
Andyay otedvay Elen’shay aystay orfay Aris’pay oldgay. 
Atridesyay ark’dmay, asyay esethay eirthay afetysay oughtsay, 
Andyay ewslay ethay ildrenchay orfay ethay ather’sfay aultfay; 
Eirthay eadstronghay orsehay unableyay otay estrainray, 
Eythay ookshay ithway earfay, andyay opp’ddray ethay ilkensay einray; 
Enthay inyay ethay ariotchay onyay eirthay eesknay eythay allfay, 
Andyay usthay ithway iftedlay andshay orfay ercymay allcay: 
 
“OYAY arespay ouryay youthyay, andyay orfay ethay ifelay eway oweyay, 
Antimachusyay allshay opiouscay iftsgay estowbay: 
Oonsay asyay ehay earshay, atthay, otnay inyay attlebay ainslay, 
Ethay Eciangray ipsshay ishay aptivecay onssay etainday, 
Argelay eapshay ofyay assbray inyay ansomray allshay ebay oldtay, 
Andyay eelstay ell-temperedway, andyay ersuasivepay oldgay.” 
 
Esethay ordsway, attendedyay ithway ethay oodflay ofyay earstay, 
Ethay youthsyay address’dyay otay unrelentingyay earsyay: 
Ethay engefulvay onarchmay avegay isthay ernstay eplyray: 
“Ifyay omfray Antimachusyay yeyay ingspray, yeyay ieday; 
Ethay aringday etchwray owhay onceyay inyay ouncilcay oodstay 
Otay edshay Ulysses’yay andyay myay other’sbray oodblay, 
Orfay offer’dpray eacepay! andyay uessay ishay eedsay orfay acegray? 
Onay, ieday, andyay aypay ethay orfeitfay ofyay youryay aceray.” 
 
Isthay aidsay, Isanderpay omfray ethay arcay ehay astcay, 
Andyay iercedpay ishay eastbray: upinesay ehay eathedbray ishay astlay. 
Ishay otherbray eap’dlay otay earthyay; utbay, asyay ehay aylay, 
Ethay enchanttray alchionfay opp’dlay ishay andshay awayyay; 
Ishay ever’dsay eadhay asway oss’dtay amongyay ethay ongthray, 
Andyay, ollingray, ewdray ayay oodyblay aintray alongyay. 
Enthay, erewhay ethay ickestthay oughtfay, ethay ictorvay ewflay; 
Ethay ing’skay exampleyay allyay ishay Eeksgray ursuepay. 
Ownay byay ethay ootfay ethay ingflyay ootfay ereway ainslay, 
Orsehay odtray byay orsehay, aylay oamingfay onyay ethay ainplay. 
Omfray ethay dryay ieldsfay ickthay oudsclay ofyay ustday ariseyay, 
Adeshay ethay ackblay osthay, andyay interceptyay ethay iesskay. 
Ethay ass-hoof’dbray eedsstay umultuoustay ungeplay andyay oundbay, 
Andyay ethay ickthay underthay eatsbay ethay abouringlay oundgray, 
Illstay aughteringslay onyay, ethay ingkay ofyay enmay oceedspray; 
Ethay istancedday armyyay ondersway atyay ishay eedsday, 
Asyay enwhay ethay indsway ithway agingray amesflay onspirecay, 
Andyay o’eryay ethay orestsfay ollray ethay oodflay ofyay irefay, 
Inyay azingblay eapshay ethay ove’sgray oldyay onourshay allfay, 
Andyay oneyay efulgentray uinray evelslay allyay: 
Eforebay Atrides’yay ageray osay inkssay ethay oefay, 
Olewhay uadronssqay anishvay, andyay oudpray eadshay ielay owlay. 
Ethay eedsstay flyay emblingtray omfray ishay avingway ordsway, 
Andyay anymay ayay arcay, ownay ightedlay ofyay itsyay ordlay, 
Ideway o’eryay ethay ieldfay ithway uidelessgay uryfay ollsray, 
Eakingbray eirthay anksray, andyay ushingcray outyay eirthay oulssay; 
Ilewhay ishay eenkay alchionfay inksdray ethay arriors’way iveslay; 
Oremay atefulgray, ownay, otay ulturesvay anthay eirthay ivesway! 
 
Erhapspay eatgray Ectorhay enthay adhay oundfay ishay atefay, 
Utbay Ovejay andyay estinyday olong’dpray ishay ateday. 
Afesay omfray ethay artsday, ethay arecay ofyay eavenhay ehay oodstay, 
Amidstyay alarmsyay, andyay eathday, andyay ustday, andyay oodblay. 
 
Ownay astpay ethay ombtay erewhay ancientyay Ilusyay aylay, 
Oughthray ethay idmay ieldfay ethay outedray urgeyay eirthay ayway: 
Erewhay ethay ildway igsfay ethay adjoiningyay ummitsay owncray, 
Ethay athpay eythay aketay, andyay eedspay otay eachray ethay owntay. 
Asyay iftsway, Atridesyay ithway oudlay outsshay ursuedpay, 
Othay ithway ishay oiltay, andyay athedbay inyay ostilehay oodblay. 
Ownay earnay ethay eech-treebay, andyay ethay Anscæay atesgay, 
Ethay erohay altshay, andyay ishay associatesyay aitsway. 
Eanwhilemay onyay everyyay idesay aroundyay ethay ainplay, 
Ispersedday, isorder’dday, flyay ethay Ojantray aintray. 
Osay iesflay ayay erdhay ofyay eevesbay, atthay earhay ismay’dday 
Ethay ion’slay oaringray oughthray ethay idnightmay adeshay; 
Onyay eapshay eythay umbletay ithway uccesslesssay astehay; 
Ethay avagesay eizessay, awsdray, andyay endsray ethay astlay. 
Otnay ithway esslay uryfay ernstay Atridesyay ewflay, 
Illstay ess’dpray ethay outray, andyay illstay ethay indmosthay ewslay; 
Url’dhay omfray eirthay arscay ethay avestbray iefschay areyay ill’dkay, 
Andyay ageray, andyay eathday, andyay arnagecay oadlay ethay ieldfay. 
 
Ownay ormsstay ethay ictorvay atyay ethay Ojantray allway; 
Urveyssay ethay owerstay, andyay editatesmay eirthay allfay. 
Utbay Ovejay escendingday ookshay ethay Idaeanyay illshay, 
Andyay ownday eirthay ummitssay our’dpay ayay undredhay illsray: 
Ethay unkindledyay ightninglay inyay ishay andhay ehay ooktay, 
Andyay usthay ethay any-colouredmay aidmay espokebay: 
 
“Irisyay, ithway astehay thyay oldengay ingsway isplayday, 
Otay odlikegay Ectorhay isthay ouryay ordway onvey—cay 
Ilewhay Agamemnonyay astesway ethay anksray aroundyay, 
Ightsfay inyay ethay ontfray, andyay athesbay ithway oodblay ethay oundgray, 
Idbay imhay ivegay ayway; utbay issueyay orthfay ommandscay, 
Andyay usttray ethay arway otay esslay importantyay andshay: 
Utbay enwhay, oryay oundedway byay ethay earspay oryay artday, 
Atthay iefchay allshay ountmay ishay ariotchay, andyay epartday, 
Enthay Ovejay allshay ingstray ishay armyay, andyay irefay ishay eastbray, 
Enthay otay erhay ipsshay allshay ingflyay Eecegray ebay ess’dpray, 
Illtay otay ethay ainmay ethay urningbay unsay escendday, 
Andyay acredsay ightnay erhay awfulyay adeshay extendyay.” 
 
Ehay okespay, andyay Irisyay atyay ishay ordway obey’dyay; 
Onyay ingsway ofyay indsway escendsday ethay ariousvay aidmay. 
Ethay iefchay eshay oundfay amidstyay ethay anksray ofyay arway, 
Oseclay otay ethay ulwarksbay, onyay ishay itteringglay arcay. 
Ethay oddessgay enthay: “OYAY onsay ofyay Iampray, earhay! 
Omfray Ovejay Iyay omecay, andyay ishay ighhay andatemay earbay. 
Ilewhay Agamemnonyay astesway ethay anksray aroundyay, 
Ightsfay inyay ethay ontfray, andyay athesbay ithway oodblay ethay oundgray, 
Abstainyay omfray ightfay; yetyay issueyay orthfay ommandscay, 
Andyay usttray ethay arway otay esslay importantyay andshay: 
Utbay enwhay, oryay oundedway byay ethay earspay oryay artday, 
Ethay iefchay allshay ountmay ishay ariotchay, andyay epartday, 
Enthay Ovejay allshay ingstray thyay armyay, andyay irefay thyay eastbray, 
Enthay otay erhay ipsshay allshay ingflyay Eecegray ebay ess’dpray, 
Illtay otay ethay ainmay ethay urningbay unsay escendday, 
Andyay acredsay ightnay erhay awfulyay adeshay extendyay.” 
 
Eshay aidsay, andyay anish’dvay. Ectorhay, ithway ayay oundbay, 
Ingsspray omfray ishay ariotchay onyay ethay emblingtray oundgray, 
Inyay angingclay armsyay: ehay aspsgray inyay eitheryay andhay 
Ayay ointedpay ancelay, andyay eedsspay omfray andbay otay andbay; 
Evivesray eirthay ardouryay, urnstay eirthay epsstay omfray ightflay, 
Andyay akesway anewyay ethay ingdyay amesflay ofyay ightfay. 
Eythay andstay otay armsyay: ethay Eeksgray eirthay onsetyay areday, 
Ondensecay eirthay owerspay, andyay aitway ethay omingcay arway. 
Ewnay orcefay, ewnay iritspay, otay eachyay eastbray eturnsray; 
Ethay ightfay enew’dray ithway iercerfay uryfay urnsbay: 
Ethay ingkay eadslay onyay: allyay ixfay onyay imhay eirthay eyeyay, 
Andyay earnlay omfray imhay otay onquercay, oryay otay ieday. 
 
Yeyay acredsay inenay! elestialcay Usesmay! elltay, 
Owhay acedfay imhay irstfay, andyay byay ishay owesspray ellfay? 
Ethay eatgray Iphidamasyay, ethay oldbay andyay youngyay, 
Omfray agesay Antenoryay andyay Eanothay ungspray; 
Omwhay omfray ishay youthyay ishay andsiregray Isseuscay edbray, 
Andyay ursednay inyay Acethray erewhay owysnay ocksflay areyay edfay. 
Arcescay idday ethay ownday ishay osyray eekschay investyay, 
Andyay earlyyay onourhay armway ishay enerousgay eastbray, 
Enwhay ethay indkay iresay onsign’dcay ishay aughter’sday armschay 
(Eano’sthay ister)say otay ishay youthfulyay armsyay. 
Utbay all’dcay byay oryglay otay ethay arsway ofyay Oytray, 
Ehay eaveslay untastedyay ethay irstfay uitsfray ofyay oyjay; 
Omfray ishay ovedlay idebray epartsday ithway eltingmay eyesyay, 
Andyay iftsway otay aidyay ishay earerday ountrycay iesflay. 
Ithway elvetway ackblay ipsshay ehay each’dray Ercope’spay andstray, 
Encethay ooktay ethay onglay aboriouslay archmay byay andlay. 
Ownay iercefay orfay amefay, eforebay ethay anksray ehay ingsspray, 
Oweringtay inyay armsyay, andyay avesbray ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay. 
Atridesyay irstfay ischargedday ethay issivemay earspay; 
Ethay Ojantray oop’dstay, ethay avelinjay ass’dpay inyay airyay. 
Enthay earnay ethay orsletcay, atyay ethay onarch’smay earthay, 
Ithway allyay ishay engthstray, ethay youthyay irectsday ishay artday: 
Utbay ethay oadbray eltbay, ithway atesplay ofyay ilversay oundbay, 
Ethay ointpay ebatedray, andyay epell’dray ethay oundway. 
Encumber’dyay ithway ethay artday, Atridesyay andsstay, 
Illtay, asp’dgray ithway orcefay, ehay ench’dwray ityay omfray ishay andshay; 
Atyay onceyay ishay eightyway ordsway ischargedday ayay oundway 
Ullfay onyay ishay ecknay, atthay ell’dfay imhay otay ethay oundgray. 
Etch’dstray inyay ethay ustday ethay unhappyyay arriorway ieslay, 
Andyay eepslay eternalyay ealssay ishay immingsway eyesyay. 
Ohyay orthyway etterbay atefay! ohyay earlyyay ainslay! 
Thyay ountry’scay iendfray; andyay irtuousvay, oughthay inyay ainvay! 
Onay oremay ethay youthyay allshay oinjay ishay onsort’scay idesay, 
Atyay onceyay ayay irginvay, andyay atyay onceyay ayay idebray! 
Onay oremay ithway esentspray erhay embracesyay eetmay, 
Oryay aylay ethay oilsspay ofyay onquestcay atyay erhay eetfay, 
Onyay omwhay ishay assionpay, avishlay ofyay ishay orestay, 
Estow’dbay osay uchmay, andyay ainlyvay omisedpray oremay! 
Unweptyay, uncover’dyay, onyay ethay ainplay ehay aylay, 
Ilewhay ethay oudpray ictorvay orebay ishay armsyay awayyay. 
 
Ooncay, Antenor’syay eldestyay opehay, asway ighnay: 
Earstay, atyay ethay ightsay, amecay artingstay omfray ishay eyeyay, 
Ilewhay iercedpay ithway iefgray ethay uch-lovedmay youthyay ehay iew’dvay, 
Andyay ethay alepay eaturesfay ownay eform’dday ithway oodblay. 
Enthay, ithway ishay earspay, unseenyay, ishay imetay ehay ooktay, 
Aim’dyay atyay ethay ingkay, andyay earnay ishay elbowyay ookstray. 
Ethay illingthray eelstay anspiercedtray ethay awnybray artpay, 
Andyay oughthray ishay armyay oodstay orthfay ethay arbedbay artday. 
Urprisedsay ethay onarchmay eelsfay, yetyay oidvay ofyay earfay 
Onyay Ooncay ushesray ithway ishay iftedlay earspay: 
Ishay other’sbray orpsecay ethay iouspay Ojantray awsdray, 
Andyay allscay ishay ountrycay otay assertyay ishay ausecay; 
Efendsday imhay eathlessbray onyay ethay anguinesay ieldfay, 
Andyay o’eryay ethay odybay eadsspray ishay ampleyay ieldshay. 
Atridesyay, arkingmay anyay unguardedyay artpay, 
Ansfix’dtray ethay arriorway ithway ishay azenbray artday; 
Onepray onyay ishay other’sbray eedingblay eastbray ehay aylay, 
Ethay onarch’smay alchionfay opp’dlay ishay eadhay awayyay: 
Ethay ocialsay adesshay ethay amesay arkday ourneyjay ogay, 
Andyay oinjay eachyay otheryay inyay ethay ealmsray elowbay. 
 
Ethay engefulvay ictorvay agesray oundray ethay ieldsfay, 
Ithway everyyay eaponway artyay oryay uryfay yieldsyay: 
Byay ethay onglay ancelay, ethay ordsway, oryay onderouspay onestay, 
Olewhay anksray areyay okenbray, andyay olewhay oopstray o’erthrownyay. 
Isthay, ilewhay yetyay armway istill’dday ethay urplepay oodflay; 
Utbay enwhay ethay oundway ewgray iffstay ithway ottedclay oodblay, 
Enthay indinggray orturestay ishay ongstray osombay endray, 
Esslay eenkay osethay artsday ethay iercefay Ilythiaeyay endsay: 
(Ethay owerspay atthay ausecay ethay eemingtay atron’smay oesthray, 
Adsay othersmay ofyay unutterableyay oesway!) 
Ungstay ithway ethay artsmay, all-pantingyay ithway ethay ainpay, 
Ehay ountsmay ethay arcay, andyay ivesgay ishay uiresqay ethay einray; 
Enthay ithway ayay oicevay ichwhay uryfay ademay oremay ongstray, 
Andyay ainpay augmentedyay, usthay exhortsyay ethay ongthray: 
 
“OYAY iendsfray! Oyay Eeksgray! assertyay youryay onourshay onway; 
Oceedpray, andyay inishfay atwhay isthay armyay egunbay: 
Olay! angryyay Ovejay orbidsfay youryay iefchay otay aystay, 
Andyay enviesyay alfhay ethay oriesglay ofyay ethay ayday.” 
 
Ehay aidsay: ethay iverdray irlswhay ishay engthfullay ongthay; 
Ethay orseshay flyay; ethay ariotchay okessmay alongyay. 
Oudsclay omfray eirthay ostrilsnay ethay iercefay ourserscay owblay, 
Andyay omfray eirthay idessay ethay oamfay escendsday inyay owsnay; 
Otshay oughthray ethay attlebay inyay ayay oment’smay acespay, 
Ethay oundedway onarchmay atyay ishay enttay eythay aceplay. 
 
Onay oonersay Ectorhay awsay ethay ingkay etiredray, 
Utbay usthay ishay Ojanstray andyay ishay aidsyay ehay iredfay: 
“Earhay, allyay yeyay Ardanday, allyay yeyay Ianlycay aceray! 
Amedfay inyay oseclay ightfay, andyay eadfuldray acefay otay acefay: 
Ownay allcay otay indmay youryay ancientyay ophiestray onway, 
Youryay eatgray orefathers’fay irtuesvay, andyay youryay ownyay. 
Eholdbay, ethay eneralgay iesflay! esertsday ishay owerspay! 
Olay, Ovejay imselfhay eclaresday ethay onquestcay oursyay! 
Ownay onyay yonyay anksray impelyay youryay oamingfay eedsstay; 
Andyay, uresay ofyay oryglay, areday immortalyay eedsday.” 
 
Ithway ordsway ikelay esethay ethay ieryfay iefchay alarmsyay 
Ishay aintingfay osthay, andyay everyyay osombay armsway. 
Asyay ethay oldbay unterhay eerschay ishay oundshay otay eartay 
Ethay indledbray ionlay, oryay ethay uskytay earbay: 
Ithway oicevay andyay andhay ovokespray eirthay oubtingday earthay, 
Andyay ingsspray ethay oremostfay ithway ishay iftedlay artday: 
Osay odlikegay Ectorhay omptspray ishay oopstray otay areday; 
Ornay omptspray aloneyay, utbay eadslay imselfhay ethay arway. 
Onyay ethay ackblay odybay ofyay ethay oefay ehay ourspay; 
Asyay omfray ethay oud’sclay eepday osombay, ell’dsway ithway owersshay, 
Ayay uddensay ormstay ethay urplepay oceanyay eepssway, 
Ivesdray ethay ildway avesway, andyay ossestay allyay ethay eepsday. 
Aysay, Usemay! enwhay Ovejay ethay Ojan’stray oryglay own’dcray, 
Eneathbay ishay armyay atwhay eroeshay itbay ethay oundgray? 
Assaeusyay, Olopsday, andyay Autonousyay iedday, 
Opitesyay extnay asway addedyay otay eirthay idesay; 
Enthay avebray Ipponoushay, amedfay inyay anymay ayay ightfay, 
Opheltiusyay, Orusyay, unksay otay endlessyay ightnay; 
Æsymnus, Agelausyay; allyay iefschay ofyay amenay; 
Ethay estray ereway ulgarvay eathsday unknownyay otay amefay. 
Asyay enwhay ayay esternway irlwindwhay, argedchay ithway ormsstay, 
Ispelsday ethay ather’dgay oudsclay atthay Otusnay ormsfay: 
Ethay ustgay ontinuedcay, iolentvay andyay ongstray, 
Ollsray ablesay oudsclay inyay eapshay onyay eapshay alongyay; 
Ownay otay ethay iesskay ethay oamingfay illowsbay earsray, 
Ownay eaksbray ethay urgesay, andyay ideway ethay ottombay aresbay: 
Usthay, agingray Ectorhay, ithway esistlessray andshay, 
O’erturnsyay, onfoundscay, andyay attersscay allyay eirthay andsbay. 
Ownay ethay astlay uinray ethay olewhay osthay appalsyay; 
Ownay Eecegray adhay embledtray inyay erhay oodenway allsway; 
Utbay iseway Ulyssesyay all’dcay Idestyday orthfay, 
Ishay oulsay ekindledray, andyay awakedyay ishay orthway. 
“Andyay andstay eway eedlessday, Oyay eternalyay ameshay! 
Illtay Ector’shay armyay involveyay ethay ipsshay inyay ameflay? 
Astehay, etlay usyay oinjay, andyay ombatcay idesay byay idesay.” 
Ethay arriorway usthay, andyay usthay ethay iendfray epliedray: 
 
“Onay artialmay oiltay Iyay unshay, onay angerday earfay; 
Etlay Ectorhay omecay; Iyay aitway ishay uryfay erehay. 
Utbay Ovejay ithway onquestcay ownscray ethay Ojantray aintray: 
Andyay, Ovejay ouryay oefay, allyay umanhay orcefay isyay ainvay.” 
 
Ehay igh’dsay; utbay, ighingsay, aisedray ishay engefulvay eelstay, 
Andyay omfray ishay arcay ethay oudpray Aeusthymbray ellfay: 
Olionmay, ethay arioteerchay, ursuedpay ishay ordlay, 
Ishay eathday ennobledyay byay Ulysses’yay ordsway. 
Erethay ainslay, eythay eftlay emthay inyay eternalyay ightnay, 
Enthay ungedplay amidstyay ethay ickestthay anksray ofyay ightfay. 
Osay otway ildway oarsbay outstripyay ethay ollowingfay oundshay, 
Enthay iftsway evertray, andyay oundsway eturnray orfay oundsway. 
Ernstay Ector’shay onquestscay inyay ethay iddlemay ainplay 
Oodstay eck’dchay awhileyay, andyay Eecegray espiredray againyay. 
 
Ethay onssay ofyay Eropsmay oneshay amidstyay ethay arway; 
Oweringtay eythay oderay inyay oneyay efulgentray arcay: 
Inyay eepday opheticpray artsyay eirthay atherfay ill’dskay, 
Adhay arn’dway ishay ildrenchay omfray ethay Ojantray ieldfay. 
Atefay urgedyay emthay onyay: ethay atherfay arn’dway inyay ainvay; 
Eythay ush’dray otay ightfay, andyay erish’dpay onyay ethay ainplay; 
Eirthay eastsbray onay oremay ethay italvay iritspay armsway; 
Ethay ernstay Idestyday ipsstray eirthay iningshay armsyay. 
Irochushypay byay eatgray Ulyssesyay iesday, 
Andyay ichray Ippodamushay ecomesbay ishay izepray. 
Eatgray Ovejay omfray Ideyay ithway aughterslay illsfay ishay ightsay, 
Andyay evellay angshay ethay oubtfulday alescay ofyay ightfay. 
Byay Eus’tyday ancelay Agastrophusyay asway ainslay, 
Ethay ar-famedfay erohay ofyay Onianpæay ainstray; 
Ing’dway ithway ishay earsfay, onyay ootfay ehay ovestray otay flyay, 
Ishay eedsstay ootay istantday, andyay ethay oefay ootay ighnay: 
Oughthray okenbray ordersyay, iftersway anthay ethay indway, 
Ehay edflay, utbay ingflyay eftlay ishay ifelay ehindbay. 
Isthay Ectorhay eessay, asyay ishay experiencedyay eyesyay 
Aversetray ethay ilesfay, andyay otay ethay escueray iesflay; 
Outsshay, asyay ehay ass’dpay, ethay alcrystay egionsray endray, 
Andyay ovingmay armiesyay onyay ishay archmay attendyay. 
Eatgray Iomedday imselfhay asway eizedsay ithway earfay, 
Andyay usthay espokebay ishay otherbray ofyay ethay arway: 
 
“Arkmay owhay isthay ayway yonyay endingbay uadronssqay yieldyay! 
Ethay ormstay ollsray onyay, andyay Ectorhay ulesray ethay ieldfay: 
Erehay andstay ishay utmostyay orcefay.”—The arriorway aidsay; 
Iftsway atyay ethay ordway ishay onderouspay avelinjay edflay; 
Ornay iss’dmay itsyay aimyay, utbay erewhay ethay umageplay ancedday 
Azedray ethay oothsmay onecay, andyay encethay obliquelyyay ancedglay. 
Afesay inyay ishay elmhay (Ethay iftgay ofyay Us’phœbay ands)hay 
Ithoutway ayay oundway ethay Ojantray erohay andsstay; 
Utbay yetyay osay unn’dstay, atthay, aggeringstay onyay ethay ainplay. 
Ishay armyay andyay eeknay ishay inkingsay ulkbay ustainsay; 
O’eryay ishay imday ightsay ethay istymay apoursvay iseray, 
Andyay ayay ortshay arknessday adesshay ishay immingsway eyesyay. 
Idestyday ollowedfay otay egainray ishay ancelay; 
Ilewhay Ectorhay oseray, ecover’dray omfray ethay ancetray, 
Emountsray ishay arcay, andyay erdshay amidstyay ethay owdcray: 
Ethay Eekgray ursuespay imhay, andyay exultsyay aloudyay: 
“Onceyay oremay ankthay Usphœbay orfay thyay orfeitfay eathbray, 
Oryay ankthay atthay iftnesssway ichwhay outstripsyay ethay eathday. 
Ellway byay Apolloyay areyay thyay ayerspray epaidray, 
Andyay oftyay atthay artialpay owerpay ashay entlay ishay aidyay. 
Outhay allshay otnay onglay ethay eathday eservedday ithstandway, 
Ifyay anyyay odgay assistyay Ides’tyday andhay. 
Flyay enthay, ingloriousyay! utbay thyay ightflay, isthay ayday, 
Olewhay ecatombshay ofyay Ojantray ostsghay allshay aypay,” 
 
Imhay, ilewhay ehay iumph’dtray, Arispay eyedyay omfray arfay, 
(Ethay ousespay ofyay Elenhay, ethay airfay ausecay ofyay arway;) 
Aroundyay ethay ieldsfay ishay eather’dfay aftsshay ehay entsay, 
Omfray ancientyay Ilus’yay uin’dray onumentmay: 
Ehindbay ethay olumncay acedplay, ehay entbay ishay owbay, 
Andyay ing’dway anyay arrowyay atyay ethay unwaryyay oefay; 
Ustjay asyay ehay oop’dstay, Agastrophus’syay estcray 
Otay eizesay, andyay ewdray ethay orsletcay omfray ishay eastbray, 
Ethay owstringbay ang’dtway; ornay ewflay ethay aftshay inyay ainvay, 
Utbay iercedpay ishay ootfay, andyay ail’dnay ityay otay ethay ainplay. 
Ethay aughinglay Ojantray, ithway ayay oyfuljay ingspray. 
Eapslay omfray ishay ambushyay, andyay insultsyay ethay ingkay. 
 
“Ehay eedsblay! (Ehay ies)cray omesay odgay ashay edspay myay artday! 
Ouldway ethay amesay odgay adhay ix’dfay ityay inyay ishay earthay! 
Osay Oytray, elievedray omfray atthay ide-wastingway andhay, 
Ouldshay eathebray omfray aughterslay andyay inyay ombatcay andstay: 
Osewhay onssay ownay embletray atyay ishay artedday earspay, 
Asyay atter’dscay ambslay ethay ushingray ionlay earfay.” 
 
Ehay auntlessday usthay: “Outhay onquerorcay ofyay ethay airfay, 
Outhay oman-warriorway ithway ethay urlingcay airhay; 
Ainvay archeryay! ustingtray otay ethay istantday artday, 
Unskill’dyay inyay armsyay otay actyay ayay anlymay artpay! 
Outhay asthay utbay oneday atwhay oysbay oryay omenway ancay; 
Uchsay andshay aymay oundway, utbay otnay incenseyay ayay anmay. 
Ornay oastbay ethay atchscray thyay eeblefay arrowyay avegay, 
Ayay oward’scay eaponway evernay urtshay ethay avebray. 
Otnay osay isthay artday, ichwhay outhay ay’stmay oneyay ayday eelfay; 
Atefay ingsway itsyay ightflay, andyay eathday isyay onyay ethay eelstay: 
Erewhay isthay utbay ightslay, omesay oblenay ifelay expiresyay; 
Itsyay ouchtay akesmay orphansyay, athesbay ethay eekschay ofyay iressay, 
Eepsstay earthyay inyay urplepay, utsglay ethay irdsbay ofyay airyay, 
Andyay eaveslay uchsay objectsyay asyay istractday ethay airfay.” 
Ulyssesyay astenshay ithway ayay emblingtray earthay, 
Eforebay imhay epsstay, andyay endingbay awsdray ethay artday: 
Orthfay owsflay ethay oodblay; anyay eageryay angpay ucceedssay; 
Idestyday ountsmay, andyay otay ethay avynay eedsspay. 
 
Ownay onyay ethay ieldfay Ulyssesyay andsstay aloneyay, 
Ethay Eeksgray allyay edflay, ethay Ojanstray ouringpay onyay; 
Utbay andsstay ollectedcay inyay imselfhay, andyay olewhay, 
Andyay uestionsqay usthay ishay ownyay unconquer’dyay oulsay: 
 
“Atwhay urtherfay ubterfugesay, atwhay opeshay emainray? 
Atwhay ameshay, ingloriousyay ifyay Iyay uitqay ethay ainplay? 
Atwhay angerday, inglysay ifyay Iyay andstay ethay oundgray, 
Myay iendsfray allyay atter’dscay, allyay ethay oesfay aroundyay? 
Yetyay ereforewhay oubtfulday? etlay isthay uthtray ufficesay, 
Ethay avebray eetsmay angerday, andyay ethay owardcay iesflay. 
Otay ieday oryay onquercay, ovespray ayay ero’shay earthay; 
Andyay, owingknay isthay, Iyay owknay ayay oldier’ssay artpay.” 
 
Uchsay oughtsthay evolvingray inyay ishay arefulcay eastbray, 
Earnay, andyay oremay earnay, ethay adyshay ohortscay ess’dpray; 
Esethay, inyay ethay arriorway, eirthay ownyay atefay encloseyay; 
Andyay oundray imhay eepday ethay eelystay irclecay owsgray. 
Osay aresfay ayay oarbay omwhay allyay ethay ooptray urroundssay 
Ofyay outingshay untsmenhay andyay ofyay amorousclay oundshay; 
Ehay indsgray ishay ivoryyay uskstay; ehay oamsfay ithway ireyay; 
Ishay anguinesay eye-ballsyay areglay ithway ivinglay irefay; 
Byay esethay, byay osethay, onyay everyyay artpay isyay iedplay; 
Andyay ethay edray aughterslay eadsspray onyay everyyay idesay. 
Iercedpay oughthray ethay ouldershay, irstfay Eiopisday ellfay; 
Extnay Ennomusyay andyay Oonthay anksay otay ellhay; 
Ersidamaschay, eneathbay ethay avelnay ustthray, 
Allsfay onepray otay earthyay, andyay aspsgray ethay oodyblay ustday. 
Aropschay, ethay onsay ofyay Ippasushay, asway earnay; 
Ulyssesyay each’dray imhay ithway ethay atalfay earspay; 
Utbay otay ishay aidyay ishay otherbray Ocussay iesflay, 
Ocussay ethay avebray, ethay enerousgay, andyay ethay iseway. 
Earnay asyay ehay ewdray, ethay arriorway usthay eganbay: 
 
“OYAY eatgray Ulyssesyay! uch-enduringmay anmay! 
Otnay eeperday ill’dskay inyay everyyay artialmay eightslay, 
Anthay ornway otay oilstay, andyay activeyay inyay ethay ightfay! 
Isthay ayday otway othersbray allshay thyay onquestcay acegray, 
Andyay endyay atyay onceyay ethay eatgray Ippasianhay aceray, 
Oryay outhay eneathbay isthay ancelay ustmay esspray ethay ieldfay.” 
Ehay aidsay, andyay orcefulfay iercedpay ishay aciousspay ieldshay: 
Oughthray ethay ongstray assbray ethay ingingray avelinjay ownthray, 
Ough’dplay alfhay ishay idesay, andyay aredbay ityay otay ethay onebay. 
Byay Allas’pay arecay, ethay earspay, oughthay eepday infix’dyay, 
Opp’dstay ortshay ofyay ifelay, ornay ithway ishay entrailsyay ix’dmay. 
 
Ethay oundway otnay ortalmay iseway Ulyssesyay ewknay, 
Enthay uriousfay usthay (Utbay irstfay omesay epsstay ithdrew)way: 
“Unhappyyay anmay! osewhay eathday ouryay andshay allshay acegray, 
Atefay allscay eethay encehay andyay inish’dfay isyay thyay aceray. 
Ornay ongerlay eckchay myay onquestscay onyay ethay oefay; 
Utbay, iercedpay byay isthay, otay endlessyay arknessday ogay, 
Andyay addyay oneyay ectrespay otay ethay ealmsray elowbay!” 
 
Ehay okespay, ilewhay Ocussay, eizedsay ithway uddensay ightfray, 
Emblingtray avegay ayway, andyay urn’dtay ishay ackbay otay ightflay; 
Etweenbay ishay ouldersshay iercedpay ethay ollowingfay artday, 
Andyay eldhay itsyay assagepay oughthray ethay antingpay earthay: 
Ideway inyay ishay eastbray appear’dyay ethay islygray oundway; 
Ehay allsfay; ishay armouryay ingsray againstyay ethay oundgray. 
Enthay usthay Ulyssesyay, azinggay onyay ethay ainslay: 
“Amedfay onsay ofyay Ippasushay! erethay esspray ethay ainplay; 
Erethay endsyay thyay arrownay anspay assign’dyay byay atefay, 
Eavenhay owesyay Ulyssesyay yetyay ayay ongerlay ateday. 
Ahyay, etchwray! onay atherfay allshay thyay orpsecay omposecay; 
Thyay ingdyay eyesyay onay endertay othermay oseclay; 
Utbay ungryhay irdsbay allshay eartay osethay allsbay awayyay, 
Andyay overinghay ulturesvay eamscray aroundyay eirthay eypray. 
Emay Eecegray allshay onourhay, enwhay Iyay eetmay myay oomday, 
Ithway olemnsay uneralsfay andyay ayay astinglay ombtay.” 
 
Enthay agingray ithway intolerableyay artsmay, 
Ehay itheswray ishay odybay, andyay extractsyay ethay artday. 
Ethay artday ayay idetay ofyay outingspay oregay ursuedpay, 
Andyay adden’dglay Oytray ithway ightsay ofyay ostilehay oodblay. 
Ownay oopstray onyay oopstray ethay aintingfay iefchay invadeyay, 
Orcedfay ehay ecedesray, andyay oudlylay allscay orfay aidyay. 
Icethray otay itsyay itchpay ishay oftylay oicevay ehay earsray; 
Ethay ell-knownway oicevay icethray Enelausmay earshay: 
Alarm’dyay, otay Ajaxyay Elamontay ehay iedcray, 
Owhay aresshay ishay abourslay, andyay efendsday ishay idesay: 
“OYAY iendfray! Ulysses’yay outsshay invadeyay myay earyay; 
Istressedday ehay eemssay, andyay onay assistanceyay earnay; 
Ongstray asyay ehay isyay, yetyay oneyay opposedyay otay allyay, 
Oppress’dyay byay ultitudesmay, ethay estbay aymay allfay. 
Eecegray obb’dray ofyay imhay ustmay idbay erhay osthay espairday, 
Andyay eelfay ayay osslay otnay agesyay ancay epairray.” 
 
Enthay, erewhay ethay cryay irectsday, ishay oursecay ehay endsbay; 
Eatgray Ajaxyay, ikelay ethay odgay ofyay arway, attendsyay, 
Ethay udentpray iefchay inyay oresay istressday eythay oundfay, 
Ithway andsbay ofyay uriousfay Ojanstray ompass’dcay oundray.[223] 
Asyay enwhay omesay untsmanhay, ithway ayay ingflyay earspay, 
Omfray ethay indblay icketthay oundsway ayay atelystay eerday; 
Ownday ishay eftclay idesay, ilewhay eshfray ethay oodblay istilsday, 
Ehay oundsbay aloftyay, andyay udsscay omfray illshay otay illshay, 
Illtay ife’slay armway apourvay issuingyay oughthray ethay oundway, 
Ildway ountain-wolvesmay ethay aintingfay eastbay urroundsay: 
Ustjay asyay eirthay awsjay ishay ostratepray imbslay invadeyay, 
Ethay ionlay ushesray oughthray ethay oodlandway adeshay, 
Ethay olvesway, oughthay ungryhay, ourscay ispersedday awayyay; 
Ethay ordlylay avagesay indicatesvay ishay eypray. 
Ulyssesyay usthay, unconquer’dyay byay ishay ainspay, 
Ayay inglesay arriorway alfhay ayay osthay ustainssay: 
Utbay oonsay asyay Ajaxyay eaveslay ishay ower-liketay ieldshay, 
Ethay atteredscay owdscray flyay ightedfray o’eryay ethay ieldfay; 
Atrides’yay armyay ethay inkingsay erohay aysstay, 
Andyay, avedsay omfray umbersnay, otay ishay arcay onveyscay. 
 
Ictoriousvay Ajaxyay iesplay ethay outedray ewcray; 
Andyay irstfay Oryclusday, Iam’spray onsay, ehay ewslay, 
Onyay ongstray Andocuspay extnay inflictsyay ayay oundway, 
Andyay ayslay Anderlysay eedingblay onyay ethay oundgray. 
Asyay enwhay ayay orrenttay, ell’dsway ithway intryway ainsray, 
Ourspay omfray ethay ountainsmay o’eryay ethay elugedday ainsplay, 
Andyay inespay andyay oaksyay, omfray eirthay oundationsfay orntay, 
Ayay ountry’scay uinsray! otay ethay eassay areyay ornebay: 
Iercefay Ajaxyay usthay o’erwhelmsyay ethay yieldingyay ongthray; 
Enmay, eedsstay, andyay ariotschay, ollray inyay eapshay alongyay. 
 
Utbay Ectorhay, omfray isthay enescay ofyay aughterslay arfay, 
Agedray onyay ethay eftlay, andyay uledray ethay idetay ofyay arway: 
Oudlay oansgray oclaimpray ishay ogresspray oughthray ethay ainplay, 
Andyay eepday Amanderscay ellssway ithway eapshay ofyay ainslay. 
Erethay Estornay andyay Idomeneusyay opposeyay 
Ethay arrior’sway uryfay; erethay ethay attlebay owsglay; 
Erethay iercefay onyay ootfay, oryay omfray ethay ariot’schay eighthay, 
Ishay ordsway eformsday ethay eauteousbay anksray ofyay ightfay. 
Ethay ousespay ofyay Elenhay, ealingday artsday aroundyay, 
Adhay iercedpay Achaonmay ithway ayay istantday oundway: 
Inyay ishay ightray ouldershay ethay oadbray aftshay appear’dyay, 
Andyay emblingtray Eecegray orfay erhay icianphysay ear’dfay. 
Otay Estornay enthay Idomeneusyay egunbay: 
“Oryglay ofyay Eecegray, oldyay Eleus’nay aliantvay onsay! 
Ascendyay thyay ariotchay, astehay ithway eedspay awayyay, 
Andyay eatgray Achaonmay otay ethay ipsshay onveycay; 
Ayay iseway icianphysay ill’dskay ouryay oundsway otay ealhay, 
Isyay oremay anthay armiesyay otay ethay ublicpay ealway.” 
Oldyay Estornay ountsmay ethay eatsay; esidebay imhay oderay 
Ethay oundedway offspringyay ofyay ethay ealinghay odgay. 
Ehay endslay ethay ashlay; ethay eedsstay ithway oundingsay eetfay 
Akeshay ethay dryay ieldfay, andyay underthay owardtay ethay eetflay. 
 
Utbay ownay Ebrionescay, omfray Ector’shay arcay, 
Urvey’dsay ethay ariousvay ortunefay ofyay ethay arway: 
“Ilewhay erehay (Ehay ied)cray ethay ingflyay Eeksgray areyay ainslay, 
Ojanstray onyay Ojanstray yonderyay oadlay ethay ainplay. 
Eforebay eatgray Ajaxyay eesay ethay ingledmay ongthray 
Ofyay enmay andyay ariotschay ivendray inyay eapshay alongyay! 
Iyay owknay imhay ellway, istinguish’dday o’eryay ethay ieldfay 
Byay ethay oadbray itteringglay ofyay ethay evenfoldsay ieldshay. 
Itherthay, Oyay Ectorhay, itherthay urgeyay thyay eedsstay, 
Erethay angerday allscay, andyay erethay ethay ombatcay eedsblay; 
Erethay orsehay andyay ootfay inyay ingledmay eathsday uniteyay, 
Andyay oansgray ofyay aughterslay ixmay ithway outsshay ofyay ightfay.” 
 
Usthay avinghay okespay, ethay iver’sdray ashlay esoundsray; 
Iftsway oughthray ethay anksray ethay apidray ariotchay oundsbay; 
Ungstay byay ethay okestray, ethay ourserscay ourscay ethay ieldsfay, 
O’eryay eapshay ofyay arcasescay, andyay illshay ofyay ieldsshay. 
Ethay orses’hay oofshay areyay athedbay inyay eroes’hay oregay, 
Andyay, ashingday, urplepay allyay ethay arcay eforebay; 
Ethay oaninggray axleyay ablesay opsdray istilsday, 
Andyay angledmay arnagecay ogsclay ethay apidray eelswhay. 
Erehay Ectorhay, ungingplay oughthray ethay ickestthay ightfay, 
Okebray ethay arkday alanxphay, andyay etlay inyay ethay ightlay: 
(Byay ethay onglay ancelay, ethay ordsway, oryay onderouspay onestay, 
Ethay anksray ehay atter’dscay andyay ethay oopstray o’erthrownyay:) 
Ajaxyay ehay unsshay, oughthray allyay ethay ireday ebateday, 
Andyay earsfay atthay armyay osewhay orcefay ehay eltfay osay atelay. 
Utbay artialpay Ovejay, espousingyay Ector’shay artpay, 
Otshay eaven-bredhay orrorhay oughthray ethay Ecian’sgray earthay; 
Onfusedcay, unnervedyay inyay Ector’shay esencepray owngray, 
Amazedyay ehay oodstay, ithway errorstay otnay ishay ownyay. 
O’eryay ishay oadbray ackbay ishay oonymay ieldshay ehay ewthray, 
Andyay, aringglay oundray, byay ardytay epsstay ithdrewway. 
Usthay ethay imgray ionlay ishay etreatray aintainsmay, 
Esetbay ithway atchfulway ogsday, andyay outingshay ainssway; 
Epulsedray byay umbersnay omfray ethay ightlynay allsstay, 
Oughthay ageray impelsyay imhay, andyay oughthay ungerhay allscay, 
Onglay andsstay ethay oweringshay artsday, andyay issilemay iresfay; 
Enthay ourlysay owslay ethay indignantyay eastbay etiresray: 
Osay urn’dtay ernstay Ajaxyay, byay olewhay ostshay epell’dray, 
Ilewhay ishay olnsway earthay atyay everyyay epstay ebell’dray. 
 
Asyay ethay owslay eastbay, ithway eavyhay engthstray enduedyay, 
Inyay omesay ideway ieldfay byay oopstray ofyay oysbay ursuedpay, 
Oughthay oundray ishay idessay ayay oodenway empesttay ainray, 
Opscray ethay alltay arvesthay, andyay ayslay asteway ethay ainplay; 
Ickthay onyay ishay idehay ethay ollowhay owsblay esoundray, 
Ethay atientpay animalyay aintainsmay ishay oundgray, 
Arcescay omfray ethay ieldfay ithway allyay eirthay effortsyay asedchay, 
Andyay irsstay utbay owlyslay enwhay ehay irsstay atyay astlay: 
Onyay Ajaxyay usthay ayay eightway ofyay Ojanstray unghay, 
Ethay okesstray edoubledray onyay ishay ucklerbay ungray; 
Onfidingcay ownay inyay ulkybay engthstray ehay andsstay, 
Ownay urnstay, andyay ackwardbay earsbay ethay yieldingyay andsbay; 
Ownay iffstay ecedesray, yetyay ardlyhay eemssay otay flyay, 
Andyay eatsthray ishay ollowersfay ithway etortedray eyeyay. 
Ix’dfay asyay ethay arbay etweenbay otway arringway owerspay, 
Ilewhay issinghay artsday escendday inyay ironyay owersshay: 
Inyay ishay oadbray ucklerbay anymay ayay eaponway oodstay, 
Itsyay urfacesay istledbray ithway ayay uiveringqay oodway; 
Andyay anymay ayay avelinjay, uiltlessgay onyay ethay ainplay, 
Arksmay ethay dryay ustday, andyay irststhay orfay oodblay inyay ainvay. 
Utbay oldbay Eurypylusyay ishay aidyay impartsyay, 
Andyay auntlessday ingsspray eneathbay ayay oudclay ofyay artsday; 
Osewhay eageryay avelinjay aunch’dlay againstyay ethay oefay, 
Eatgray Apisaonyay eltfay ethay atalfay owblay; 
Omfray ishay orntay iverlay ethay edray urrentcay ow’dflay, 
Andyay ishay ackslay eesknay esertday eirthay ingdyay oadlay. 
Ethay ictorvay ushingray otay espoilday ethay eadday, 
Omfray Aris’pay owbay ayay engefulvay arrowyay edflay; 
Ix’dfay inyay ishay ervousnay ighthay ethay eaponway oodstay, 
Ix’dfay asway ethay ointpay, utbay okenbray asway ethay oodway. 
Ackbay otay ethay ineslay ethay oundedway Eekgray etiredray, 
Yetyay usthay etreatingray, ishay associatesyay iredfay: 
 
“Atwhay odgay, Oyay Eciansgray! ashay youryay eartshay ismay’dday? 
Ohyay, urntay otay armsyay; ’tis Ajaxyay aimsclay youryay aidyay. 
Isthay ourhay ehay andsstay ethay arkmay ofyay ostilehay ageray, 
Andyay isthay ethay astlay avebray attlebay ehay allshay ageway: 
Astehay, oinjay youryay orcesfay; omfray ethay oomyglay avegray 
Ethay arriorway escueray, andyay youryay ountrycay avesay.” 
Usthay urgedyay ethay iefchay: ayay enerousgay ooptray appearsyay, 
Owhay eadspray eirthay ucklersbay, andyay advanceyay eirthay earsspay, 
Otay uardgay eirthay oundedway iendfray: ilewhay usthay eythay andstay 
Ithway iouspay arecay, eatgray Ajaxyay oinsjay ethay andbay: 
Eachyay akestay ewnay ouragecay atyay ethay ero’shay ightsay; 
Ethay erohay alliesray, andyay enewsray ethay ightfay. 
 
Usthay agedray othbay armiesyay ikelay onflictingcay iresfay, 
Ilewhay Estor’snay ariotchay arfay omfray ightfay etiresray: 
Ishay ourserscay eep’dstay inyay eatsway, andyay ain’dstay ithway oregay, 
Ethay Eeks’gray eserverpray, eatgray Achaonmay, orebay. 
Atthay ourhay Achillesyay, omfray ethay opmosttay eighthay 
Ofyay ishay oudpray eetflay, o’erlook’dyay ethay ieldsfay ofyay ightfay; 
Ishay eastedfay eyesyay eheldbay aroundyay ethay ainplay 
Ethay Eciangray outray, ethay ayingslay, andyay ethay ainslay. 
Ishay iendfray Achaonmay ingledsay omfray ethay estray, 
Ayay ansienttray itypay ouch’dtay ishay engefulvay eastbray. 
Aightstray otay Enoetius’may uch-lovedmay onsay ehay entsay: 
Acefulgray asyay Arsmay, Atrocluspay uitsqay ishay enttay; 
Inyay evilyay ourhay! Enthay atefay ecreedday ishay oomday, 
Andyay ix’dfay ethay ateday ofyay allyay ishay oesway otay omecay. 
 
“Whyay allscay myay iendfray? thyay ovedlay injunctionsyay aylay; 
Ate’erwhay thyay illway, Atrocluspay allshay obeyyay.” 
 
“OYAY irstfay ofyay iendsfray! (Elidespay usthay eplied)ray 
Illstay atyay myay earthay, andyay everyay atyay myay idesay! 
Ethay imetay isyay omecay, enwhay yonyay espairingday osthay 
Allshay earnlay ethay aluevay ofyay ethay anmay eythay ostlay: 
Ownay atyay myay eesknay ethay Eeksgray allshay ourpay eirthay oanmay, 
Andyay oudpray Atridesyay embletray onyay ishay onethray. 
Ogay ownay otay Estornay, andyay omfray imhay ebay aughttay 
Atwhay oundedway arriorway atelay ishay ariotchay oughtbray: 
Orfay, eensay atyay istanceday, andyay utbay eensay ehindbay, 
Ishay ormfay ecall’dray Achaonmay otay myay indmay; 
Ornay ouldcay Iyay, oughthray yonyay oudclay, iscernday ishay acefay, 
Ethay ourserscay ass’dpay emay ithway osay iftsway ayay acepay.” 
 
Ethay erohay aidsay. Ishay iendfray obey’dyay ithway astehay, 
Oughthray intermingledyay ipsshay andyay entstay ehay ass’dpay; 
Ethay iefschay escendingday omfray eirthay arcay ehay oundfay: 
Ethay antingpay eedsstay Eurymedonyay unboundyay. 
Ethay arriorsway andingstay onyay ethay eezybray oreshay, 
Otay dryay eirthay eatsway, andyay ashway awayyay ethay oregay, 
Erehay ausedpay ayay omentmay, ilewhay ethay entlegay alegay 
Onvey’dcay atthay eshnessfray ethay oolcay eassay exhaleyay; 
Enthay otay onsultcay onyay artherfay ethodsmay entway, 
Andyay ooktay eirthay eatssay eneathbay ethay adyshay enttay. 
Ethay aughtdray escribedpray, airfay Ecamedehay eparespray, 
Arsinous’yay aughterday, acedgray ithway oldengay airshay: 
(Omwhay otay ishay agedyay armsyay, ayay oyalray aveslay, 
Eecegray, asyay ethay izepray ofyay Estor’snay isdomway avegay:) 
Ayay abletay irstfay ithway azureyay eetfay eshay acedplay; 
Osewhay ampleyay orbyay ayay azenbray argerchay acedgray; 
Oneyhay ew-press’dnay, ethay acredsay ourflay ofyay eatwhay, 
Andyay olesomewhay arlicgay, own’dcray ethay avourysay eattray, 
Extnay erhay itewhay andhay anyay antiqueyay obletgay ingsbray, 
Ayay obletgay acredsay otay ethay Ianpylay ingskay 
Omfray eldestyay imestay: emboss’dyay ithway udsstay ofyay oldgay, 
Otway eetfay upportsay ityay, andyay ourfay andleshay oldhay; 
Onyay eachyay ightbray andlehay, endingbay o’eryay ethay inkbray, 
Inyay ulpturedscay oldgay, otway urtlestay eemsay otay inkdray: 
Ayay assymay eightway, yetyay eavedhay ithway easeyay byay imhay, 
Enwhay ethay iskbray ectarnay overlook’dyay ethay imbray. 
Emper’dtay inyay isthay, ethay nymphay ofyay ormfay ivineday 
Ourspay ayay argelay ortionpay ofyay ethay Amnianpray ineway; 
Ithway oat’s-milkgay eesechay ayay avourousflay astetay estowsbay, 
Andyay astlay ithway ourflay ethay ilingsmay urfacesay owsstray: 
Isthay orfay ethay oundedway incepray ethay ameday eparespray: 
Ethay ordialcay everagebay everendray Estornay aresshay: 
Alubrioussay aughtsdray ethay arriors’way irstthay allayyay, 
Andyay easingplay onferencecay eguilesbay ethay ayday. 
 
Eantimemay Atrocluspay, byay Achillesyay entsay, 
Unheardyay approachedyay, andyay oodstay eforebay ethay enttay. 
Oldyay Estornay, isingray enthay, ethay erohay edlay 
Otay ishay ighhay eatsay: ethay iefchay efusedray andyay aidsay: 
 
“’tis ownay onay easonsay orfay esethay indkay elaysday; 
Ethay eatgray Achillesyay ithway impatienceyay aysstay. 
Otay eatgray Achillesyay isthay espectray Iyay oweyay; 
Owhay asksyay, atwhay erohay, oundedway byay ethay oefay, 
Asway ornebay omfray ombatcay byay thyay oamingfay eedsstay? 
Ithway iefgray Iyay eesay ethay eatgray Achaonmay eedsblay. 
Isthay otay eportray, myay astyhay oursecay Iyay endbay; 
Outhay ow’stknay ethay ieryfay empertay ofyay myay iendfray.” 
“Ancay enthay ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray (Ethay agesay ejoin’d)ray 
Exciteyay ompassioncay inyay Achilles’yay indmay?
