Erewhay ethay arway agedray, andyay erewhay ethay umulttay ewgray. 
Oseclay otay ethay ernstay ofyay atthay amedfay ipshay ichwhay orebay 
Unbless’dyay Otesilauspray otay Ilion’syay oreshay, 
Ethay eatgray Onianpæay, oldbay Echmespyray oodstay; 
(Owhay edlay ishay andsbay omfray Axius’yay indingway oodflay;) 
Ishay oulder-bladeshay eceivesray ethay atalfay oundway; 
Ethay oaninggray arriorway antspay uponyay ethay oundgray. 
Ishay oopstray, atthay eesay eirthay ountry’scay oryglay ainslay, 
Flyay iverseday, atter’dscay o’eryay ethay istantday ainplay. 
Atroclus’pay armyay orbidsfay ethay eadingspray iresfay, 
Andyay omfray ethay alf-burn’dhay ipshay oudpray Oytray etiresray; 
Ear’dclay omfray ethay okesmay ethay oyfuljay avynay ieslay; 
Inyay eapshay onyay eapshay ethay oefay umultuoustay iesflay; 
Iumphanttray Eecegray erhay escuedray ecksday ascendsyay, 
Andyay oudlay acclaimyay ethay arrystay egionray endsray. 
Osay enwhay ickthay oudsclay enwrapyay ethay ountain’smay eadhay, 
O’eryay eaven’shay expanseyay ikelay oneyay ackblay eilingcay eadspray; 
Uddensay ethay Undererthay, ithway ayay ashingflay ayray, 
Urstsbay oughthray ethay arknessday, andyay etslay ownday ethay ayday: 
Ethay illshay ineshay outyay, ethay ocksray inyay ospectpray iseray, 
Andyay eamsstray, andyay alesvay, andyay orestsfay, ikestray ethay eyesyay; 
Ethay ilingsmay enescay ideway opensyay otay ethay ightsay, 
Andyay allyay ethay unmeasuredyay etheryay amesflay ithway ightlay. 
 
Utbay Oytray epulsedray, andyay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainsplay, 
Orcedfay omfray ethay avynay, yetyay ethay ightfay aintainsmay. 
Ownay everyyay Eekgray omesay ostilehay erohay ewslay, 
Utbay illstay ethay oremostfay, oldbay Atrocluspay ewflay: 
Asyay Areilycusyay adhay urn’dtay imhay oundray, 
Arpshay inyay ishay ighthay ehay eltfay ethay iercingpay oundway; 
Ethay azen-pointedbray earspay, ithway igourvay ownthray, 
Ethay ighthay ansfix’dtray, andyay okebray ethay ittlebray onebay: 
Eadlonghay ehay ellfay. Extnay, Oasthay asway thyay ancechay; 
Thyay eastbray, unarm’dyay, eceivedray ethay Artanspay ancelay. 
Ides’phylay artday (Asyay Amphidusyay ewdray igh)nay 
Ishay owblay eventedpray, andyay anspiercedtray ishay ighthay, 
Oretay allyay ethay awnbray, andyay entray ethay ervesnay awayyay; 
Inyay arknessday, andyay inyay eathday, ethay arriorway aylay. 
 
Inyay equalyay armsyay otway onssay ofyay Estornay andstay, 
Andyay otway oldbay othersbray ofyay ethay Ianlycay andbay: 
Byay eatgray Antilochusyay, Atymniusyay iesday, 
Iercedpay inyay ethay ankflay, amentedlay youthyay! ehay ieslay, 
Indkay Arismay, eedingblay inyay ishay other’sbray oundway, 
Efendsday ethay eathlessbray arcasecay onyay ethay oundgray; 
Uriousfay ehay iesflay, ishay urderermay otay engageyay: 
Utbay odlikegay Asimedthray eventspray ishay ageray, 
Etweenbay ishay armyay andyay ouldershay aimsyay ayay owblay; 
Ishay armyay allsfay outingspay onyay ethay ustday elowbay: 
Ehay inkssay, ithway endlessyay arknessday over’dcay o’eryay: 
Andyay entsvay ishay oulsay, effusedyay ithway ushinggay oregay. 
 
Ainslay byay otway othersbray, usthay otway othersbray eedblay, 
Arpedon’ssay iendsfray, Amisodarus’yay eedsay; 
Amisodarusyay, owhay, byay Uriesfay edlay, 
Ethay anebay ofyay enmay, abhorr’dyay Imaerachay edbray; 
Ill’dskay inyay ethay artday inyay ainvay, ishay onssay expireyay, 
Andyay aypay ethay orfeitfay ofyay eirthay uiltygay iresay. 
 
Opp’dstay inyay ethay umulttay Eobulusclay ieslay, 
Eneathbay Oïleus’yay armyay, ayay ivinglay izepray; 
Ayay ivinglay izepray otnay onglay ethay Ojantray oodstay; 
Ethay irstythay alchionfay ankdray ishay eekingray oodblay: 
Ungedplay inyay ishay oatthray ethay okingsmay eaponway ieslay; 
Ackblay eathday, andyay atefay unpityingyay, ealsay ishay eyesyay. 
 
Amidyay ethay anksray, ithway utualmay irstthay ofyay amefay, 
Onlycay ethay avebray, andyay iercefay Eneleuspay amecay; 
Inyay ainvay eirthay avelinsjay atyay eachyay otheryay ewflay, 
Ownay, etmay inyay armsyay, eirthay eageryay ordssway eythay ewdray. 
Onyay ethay umedplay estcray ofyay ishay Otianbœay oefay 
Ethay aringday Onlycay aim’dyay ayay oblenay owblay; 
Ethay ordsway okebray ortshay; utbay ishay, Eneleuspay edspay 
Ullfay onyay ethay uncturejay ofyay ethay ecknay andyay eadhay: 
Ethay eadhay, ividedday byay ayay okestray osay ustjay, 
Unghay byay ethay inskay; ethay odybay unksay otay ustday. 
 
O’ertakenyay Eamasnay byay Erionmay eedsblay, 
Iercedpay oughthray ethay ouldershay asyay ehay ountsmay ishay eedsstay; 
Ackbay omfray ethay arcay ehay umblestay otay ethay oundgray: 
Ishay immingsway eyesyay eternalyay adesshay urroundsay. 
 
Extnay Erymasyay asway oom’dday ishay atefay otay eelfay, 
Ishay open’dyay outhmay eceivedray ethay Etancray eelstay: 
Eneathbay ethay ainbray ethay ointpay ayay assagepay oretay, 
Ash’dcray ethay inthay onesbay, andyay own’ddray ethay eethtay inyay oregay: 
Ishay outhmay, ishay eyesyay, ishay ostrilsnay, ourpay ayay oodflay; 
Ehay obssay ishay oulsay outyay inyay ethay ushgay ofyay oodblay. 
 
Asyay enwhay ethay ocksflay eglectednay byay ethay ainsway, 
Oryay idskay, oryay ambslay, ielay atter’dscay o’eryay ethay ainplay, 
Ayay ooptray ofyay olvesway ethay unguardedyay argechay urveysay, 
Andyay endray ethay emblingtray, unresistingyay eypray: 
Usthay onyay ethay oefay ethay Eeksgray impetuousyay amecay; 
Oytray edflay, unmindfulyay ofyay erhay ormerfay amefay. 
 
Utbay illstay atyay Ectorhay odlikegay Ajaxyay aim’dyay, 
Illstay, ointedpay atyay ishay eastbray, ishay avelinjay amedflay. 
Ethay Ojantray iefchay, experiencedyay inyay ethay ieldfay, 
O’eryay ishay oadbray ouldersshay eadspray ethay assymay ieldshay, 
Observedyay ethay ormstay ofyay artsday ethay Eciansgray ourpay, 
Andyay onyay ishay ucklerbay aughtcay ethay ingingray owershay: 
Ehay eessay orfay Eecegray ethay alescay ofyay onquestcay iseray, 
Yetyay opsstay, andyay urnstay, andyay avessay ishay ovedlay alliesyay. 
 
Asyay enwhay ethay andhay ofyay Ovejay ayay empesttay ormsfay, 
Andyay ollsray ethay oudclay otay ackenblay eavenhay ithway ormsstay, 
Arkday o’eryay ethay ieldsfay ethay ascendingyay apourvay iesflay, 
Andyay adesshay ethay unsay, andyay otsblay ethay oldengay iesskay: 
Osay omfray ethay ipsshay, alongyay ethay uskyday ainplay, 
Ireday Ightflay andyay Errortay ovedray ethay Ojantray aintray. 
Evenyay Ectorhay edflay; oughthray eadshay ofyay isarrayday 
Ethay ieryfay ourserscay orcedfay eirthay ordlay awayyay: 
Ilewhay arfay ehindbay ishay Ojanstray allfay onfusedcay; 
Edgedway inyay ethay enchtray, inyay oneyay astvay arnagecay uisedbray: 
Ariotschay onyay ariotschay ollray: ethay ashingclay okesspay 
Ockshay; ilewhay ethay addingmay eedsstay eakbray ortshay eirthay yokesyay. 
Inyay ainvay eythay abourlay upyay ethay eepystay oundmay; 
Eirthay arioteerschay ielay oamingfay onyay ethay oundgray. 
Iercefay onyay ethay earray, ithway outsshay Atrocluspay iesflay; 
Umultuoustay amourclay illsfay ethay ieldsfay andyay iesskay; 
Ickthay iftsdray ofyay ustday involveyay eirthay apidray ightflay; 
Oudsclay iseray onyay oudsclay, andyay eavenhay isyay atch’dsnay omfray ightsay. 
Ethay affrightedyay eedsstay eirthay ingdyay ordslay astcay ownday, 
Ourscay o’eryay ethay ieldsfay, andyay etchstray otay eachray ethay owntay. 
Oudlay o’eryay ethay outray asway eardhay ethay ictor’svay cryay, 
Erewhay ethay arway eedsblay, andyay erewhay ethay ickestthay ieday, 
Erewhay orsehay andyay armsyay, andyay ariotschay ielay o’erthrownyay, 
Andyay eedingblay eroeshay underyay axlesyay oangray. 
Onay opstay, onay eckchay, ethay eedsstay ofyay Eleuspay ewknay: 
Omfray ankbay otay ankbay ethay immortalyay ourserscay ewflay. 
Igh-boundinghay o’eryay ethay ossefay, ethay irlingwhay arcay 
Okessmay oughthray ethay anksray, o’ertakesyay ethay ingflyay arway, 
Andyay understhay afteryay Ectorhay; Ectorhay iesflay, 
Atrocluspay akesshay ishay ancelay; utbay atefay eniesday. 
Otnay ithway esslay oisenay, ithway esslay impetuousyay orcefay, 
Ethay idetay ofyay Ojanstray urgeyay eirthay esperateday oursecay, 
Anthay enwhay inyay autumnyay Ovejay ishay uryfay ourspay, 
Andyay earthyay isyay oadenlay ithway incessantyay owersshay; 
(Enwhay uiltygay ortalsmay eakbray ethay eternalyay awslay, 
Oryay udgesjay, ibedbray, etraybay ethay ighteousray ausecay;) 
Omfray eirthay eepday edsbay ehay idsbay ethay iversray iseray, 
Andyay opensyay allyay ethay ood-gatesflay ofyay ethay iesskay: 
Ethay impetuousyay orrentstay omfray eirthay illshay obeyyay, 
Olewhay ieldsfay areyay own’ddray, andyay ountainsmay eptsway awayyay; 
Oudlay oarsray ethay elugeday illtay ityay eetsmay ethay ainmay; 
Andyay emblingtray anmay eessay allyay ishay abourslay ainvay! 
 
Andyay ownay ethay iefchay (Ethay oremostfay oopstray epell’d)ray 
Ackbay otay ethay ipsshay ishay estinedday ogresspray eldhay, 
Orebay ownday alfhay Oytray inyay ishay esistlessray ayway, 
Andyay orcedfay ethay outedray anksray otay andstay ethay ayday. 
Etweenbay ethay acespay erewhay ilversay Imoissay owsflay, 
Erewhay aylay ethay eetsflay, andyay erewhay ethay ampiresray oseray, 
Allyay imgray inyay ustday andyay oodblay Atrocluspay andsstay, 
Andyay urnstay ethay aughterslay onyay ethay onqueringcay andsbay. 
Irstfay Onouspray iedday eneathbay ishay ieryfay artday, 
Ichwhay iercedpay elowbay ethay ieldshay ishay aliantvay earthay. 
Estorthay asway extnay, owhay awsay ethay iefchay appearyay, 
Andyay ellfay ethay ictimvay ofyay ishay owardcay earfay; 
Unkshray upyay ehay atsay, ithway ildway andyay aggardhay eyeyay, 
Ornay oodstay otay ombatcay, ornay adhay orcefay otay flyay; 
Atrocluspay ark’dmay imhay asyay ehay unn’dshay ethay arway, 
Andyay ithway unmanlyyay emblingstray ookshay ethay arcay, 
Andyay opp’ddray ethay owingflay einsray. Imhay ’twixt ethay awsjay, 
Ethay avelinjay icksstay, andyay omfray ethay ariotchay awsdray. 
Asyay onyay ayay ockray atthay overhangsyay ethay ainmay, 
Anyay angleryay, udiousstay ofyay ethay inelay andyay anecay, 
Omesay ightymay ishfay awsdray antingpay otay ethay oreshay: 
Otnay ithway esslay easeyay ethay arbedbay avelinjay orebay 
Ethay apinggay astardday; asyay ethay earspay asway ookshay, 
Ehay ellfay, andyay ifelay ishay eartlesshay eastbray orsookfay. 
 
Extnay onyay Eryalusyay ehay iesflay; ayay onestay, 
Argelay asyay ayay ockray, asway byay ishay uryfay ownthray: 
Ullfay onyay ishay owncray ethay onderouspay agmentfray ewflay, 
Andyay urstbay ethay elmhay, andyay eftclay ethay eadhay inyay otway: 
Onepray otay ethay oundgray ethay eathlessbray arriorway ellfay, 
Andyay eathday involvedyay imhay ithway ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay. 
Enthay owlay inyay ustday Epaltesyay, Echiusyay, ielay; 
Ipheasyay, Evippusyay, Olymeluspay, ieday; 
Amphoterusyay andyay Erymasyay ucceedsay; 
Andyay astlay Epolemustlay andyay Espyray eedblay. 
Ere’erwhay ehay ovesmay, ethay owinggray aughtersslay eadspray 
Inyay eapshay onyay eapshay ayay onumentmay ofyay eadday. 
 
Enwhay ownay Arpedonsay ishay avebray iendsfray eheldbay 
Ovellinggray inyay ustday, andyay aspinggay onyay ethay ieldfay, 
Ithway isthay eproachray ishay ingflyay osthay ehay armsway: 
“Ohyay ainstay otay onourhay! ohyay isgraceday otay armsyay! 
Orsakefay, ingloriousyay, ethay ontendedcay ainplay; 
Isthay andhay unaidedyay allshay ethay arway ustainsay: 
Ethay asktay ebay inemay isthay ero’shay engthstray otay tryay, 
Owhay owsmay olewhay oopstray, andyay akesmay anyay armyyay flyay.” 
 
Ehay akespay: andyay, eakingspay, eapslay omfray offyay ethay arcay: 
Atrocluspay ightslay, andyay ernlystay aitsway ethay arway. 
Asyay enwhay otway ulturesvay onyay ethay ountain’smay eighthay 
Oopstay ithway esoundingray inionspay otay ethay ightfay; 
Eythay uffcay, eythay eartay, eythay aiseray ayay eamingscray cryay; 
Ethay esertday echoesyay, andyay ethay ocksray eplyray: 
Ethay arriorsway usthay opposedyay inyay armsyay, engageyay 
Ithway equalyay amoursclay, andyay ithway equalyay ageray. 
 
Ovejay iew’dvay ethay ombatcay: osewhay eventyay oreseenfay, 
Ehay usthay espokebay ishay istersay andyay ishay ueenqay: 
“Ethay ourhay awsdray onyay; ethay estiniesday ordainyay,[245] 
Myay odlikegay onsay allshay esspray ethay Ianphrygay ainplay: 
Alreadyyay onyay ethay ergevay ofyay eathday ehay andsstay, 
Ishay ifelay isyay owedyay otay iercefay Atroclus’pay andshay, 
Atwhay assionspay inyay ayay arent’spay eastbray ebateday! 
Aysay, allshay Iyay atchsnay imhay omfray impendingyay atefay, 
Andyay endsay imhay afesay otay Ialycay, istantday arfay 
Omfray allyay ethay angersday andyay ethay oilstay ofyay arway; 
Oryay otay ishay oomday myay avestbray offspringyay yieldyay, 
Andyay attenfay, ithway elestialcay oodblay, ethay ieldfay?” 
 
Enthay usthay ethay oddessgay ithway ethay adiantray eyesyay: 
“Atwhay ordsway areyay esethay, Oyay overeignsay ofyay ethay iesskay! 
Ortshay isyay ethay ateday escribedpray otay ortalmay anmay; 
Allshay Ovejay orfay oneyay extendyay ethay arrownay anspay, 
Osewhay oundsbay ereway ix’dfay eforebay ishay aceray eganbay? 
Owhay anymay onssay ofyay odsgay, oredoom’dfay otay eathday, 
Eforebay oudpray Ilionyay ustmay esignray eirthay eathbray! 
Ereway inethay exemptyay, ebateday ouldway iseray aboveyay, 
Andyay urmuringmay owerspay ondemncay eirthay artialpay Ovejay. 
Ivegay ethay oldbay iefchay ayay oriousglay atefay inyay ightfay; 
Andyay enwhay ethay ascendingyay oulsay ashay ing’dway erhay ightflay, 
Etlay Eepslay andyay Eathday onveycay, byay thyay ommandcay, 
Ethay eathlessbray odybay otay ishay ativenay andlay. 
Ishay iendsfray andyay eoplepay, otay ishay uturefay aisepray, 
Ayay arblemay ombtay andyay amidpyray allshay aiseray, 
Andyay astinglay onourshay otay ishay ashesyay ivegay; 
Ishay amefay (’tis allyay ethay eadday ancay ave)hay allshay ivelay.” 
 
Eshay aidsay: ethay oud-compellerclay, overcomeyay, 
Assentsyay otay atefay, andyay atifiesray ethay oomday. 
Enthay ouch’dtay ithway iefgray, ethay eepingway eavenshay istill’dday 
Ayay owershay ofyay oodblay o’eryay allyay ethay atalfay ieldfay: 
Ethay odgay, ishay eyesyay avertingyay omfray ethay ainplay, 
Amentslay ishay onsay, edestinedpray otay ebay ainslay, 
Arfay omfray ethay Ianlycay oresshay, ishay appyhay ativenay eignray. 
Ownay etmay inyay armsyay, ethay ombatantscay appearyay; 
Eachyay eavedhay ethay ieldshay, andyay oisedpay ethay iftedlay earspay; 
Omfray ongstray Atroclus’pay andhay ethay avelinjay edflay, 
Andyay ass’dpay ethay oingray ofyay aliantvay Asymedthray; 
Ethay ervesnay unbracedyay onay oremay ishay ulkbay ustainsay, 
Ehay allsfay, andyay allingfay itesbay ethay oodyblay ainplay. 
Otway oundingsay artsday ethay Ianlycay eaderlay ewthray: 
Ethay irstfay aloofyay ithway erringyay uryfay ewflay, 
Ethay extnay anspiercedtray Achilles’yay ortalmay eedstay, 
Ethay enerousgay Edasuspay ofyay Ebanthay eedbray: 
Ix’dfay inyay ethay oulder’sshay ointjay, ehay eel’dray aroundyay, 
Oll’dray inyay ethay oodyblay ustday, andyay aw’dpay ethay ipperyslay oundgray. 
Ishay uddensay allfay ethay entangledyay arnesshay okebray; 
Eachyay axleyay ackledcray, andyay ethay ariotchay ookshay: 
Enwhay oldbay Automedonyay, otay isengageday 
Ethay artingstay ourserscay, andyay estrainray eirthay ageray, 
Ividesday ethay acestray ithway ishay ordsway, andyay eedfray 
Ethay encumberedyay ariotchay omfray ethay ingdyay eedstay: 
Ethay estray ovemay onyay, obedientyay otay ethay einray: 
Ethay arcay ollsray owlyslay o’eryay ethay ustyday ainplay. 
 
Ethay oweringtay iefschay otay iercerfay ightfay advanceyay: 
Andyay irstfay Arpedonsay irl’dwhay ishay eightyway ancelay, 
Ichwhay o’eryay ethay arrior’sway ouldershay ooktay itsyay oursecay, 
Andyay entspay inyay emptyyay airyay itsyay ingdyay orcefay. 
Otnay osay Atroclus’pay ever-erringnay artday; 
Aim’dyay atyay ishay eastbray ityay iercedpay ayay ortalmay artpay, 
Erewhay ethay ongstray ibresfay indbay ethay olidsay earthay. 
Enthay asyay ethay ountainmay oakyay, oryay oplarpay alltay, 
Oryay inepay (Itfay astmay orfay omesay eatgray admiral)yay 
Odsnay otay ethay axeyay, illtay ithway ayay oaninggray oundsay 
Ityay inkssay, andyay eadsspray itsyay onourshay onyay ethay oundgray, 
Usthay ellfay ethay ingkay; andyay aidlay onyay earthyay upinesay, 
Eforebay ishay ariotchay etch’dstray ishay ormfay ivineday: 
Ehay asp’dgray ethay ustday istain’dday ithway eamingstray oregay, 
Andyay, alepay inyay eathday, aylay oaninggray onyay ethay oreshay. 
Osay ieslay ayay ullbay eneathbay ethay ion’slay awspay, 
Ilewhay ethay imgray avagesay indsgray ithway oamyfay awsjay 
Ethay emblingtray imbslay, andyay uckssay ethay okingsmay oodblay; 
Eepday oansgray, andyay ollowhay oarsray, ebellowray oughthray ethay oodway. 
 
Enthay otay ethay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ianlycay andbay 
Ethay ingdyay iefchay address’dyay ishay astlay ommandcay; 
“Aucusglay, ebay oldbay; thyay asktay ebay irstfay otay areday 
Ethay oriousglay angersday ofyay estructiveday arway, 
Otay eadlay myay oopstray, otay ombatcay atyay eirthay eadhay, 
Inciteyay ethay ivinglay, andyay upplysay ethay eadday. 
Elltay emthay, Iyay argedchay emthay ithway myay atestlay eathbray 
Otnay unrevengedyay otay earbay Arpedon’ssay eathday. 
Atwhay iefgray, atwhay ameshay, ustmay Aucusglay undergoyay, 
Ifyay esethay oil’dspay armsyay adornyay ayay Eciangray oefay! 
Enthay asyay ayay iendfray, andyay asyay ayay arriorway ightfay; 
Efendday myay odybay, onquercay inyay myay ightray: 
Atthay, aughttay byay eatgray examplesyay, allyay aymay tryay 
Ikelay eethay otay anquishvay, oryay ikelay emay otay ieday.” 
Ehay easedcay; ethay Atesfay uppress’dsay ishay abouringlay eathbray, 
Andyay ishay eyesyay arken’dday ithway ethay adesshay ofyay eathday. 
Ethay insultingyay ictorvay ithway isdainday estrodebay 
Ethay ostratepray incepray, andyay onyay ishay osombay odtray; 
Enthay ewdray ethay eaponway omfray ishay antingpay earthay, 
Ethay eekingray ibresfay ingingclay otay ethay artday; 
Omfray ethay ideway oundway ush’dgay outyay ayay eamstray ofyay oodblay, 
Andyay ethay oulsay issuedyay inyay ethay urplepay oodflay. 
Ishay ingflyay eedsstay ethay Idonsmyrmay etainday, 
Unguidedyay ownay, eirthay ightymay astermay ainslay. 
All-impotentyay ofyay aidyay, ansfix’dtray ithway iefgray, 
Unhappyyay Aucusglay eardhay ethay ingdyay iefchay: 
Ishay ainfulpay armyay, yetyay uselessyay ithway ethay artsmay 
Inflictedyay atelay byay Eucer’stay eadlyday artday, 
Upportedsay onyay ishay etterbay andhay ehay ay’dstay: 
Otay Usphœbay enthay (’twas allyay ehay ould)cay ehay ay’dpray: 
 
“All-seeingyay onarchmay! etherwhay Ia’slycay oastcay, 
Oryay acredsay Ilionyay, thyay ightbray esencepray oastbay, 
Owerfulpay alikeyay otay easeyay ethay etch’swray artsmay; 
Oyay earhay emay! odgay ofyay everyyay ealinghay artyay! 
Olay! iffstay ithway ottedclay oodblay, andyay iercedpay ithway ainpay, 
Atthay illsthray myay armyay, andyay ootsshay oughthray everyyay einvay, 
Iyay andstay unableyay otay ustainsay ethay earspay, 
Andyay ighsay, atyay istanceday omfray ethay oriousglay arway. 
Owlay inyay ethay ustday isyay eatgray Arpedonsay aidlay, 
Ornay Ovejay ouchsafedvay ishay aplesshay offspringyay aidyay; 
Utbay outhay, Oyay odgay ofyay ealthhay! thyay uccoursay endlay, 
Otay uardgay ethay elicsray ofyay myay aughter’dslay iendfray: 
Orfay outhay, oughthay istantday, anstcay estoreray myay ightmay, 
Otay eadhay myay Ianslycay, andyay upportsay ethay ightfay.” 
 
Apolloyay eardhay; andyay, uppliantsay asyay ehay oodstay, 
Ishay eavenlyhay andhay estrain’dray ethay uxflay ofyay oodblay; 
Ehay ewdray ethay oloursday omfray ethay oundedway artpay, 
Andyay eathedbray ayay iritspay inyay ishay isingray earthay. 
Enew’dray byay artyay ivineday, ethay erohay andsstay, 
Andyay ownsyay ethay assistanceyay ofyay immortalyay andshay. 
Irstfay otay ethay ightfay ishay ativenay oopstray ehay armsway, 
Enthay oudlylay allscay onyay Oy’stray indictivevay armsyay; 
Ithway ampleyay idesstray ehay alksstay omfray aceplay otay aceplay; 
Ownay iresfay Agenoryay, ownay Olydamaspay: 
Æneas extnay, andyay Ectorhay ehay accostsyay; 
Inflamingyay usthay ethay ageray ofyay allyay eirthay ostshay. 
 
“Atwhay oughtsthay, egardlessray iefchay! thyay eastbray employyay? 
Ohyay ootay orgetfulfay ofyay ethay iendsfray ofyay Oytray! 
Osethay enerousgay iendsfray, owhay, omfray eirthay ountrycay arfay, 
Eathebray eirthay avebray oulssay outyay inyay another’syay arway. 
Eesay! erewhay inyay ustday ethay eatgray Arpedonsay ieslay, 
Inyay actionyay aliantvay, andyay inyay ouncilcay iseway, 
Owhay uardedgay ightray, andyay eptkay ishay eoplepay eefray; 
Otay allyay ishay Ianslycay ostlay, andyay ostlay otay eethay! 
Etch’dstray byay Atroclus’pay armyay onyay yonderyay ainsplay, 
Oyay avesay omfray ostilehay ageray ishay ovedlay emainsray! 
Ahyay etlay otnay Eecegray ishay onquer’dcay ophiestray oastbay, 
Ornay onyay ishay orsecay evengeray erhay eroeshay ostlay!” 
 
Ehay okespay: eachyay eaderlay inyay ishay iefgray artookpay: 
Oytray, atyay ethay osslay, oughthray allyay erhay egionslay ookshay. 
Ansfix’dtray ithway eepday egretray, eythay iewvay o’erthrownyay 
Atyay onceyay ishay ountry’scay illarpay, andyay eirthay ownyay; 
Ayay iefchay, owhay edlay otay Oy’stray eleaguer’dbay allway 
Ayay osthay ofyay eroeshay, andyay outshinedyay emthay allyay. 
Iredfay, eythay ushray onyay; irstfay Ectorhay eekssay ethay oesfay, 
Andyay ithway uperiorsay engeancevay eatlygray owsglay. 
 
Utbay o’eryay ethay eadday ethay iercefay Atrocluspay andsstay, 
Andyay ousingray Ajaxyay, ousedray ethay isteninglay andsbay: 
 
“Eroeshay, ebay enmay; ebay atwhay youyay ereway eforebay; 
Oryay eighway ethay eatgray occasionyay, andyay ebay oremay. 
Ethay iefchay owhay aughttay ouryay oftylay allsway otay yieldyay, 
Ieslay alepay inyay eathday, extendedyay onyay ethay ieldfay. 
Otay uardgay ishay odybay Oytray inyay umbersnay iesflay; 
’Tis alfhay ethay oryglay otay aintainmay ouryay izepray. 
Astehay, ipstray ishay armsyay, ethay aughterslay oundray imhay eadspray, 
Andyay endsay ethay ivinglay Ianslycay otay ethay eadday.” 
 
Ethay eroeshay indlekay atyay ishay iercefay ommandcay; 
Ethay artialmay uadronssqay oseclay onyay eitheryay andhay: 
Erehay Oytray andyay Ialycay argechay ithway oudlay alarmsyay, 
Essaliathay erethay, andyay Eecegray, opposeyay eirthay armsyay. 
Ithway orridhay outsshay eythay irclecay oundray ethay ainslay; 
Ethay ashclay ofyay armouryay ingsray o’eryay allyay ethay ainplay. 
Eatgray Ovejay, otay ellsway ethay orrorshay ofyay ethay ightfay, 
O’eryay ethay iercefay armiesyay ourspay erniciouspay ightnay, 
Andyay oundray ishay onsay onfoundscay ethay arringway ostshay, 
Ishay atefay ennoblingyay ithway ayay owdcray ofyay ostsghay. 
 
Ownay Eecegray ivesgay ayway, andyay eatgray Epigeusyay allsfay; 
Agacleus’yay onsay, omfray Udium’sbay oftylay allsway; 
Owhay asedchay orfay urdermay encethay ayay uppliantsay amecay 
Otay Eleuspay, andyay ethay ilver-footedsay ameday; 
Ownay entsay otay Oytray, Achilles’yay armsyay otay aidyay, 
Ehay ayspay ueday engeancevay otay ishay insman’skay adeshay. 
Oonsay asyay ishay ucklesslay andhay adhay ouch’dtay ethay eadday, 
Ayay ock’sray argelay agmentfray under’dthay onyay ishay eadhay; 
Url’dhay byay Ectoreanhay orcefay ityay eftclay inyay aintway 
Ishay atter’dshay elmhay, andyay etch’dstray imhay o’eryay ethay ainslay. 
 
Iercefay otay ethay anvay ofyay ightfay Atrocluspay amecay, 
Andyay, ikelay anyay eagleyay artingday atyay ishay amegay, 
Ungspray onyay ethay Ojantray andyay ethay Ianlycay andbay. 
Atwhay iefgray thyay earthay, atwhay uryfay urgedyay thyay andhay, 
Oyay enerousgay Eekgray! enwhay ithway ullfay igourvay ownthray, 
Atyay Enelaussthay ewflay ethay eightyway onestay, 
Ichwhay unksay imhay otay ethay eadday: enwhay Oytray, ootay earnay 
Atthay armyay, ewdray ackbay; andyay Ectorhay earn’dlay otay earfay. 
Arfay asyay anyay ableyay andhay ayay ancelay ancay owthray, 
Oryay atyay ethay istslay, oryay atyay ethay ightingfay oefay; 
Osay arfay ethay Ojanstray omfray eirthay ineslay etiredray; 
Illtay Aucusglay, urningtay, allyay ethay estray inspiredyay. 
Enthay Athyclaeusbay ellfay eneathbay ishay ageray, 
Ethay onlyyay opehay ofyay Alcon’schay emblingtray ageyay; 
Ideway o’eryay ethay andlay asway etch’dstray ishay argelay omainday, 
Ithway atelystay eatssay, andyay ichesray estblay inyay ainvay: 
Imhay, oldbay ithway youthyay, andyay eageryay otay ursuepay 
Ethay ingflyay Ianslycay, Aucusglay etmay andyay ewslay; 
Iercedpay oughthray ethay osombay ithway ayay uddensay oundway, 
Ehay ellfay, andyay allingfay ademay ethay ieldsfay esoundray. 
Ethay Achaiansyay orrowsay orfay eirthay eroeshay ainslay; 
Ithway onqueringcay outsshay ethay Ojanstray akeshay ethay ainplay, 
Andyay owdcray otay oilspay ethay eadday: ethay Eeksgray opposeyay; 
Anyay ironyay irclecay oundray ethay arcasecay owsgray. 
 
Enthay avebray Aogonuslay esign’dray ishay eathbray, 
Espatch’dday byay Erionmay otay ethay adesshay ofyay eathday: 
Onyay Ida’syay olyhay illhay ehay ademay abodeyay, 
Ethay iestpray ofyay Ovejay, andyay onour’dhay ikelay ishay odgay. 
Etweenbay ethay awjay andyay earyay ethay avelinjay entway; 
Ethay oulsay, exhalingyay, issuedyay atyay ethay entvay. 
Ishay earspay Æneas atyay ethay ictorvay ewthray, 
Owhay oopingstay orwardfay omfray ethay eathday ithdrewway; 
Ethay ancelay iss’dhay armlesshay o’eryay ishay overingcay ieldshay, 
Andyay emblingtray uckstray, andyay ootedray inyay ethay ieldfay; 
Erethay yetyay arcescay entspay, ityay uiversqay onyay ethay ainplay, 
Entsay byay ethay eatgray Æneas’ armyay inyay ainvay. 
“Iftsway asyay outhay artyay (Ethay agingray erohay ies)cray 
Andyay ill’dskay inyay ancingday otay isputeday ethay izepray, 
Myay earspay, ethay estinedday assagepay adhay ityay oundfay, 
Adhay ix’dfay thyay activeyay igourvay otay ethay oundgray.” 
 
“OYAY aliantvay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ardanday osthay! 
(Insultedyay Erionmay usthay etortsray ethay oast)bay 
Ongstray asyay youyay areyay, ’tis ortalmay orcefay youyay usttray, 
Anyay armyay asyay ongstray aymay etchstray eethay inyay ethay ustday. 
Andyay ifyay otay isthay myay ancelay thyay atefay ebay ivengay, 
Ainvay areyay thyay auntsvay; uccesssay isyay illstay omfray eavenhay: 
Isthay, instantyay, endssay eethay ownday otay Uto’splay oastcay; 
Inemay isyay ethay oryglay, ishay thyay artingpay ostghay.” 
 
“OYAY iendfray (Enoetius’may onsay isthay answeryay ave)gay 
Ithway ordsway otay ombatcay, illyay efitsbay ethay avebray; 
Otnay emptyyay oastsbay ethay onssay ofyay Oytray epelray, 
Youryay ordssway ustmay ungeplay emthay otay ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay. 
Otay eakspay, eseemsbay ethay ouncilcay; utbay otay areday 
Inyay oriousglay actionyay, isyay ethay asktay ofyay arway.” 
 
Isthay aidsay, Atrocluspay otay ethay attlebay iesflay; 
Eatgray Erionmay ollowsfay, andyay ewnay outsshay ariseyay: 
Ieldsshay, elmetshay attleray, asyay ethay arriorsway oseclay; 
Andyay ickthay andyay eavyhay oundssay ethay ormstay ofyay owsblay. 
Asyay oughthray ethay illingshray alevay, oryay ountainmay oundgray, 
Ethay abourslay ofyay ethay oodman’sway axeyay esoundray; 
Owsblay ollowingfay owsblay areyay eardhay e-echoingray ideway, 
Ilewhay acklingcray orestsfay allfay onyay everyyay idesay: 
Usthay echoedyay allyay ethay ieldsfay ithway oudlay alarmsyay, 
Osay ellfay ethay arriorsway, andyay osay ungray eirthay armsyay. 
 
Ownay eatgray Arpedonsay onyay ethay andysay oreshay, 
Ishay eavenlyhay ormfay efacedday ithway ustday andyay oregay, 
Andyay uckstay ithway artsday byay arringway eroeshay edshay, 
Ieslay undistinguish’dyay omfray ethay ulgarvay eadday. 
Ishay ong-disputedlay orsecay ethay iefschay encloseyay, 
Onyay everyyay idesay ethay usybay ombatcay owsgray; 
Ickthay asyay eneathbay omesay epherd’sshay atch’dthay abodeyay 
(Ethay ailspay ighhay oamingfay ithway ayay ilkymay ood)flay 
Ethay uzzingbay iesflay, ayay erseveringpay aintray, 
Incessantyay armsway, andyay asedchay eturnray againyay. 
 
Ovejay iew’dvay ethay ombatcay ithway ayay ernstay urveysay, 
Andyay eyesyay atthay ash’dflay intolerableyay ayday. 
Ix’dfay onyay ethay ieldfay ishay ightsay, ishay eastbray ebatesday 
Ethay engeancevay ueday, andyay editatesmay ethay atesfay: 
Etherwhay otay urgeyay eirthay omptpray effectyay, andyay allcay 
Ethay orcefay ofyay Ectorhay otay Atroclus’pay allfay, 
Isthay instantyay eesay ishay ort-livedshay ophiestray onway, 
Andyay etchstray imhay eathlessbray onyay ishay aughter’dslay onsay; 
Oryay yetyay, ithway anymay ayay oul’ssay untimelyyay ightflay, 
Augmentyay ethay amefay andyay orrorhay ofyay ethay ightfay. 
Otay owncray Achilles’yay aliantvay iendfray ithway aisepray 
Atyay engthlay ehay oomsday; andyay, atthay ishay astlay ofyay aysday 
Allshay etsay inyay oryglay, idsbay imhay ivedray ethay oefay; 
Ornay unattendedyay eesay ethay adesshay elowbay. 
Enthay Ector’shay indmay ehay illsfay ithway ireday ismayday; 
Ehay ountsmay ishay arcay, andyay allscay ishay ostshay awayyay; 
Unksay ithway Oy’stray eavyhay atesfay, ehay eessay eclineday 
Ethay alesscay ofyay Ovejay, andyay antspay ithway aweyay ivineday. 
 
Enthay, ornay eforebay, ethay ardyhay Ianslycay edflay, 
Andyay eftlay eirthay onarchmay ithway ethay ommoncay eadday: 
Aroundyay, inyay eapshay onyay eapshay, ayay eadfuldray allway 
Ofyay arnagecay isesray, asyay ethay eroeshay allfay. 
(Osay Ovejay ecreedday!) Atyay engthlay ethay Eeksgray obtainyay 
Ethay izepray ontestedcay, andyay espoilday ethay ainslay. 
Ethay adiantray armsyay areyay byay Atrocluspay ornebay; 
Atroclus’pay ipsshay ethay oriousglay oilsspay adornyay. 
 
Enthay usthay otay Usphœbay, inyay ethay ealmsray aboveyay, 
Okespay omfray ishay onethray ethay oud-compellingclay Ovejay: 
“Escendday, myay Usphœbay! onyay ethay Ianphrygay ainplay, 
Andyay omfray ethay ightfay onveycay Arpedonsay ainslay; 
Enthay athebay ishay odybay inyay ethay alcrystay oodflay, 
Ithway ustday ishonour’dday, andyay eform’dday ithway oodblay; 
O’eryay allyay ishay imbslay ambrosialyay odoursyay edshay, 
Andyay ithway elestialcay obesray adornyay ethay eadday. 
Osethay itesray ischargedday, ishay acredsay orsecay equeathbay 
Otay ethay oftsay armsyay ofyay ilentsay Eepslay andyay Eathday. 
Eythay otay ishay iendsfray ethay immortalyay argechay allshay earbay; 
Ishay iendsfray ayay ombtay andyay amidpyray allshay earray: 
Atwhay onourhay ortalsmay afteryay eathday eceiveray, 
Osethay unavailingyay onourshay eway aymay ivegay!” 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] EEPSLAY ANDYAY EATHDAY ONVEYINGCAY ETHAY ODYBAY OFYAY ARPEDONSAY OTAY 
IALYCAY 
 
 
Apolloyay owsbay, andyay omfray ountmay Ida’syay eighthay, 
Iftsway otay ethay ieldfay ecipitatespray ishay ightflay; 
Encethay omfray ethay arway ethay eathlessbray erohay orebay, 
Eil’dvay inyay ayay oudclay, otay ilversay Imois’say oreshay; 
Erethay athedbay ishay onourablehay oundsway, andyay ess’ddray 
Ishay anlymay embersmay inyay ethay immortalyay estvay; 
Andyay ithway erfumespay ofyay eetsway ambrosialyay ewsday 
Estoresray ishay eshnessfray, andyay ishay ormfay enewsray. 
Enthay Eepslay andyay Eathday, otway instway ofyay ingedway aceray, 
Ofyay atchlessmay iftnesssway, utbay ofyay ilentsay acepay, 
Eceivedray Arpedonsay, atyay ethay od’sgay ommandcay, 
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay each’dray ethay Ianlycay andlay; 
Ethay orsecay amidstyay ishay eepingway iendsfray eythay aidlay, 
Erewhay endlessyay onourshay aitway ethay acredsay adeshay. 
 
Eanwhilemay Atrocluspay ourspay alongyay ethay ainsplay, 
Ithway oamingfay ourserscay, andyay ithway oosen’dlay einsray. 
Iercefay onyay ethay Ojantray andyay ethay Ianlycay ewcray, 
Ahyay indblay otay atefay! thyay eadlonghay uryfay ewflay: 
Againstyay atwhay atefay andyay owerfulpay Ovejay ordainyay, 
Ainvay asway thyay iend’sfray ommandcay, thyay ouragecay ainvay. 
Orfay ehay, ethay odgay, osewhay ounselscay uncontroll’dyay 
Ismayday ethay ightymay, andyay onfoundcay ethay oldbay; 
Ethay odgay owhay ivesgay, esumesray, andyay ordersyay allyay, 
Ehay urgedyay eethay onyay, andyay urgedyay eethay onyay otay allfay. 
 
Owhay irstfay, avebray erohay! byay atthay armyay asway ainslay, 
Owhay astlay eneathbay thyay engeancevay ess’dpray ethay ainplay; 
Enwhay eavenhay itselfyay thyay atalfay uryfay edlay, 
Andyay all’dcay otay illfay ethay umbernay ofyay ethay eadday? 
Adrestusyay irstfay; Autonousyay enthay ucceedssay; 
Echeclusyay ollowsfay; extnay youngyay Egasmay eedsblay, 
Epistoryay, Elanippusmay, itebay ethay oundgray; 
Ethay aughterslay, Elasusyay andyay Uliusmay own’dcray: 
Enthay unksay Artespylay otay eternalyay ightnay; 
Ethay estray, ispersingday, usttray eirthay atesfay otay ightflay. 
 
Ownay Oytray adhay oop’dstay eneathbay ishay atchlessmay owerpay, 
Utbay amingflay Usphœbay eptkay ethay acredsay owertay. 
Icethray atyay ethay attlementsbay Atrocluspay ookstray;[246] 
Ishay azingblay ægis icethray Apolloyay ookshay; 
Ehay iedtray ethay ourthfay; enwhay, urstingbay omfray ethay oudclay, 
Ayay oremay anthay ortalmay oicevay asway eardhay aloudyay. 
 
“Atrocluspay! easecay; isthay eaven-defendedhay allway 
Efiesday thyay ancelay; otnay atedfay yetyay otay allfay; 
Thyay iendfray, thyay eatergray arfay, ityay allshay ithstandway, 
Oytray allshay otnay oopstay evenyay otay Achilles’yay andhay.” 
 
Osay okespay ethay odgay owhay artsday elestialcay iresfay; 
Ethay Eekgray obeysyay imhay, andyay ithway aweyay etiresray. 
Ilewhay Ectorhay, eckingchay atyay ethay Anscæay atesgay 
Ishay antingpay ourserscay, inyay ishay eastbray ebatesday, 
Oryay inyay ethay ieldfay ishay orcesfay otay employyay, 
Oryay awdray ethay oopstray ithinway ethay allsway ofyay Oytray. 
Usthay ilewhay ehay oughtthay, esidebay imhay Usphœbay oodstay, 
Inyay Asius’yay apeshay, owhay eignedray byay Angar’ssay oodflay; 
(Thyay otherbray, Ecubahay! omfray Asdymay ungspray, 
Ayay aliantvay arriorway, aughtyhay, oldbay, andyay youngyay;) 
Usthay ehay accostsyay imhay. “Atwhay ayay amefulshay ightsay! 
Odgay! isyay ityay Ectorhay atthay orbearsfay ethay ightfay? 
Ereway inethay myay igourvay isthay uccessfulsay earspay 
Ouldshay oonsay onvincecay eethay ofyay osay alsefay ayay earfay. 
Urntay eethay, ahyay urntay eethay otay ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay, 
Andyay inyay Atroclus’pay oodblay effaceyay thyay ameshay. 
Erhapspay Apolloyay allshay thyay armsyay ucceedsay, 
Andyay eavenhay ordainsyay imhay byay thyay ancelay otay eedblay.” 
 
Osay okespay ethay inspiringyay odgay; enthay ooktay ishay ightflay, 
Andyay ungedplay amidstyay ethay umulttay ofyay ethay ightfay. 
Ehay idsbay Ebrioncay ivedray ethay apidray arcay; 
Ethay ashlay esoundsray, ethay ourserscay ushray otay arway. 
Ethay odgay ethay Ecians’gray inkingsay oulssay epress’dday, 
Andyay our’dpay iftsway iritsspay oughthray eachyay Ojantray eastbray. 
Atrocluspay ightslay, impatientyay orfay ethay ightfay; 
Ayay earspay ishay eftlay, ayay onestay employsyay ishay ightray: 
Ithway allyay ishay ervesnay ehay ivesdray ityay atyay ethay oefay. 
Ointedpay aboveyay, andyay oughray andyay ossgray elowbay: 
Ethay allingfay uinray ush’dcray Ebrion’scay eadhay, 
Ethay awlesslay offspringyay ofyay ingkay Iam’spray edbay; 
Ishay ontfray, owsbray, eyesyay, oneyay undistinguish’dyay oundway: 
Ethay urstingbay allsbay opdray ightlesssay otay ethay oundgray. 
Ethay arioteerchay, ilewhay yetyay ehay eldhay ethay einray, 
Uckstray omfray ethay arcay, allsfay eadlonghay onyay ethay ainplay. 
Otay ethay arkday adesshay ethay oulsay unwillingyay idesglay, 
Ilewhay ethay oudpray ictorvay usthay ishay allfay eridesday. 
 
“Oodgay eavenhay! atwhay activeyay eatsfay yonyay artistyay owsshay! 
Atwhay ilfulskay iversday areyay ouryay Ianphrygay oesfay! 
Arkmay ithway atwhay easeyay eythay inksay intoyay ethay andsay! 
Itypay atthay allyay eirthay acticepray isyay byay andlay!” 
 
Enthay ushingray uddensay onyay ishay ostratepray izepray, 
Otay oilspay ethay arcasecay iercefay Atrocluspay iesflay: 
Iftsway asyay ayay ionlay, erribletay andyay oldbay, 
Atthay eepssway ethay ieldfay, epopulatesday ethay oldfay; 
Iercedpay oughthray ethay auntlessday earthay, enthay umblestay ainslay, 
Andyay omfray ishay atalfay ouragecay indsfay ishay anebay. 
Atyay onceyay oldbay Ectorhay eapinglay omfray ishay arcay, 
Efendsday ethay odybay, andyay ovokespray ethay arway. 
Usthay orfay omesay aughter’dslay indhay, ithway equalyay ageray, 
Otway ordlylay ulersray ofyay ethay oodway engageyay; 
Ungstay ithway iercefay ungerhay, eachyay ethay eypray invadesyay, 
Andyay echoingyay oarsray ebellowray oughthray ethay adesshay. 
Ernstay Ectorhay astensfay onyay ethay arrior’sway eadhay, 
Andyay byay ethay ootfay Atrocluspay agsdray ethay eadday: 
Ilewhay allyay aroundyay, onfusioncay, ageray, andyay ightfray, 
Ixmay ethay ontendingcay ostshay inyay ortalmay ightfay. 
Osay entpay byay illshay, ethay ildway indsway oarray aloudyay 
Inyay ethay eepday osombay ofyay omesay oomyglay oodway; 
Eaveslay, armsyay, andyay eestray, aloftyay inyay airyay areyay ownblay, 
Ethay oadbray oaksyay acklecray, andyay ethay Anssylvay oangray; 
Isthay ayway andyay atthay, ethay attlingray icketthay endsbay, 
Andyay ethay olewhay orestfay inyay oneyay ashcray escendsday. 
Otnay ithway esslay oisenay, ithway esslay umultuoustay ageray, 
Inyay eadfuldray ockshay ethay ingledmay ostshay engageyay. 
Artsday ower’dshay onyay artsday, ownay oundray ethay arcasecay ingray; 
Ownay ightsflay ofyay arrowsyay oundingbay omfray ethay ingstray: 
Onesstay ollowfay onesstay; omesay atterclay onyay ethay ieldsfay, 
Omesay ardhay, andyay eavyhay, akeshay ethay oundingsay ieldsshay. 
Utbay erewhay ethay isingray irlwindwhay oudsclay ethay ainsplay, 
Unksay inyay oftsay ustday ethay ightymay iefchay emainsray, 
Andyay, etch’dstray inyay eathday, orgetsfay ethay uidinggay einsray! 
 
Ownay amingflay omfray ethay enithzay, Olsay adhay ivendray 
Ishay ervidfay orbyay oughthray alfhay ethay aultvay ofyay eavenhay; 
Ilewhay onyay eachyay osthay ithway equalyay empeststay ellfay 
Ethay oweringshay artsday, andyay umbersnay anksay otay ellhay. 
Utbay enwhay ishay eveningyay eelswhay o’erhungyay ethay ainmay, 
Adglay onquestcay estedray onyay ethay Eciangray aintray. 
Enthay omfray amidstyay ethay umulttay andyay alarmsyay, 
Eythay awdray ethay onquer’dcay orsecay andyay adiantray armsyay. 
Enthay ashray Atrocluspay ithway ewnay uryfay owsglay, 
Andyay eathingbray aughterslay, ourspay amidyay ethay oesfay. 
Icethray onyay ethay esspray ikelay Arsmay imselfhay ehay ewflay, 
Andyay icethray eethray eroeshay atyay eachyay onsetyay ewslay. 
Erethay endsyay thyay oryglay! erethay ethay Atesfay untwineyay 
Ethay astlay, ackblay emnantray ofyay osay ightbray ayay inelay: 
Apolloyay eadfuldray opsstay thyay iddlemay ayway; 
Eathday allscay, andyay eavenhay allowsyay onay ongerlay ayday! 
 
Orfay olay! ethay odgay inyay uskyday oudsclay enshrinedyay, 
Approachingyay ealtday ayay aggeringstay owblay ehindbay. 
Ethay eightyway ockshay ishay ecknay andyay ouldersshay eelfay; 
Ishay eyesyay ashflay arklesspay, ishay unn’dstay ensessay eelray 
Inyay iddygay arknessday; arfay otay istanceday ungflay, 
Ishay oundingbay elmethay onyay ethay ampaignchay ungray. 
Achilles’yay umeplay isyay ain’dstay ithway ustday andyay oregay; 
Atthay umeplay ichwhay evernay oop’dstay otay earthyay eforebay; 
Onglay usedyay, untouch’dyay, inyay ightingfay ieldsfay otay ineshay, 
Andyay adeshay ethay emplestay ofyay ethay admay ivineday. 
Ovejay oomsday ityay ownay onyay Ector’shay elmhay otay odnay; 
Otnay ong—forlay atefay ursuespay imhay, andyay ethay odgay. 
 
Ishay earspay inyay iversshay allsfay; ishay ampleyay ieldshay 
Opsdray omfray ishay armyay: ishay aldricbay owsstray ethay ieldfay: 
Ethay orsletcay ishay astonish’dyay eastbray orsakesfay: 
Ooselay isyay eachyay ointjay; eachyay ervenay ithway orrorhay akesshay; 
Upidstay ehay aresstay, andyay all-assistlessyay andsstay: 
Uchsay isyay ethay orcefay ofyay oremay anthay ortalmay andshay! 
 
Ayay Ardanday youthyay erethay asway, ellway ownknay otay amefay, 
Omfray Anthuspay ungspray, Euphorbusyay asway ishay amenay; 
Amedfay orfay ethay anagemay ofyay ethay oamingfay orsehay, 
Ill’dskay inyay ethay artday, andyay atchlessmay inyay ethay oursecay: 
Ullfay entytway ightsknay ehay umbledtay omfray ethay arcay, 
Ilewhay yetyay ehay earn’dlay ishay udimentsray ofyay arway. 
Ishay enturousvay earspay irstfay ewdray ethay ero’shay oregay; 
Ehay uckstray, ehay oundedway, utbay ehay urstday onay oremay. 
Ornay, oughthay isarm’dday, Atroclus’pay uryfay oodstay: 
Utbay iftsway ithdrewway ethay ong-protendedlay oodway. 
Andyay urn’dtay imhay ortshay, andyay erdedhay inyay ethay owdcray. 
Usthay, byay anyay armyay ivineday, andyay ortalmay earspay, 
Oundedway, atyay onceyay, Atrocluspay yieldsyay otay earfay, 
Etiresray orfay uccoursay otay ishay ocialsay aintray, 
Andyay iesflay ethay atefay, ichwhay eavenhay ecreedday, inyay ainvay. 
Ernstay Ectorhay, asyay ethay eedingblay iefchay ehay iewsvay, 
Eaksbray oughthray ethay anksray, andyay ishay etreatray ursuespay: 
Ethay ancelay arrestsyay imhay ithway ayay ortalmay oundway; 
Ehay allsfay, earthyay understhay, andyay ishay armsyay esoundray. 
Ithway imhay allyay Eecegray asway unksay; atthay omentmay allyay 
Erhay yet-survivingyay eroeshay eem’dsay otay allfay. 
Osay, orch’dscay ithway eathay, alongyay ethay esertday orescay, 
Ethay oamingray ionlay eetsmay ayay istlybray oarbay, 
Astfay byay ethay ingspray; eythay othbay isputeday ethay oodflay, 
Ithway amingflay eyesyay, andyay awsjay esmear’dbay ithway oodblay; 
Atyay engthlay ethay overeignsay avagesay insway ethay ifestray; 
Andyay ethay orntay oarbay esignsray ishay irstthay andyay ifelay. 
Atrocluspay usthay, osay anymay iefschay o’erthrownyay, 
Osay anymay iveslay effusedyay, expiresyay ishay ownyay. 
Asyay ingdyay ownay atyay Ector’shay eetfay ehay ieslay, 
Ehay ernlystay iewsvay imhay, andyay iumphanttray iescray: 
 
“Ielay erethay, Atrocluspay! andyay ithway eethay, ethay oyjay 
Thyay idepray onceyay omisedpray, ofyay ubvertingsay Oytray; 
Ethay anciedfay enesscay ofyay Ilionyay aptwray inyay amesflay, 
Andyay thyay oftsay easuresplay ervedsay ithway aptivecay amesday. 
Unthinkingyay anmay! Iyay oughtfay osethay owerstay otay eefray, 
Andyay uardgay atthay eauteousbay aceray omfray ordslay ikelay eethay: 
Utbay outhay ayay eypray otay ulturesvay altshay ebay ademay; 
Thyay ownyay Achillesyay annotcay endlay eethay aidyay; 
Oughthay uchmay atyay artingpay atthay eatgray iefchay ightmay aysay, 
Andyay uchmay enjoinyay eethay, isthay importantyay ayday. 
 
‘Return otnay, myay avebray iendfray (Erhapspay ehay aid)say, 
Ithoutway ethay oodyblay armsyay ofyay Ectorhay eadday.’ 
Ehay okespay, Atrocluspay arch’dmay, andyay usthay ehay edspay.” 
 
Upinesay, andyay ildlyway azinggay onyay ethay iesskay, 
Ithway aintfay, expiringyay eathbray, ethay iefchay epliesray: 
 
“Ainvay oasterbay! easecay, andyay owknay ethay owerspay ivineday! 
Ove’sjay andyay Apollo’syay isyay isthay eedday, otnay inethay; 
Otay eavenhay isyay owedyay ate’erwhay youryay ownyay youyay allcay, 
Andyay eavenhay itselfyay isarm’dday emay ereyay myay allfay. 
Adhay entytway ortalsmay, eachyay thyay atchmay inyay ightmay, 
Opposedyay emay airlyfay, eythay adhay unksay inyay ightfay: 
Byay atefay andyay Usphœbay asway Iyay irstfay o’erthrownyay, 
Euphorbusyay extnay; ethay irdthay eanmay artpay thyay ownyay. 
Utbay outhay, imperiousyay! earhay myay atestlay eathbray; 
Ethay odsgay inspireyay ityay, andyay ityay oundssay thyay eathday: 
Insultingyay anmay, outhay altshay ebay oonsay asyay Iyay; 
Ackblay atefay o’erhangsyay eethay, andyay thyay ourhay awsdray ighnay; 
Evenyay ownay onyay ife’slay astlay ergevay Iyay eesay eethay andstay, 
Iyay eesay eethay allfay, andyay byay Achilles’yay andhay.” 
 
Ehay aintsfay: ethay oulsay unwillingyay ingsway erhay ayway, 
(Ethay eauteousbay odybay eftlay ayay oadlay ofyay ay)clay 
Itsflay otay ethay onelay, uncomfortableyay oastcay; 
Ayay akednay, anderingway, elancholymay ostghay! 
 
Enthay Ectorhay ausingpay, asyay ishay eyesyay ehay edfay 
Onyay ethay alepay arcasecay, usthay address’dyay ethay eadday: 
 
“Omfray encewhay isthay odingbay eechspay, ethay ernstay ecreeday 
Ofyay eathday enouncedday, oryay whyay enouncedday otay emay? 
Whyay otnay asyay ellway Achilles’yay atefay ebay ivengay 
Otay Ector’shay ancelay? Owhay owsknay ethay illway ofyay eavenhay?” 
 
Ensivepay ehay aidsay; enthay essingpray asyay ehay aylay 
Ishay eathlessbray osombay, oretay ethay ancelay awayyay; 
Andyay upwardsyay astcay ethay orsecay: ethay eekingray earspay 
Ehay akesshay, andyay argeschay ethay oldbay arioteerchay. 
Utbay iftsway Automedonyay ithway oosen’dlay einsray 
Aptray inyay ethay ariotchay o’eryay ethay istantday ainsplay, 
Arfay omfray ishay ageray ethay immortalyay ourserscay ovedray; 
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay ereway ethay iftgay ofyay Ovejay. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] ÆSCULAPIUS 
 
 
 
 
OOKBAY IIXVAY. 
 
 
ARGUMENTYAY. 
 
 
ETHAY EVENTHSAY ATTLEBAY, ORFAY ETHAY ODYBAY OFYAY ATROCLUSPAY.—THE ACTSYAY OFYAY ENELAUSMAY. 
 
 
Enelausmay, uponyay ethay eathday ofyay Atrocluspay, efendsday ishay odybay omfray ethay enemyyay: 
Euphorbusyay, owhay attemptsyay ityay, isyay ainslay. Ectorhay advancingyay, Enelausmay 
etiresray; utbay oonsay eturnsray ithway Ajaxyay, andyay ivesdray imhay offyay. Isthay, Aucusglay 
objectsyay otay Ectorhay asyay ayay ightflay, owhay ereuponthay utspay onyay ethay armouryay ehay adhay 
onway omfray Atrocluspay, andyay enewsray ethay attlebay. Ethay Eeksgray ivegay ayway, illtay 
Ajaxyay alliesray emthay: Æneas ustainssay ethay Ojanstray. Æneas andyay Ectorhay attemptyay 
ethay ariotchay ofyay Achillesyay, ichwhay isyay ornebay offyay byay Automedonyay. Ethay orseshay ofyay 
Achillesyay eploreday ethay osslay ofyay Atrocluspay: Upiterjay overscay ishay odybay ithway ayay 
ickthay arknessday: ethay oblenay ayerpray ofyay Ajaxyay onyay atthay occasionyay. Enelausmay 
endssay Antilochusyay otay Achillesyay, ithway ethay ewsnay ofyay Atroclus’pay eathday: enthay 
eturnsray otay ethay ightfay, erewhay, oughthay attackedyay ithway ethay utmostyay uryfay, ehay 
andyay Erionesmay, assistedyay byay ethay Ajacesyay, earbay offyay ethay odybay otay ethay ipsshay. 
    The imetay isyay ethay eveningyay ofyay ethay eight-and-twentiethyay ayday. Ethay enescay 
    lies inyay ethay ieldsfay eforebay Oytray. 
 
 
Onyay ethay oldcay earthyay ivineday Atrocluspay eadspray, 
Ieslay iercedpay ithway oundsway amongyay ethay ulgarvay eadday. 
Eatgray Enelausmay, ouch’dtay ithway enerousgay oeway, 
Ingsspray otay ethay ontfray, andyay uardsgay imhay omfray ethay oefay. 
Usthay oundray erhay ew-fallennay youngyay ethay eiferhay ovesmay, 
Uitfray ofyay erhay oesthray, andyay irst-bornfay ofyay erhay oveslay; 
Andyay anxiousyay (Elplesshay asyay ehay ieslay, andyay are)bay 
Urnstay, andyay e-turnsray erhay, ithway ayay other’smay arecay, 
Opposedyay otay eachyay atthay earnay ethay arcasecay amecay, 
Ishay oadbray ieldshay immersglay, andyay ishay anceslay ameflay. 
 
Ethay onsay ofyay Anthuspay, ill’dskay ethay artday otay endsay, 
Eyesyay ethay eadday erohay, andyay insultsyay ethay iendfray. 
“Isthay andhay, Atridesyay, aidlay Atrocluspay owlay; 
Arriorway! esistday, ornay empttay anyay equalyay owblay: 
Otay emay ethay oilsspay myay owesspray onway, esignray: 
Epartday ithway ifelay, andyay eavelay ethay oryglay inemay.” 
 
Ethay Ojantray usthay: ethay Artanspay onarchmay urn’dbay 
Ithway enerousgay anguishyay, andyay inyay ornscay eturn’dray: 
“Augh’stlay outhay otnay, Ovejay! omfray thyay uperiorsay onethray, 
Enwhay ortalsmay oastbay ofyay owesspray otnay eirthay ownyay? 
Otnay usthay ethay ionlay oriesglay inyay ishay ightmay, 
Ornay antherpay avesbray ishay ottedspay oefay inyay ightfay, 
Ornay usthay ethay oarbay (Osethay errorstay ofyay ethay ainplay;) 
Anmay onlyyay auntsvay ishay orcefay, andyay auntsvay inyay ainvay. 
Utbay arfay ethay ainestvay ofyay ethay oastfulbay indkay, 
Esethay onssay ofyay Anthuspay entvay eirthay aughtyhay indmay. 
Yetyay ’twas utbay atelay, eneathbay myay onqueringcay eelstay 
Isthay oaster’sbay otherbray, Erenorhypay, ellfay; 
Againstyay ouryay armyay ichwhay ashlyray ehay efiedday, 
Ainvay asway ishay igourvay, andyay asyay ainvay ishay idepray. 
Esethay eyesyay eheldbay imhay onyay ethay ustday expireyay, 
Onay oremay otay eerchay ishay ousespay, oryay adglay ishay iresay. 
Esumptuouspray youthyay! ikelay ishay allshay ebay thyay oomday, 
Ogay, aitway thyay otherbray otay ethay Ianstygay oomglay; 
Oryay, ilewhay outhay ay’stmay, avoidyay ethay eaten’dthray atefay; 
Oolsfay aystay otay eelfay ityay, andyay areyay iseway ootay atelay.” 
 
Unmovedyay, Euphorbusyay usthay: “Atthay actionyay ownknay, 
Omecay, orfay myay other’sbray oodblay epayray thyay ownyay. 
Ishay eepingway atherfay aimsclay thyay estinedday eadhay, 
Andyay ousespay, ayay idowway inyay erhay idalbray edbay. 
Onyay esethay thyay onquer’dcay oilsspay Iyay allshay estowbay, 
Otay oothesay ayay onsort’scay andyay ayay arent’spay oeway. 
Onay ongerlay enthay eferday ethay oriousglay ifestray, 
Etlay eavenhay ecideday ouryay ortunefay, amefay, andyay ifelay.” 
 
Iftsway asyay ethay ordway ethay issilemay ancelay ehay ingsflay; 
Ethay ell-aim’dway eaponway onyay ethay ucklerbay ingsray, 
Utbay untedblay byay ethay assbray, innoxiousyay allsfay. 
Onyay Ovejay ethay atherfay eatgray Atridesyay allscay, 
Ornay iesflay ethay avelinjay omfray ishay armyay inyay ainvay, 
Ityay iercedpay ishay oatthray, andyay entbay imhay otay ethay ainplay; 
Ideway oughthray ethay ecknay appearsyay ethay islygray oundway, 
Onepray inkssay ethay arriorway, andyay ishay armsyay esoundray. 
Ethay iningshay ircletscay ofyay ishay oldengay airhay, 
Ichwhay evenyay ethay Acesgray ightmay ebay oudpray otay earway, 
Instarr’dyay ithway emsgay andyay oldgay, estrowbay ethay oreshay, 
Ithway ustday ishonour’dday, andyay eform’dday ithway oregay. 
 
Asyay ethay youngyay oliveyay, inyay omesay ansylvay enescay, 
Own’dcray byay eshfray ountainsfay ithway eternalyay eengray, 
Iftslay ethay aygay eadhay, inyay owysnay oweretsflay airfay, 
Andyay aysplay andyay ancesday otay ethay entlegay airyay; 
Enwhay olay! ayay irlwindwhay omfray ighhay eavenhay invadesyay 
Ethay endertay antplay, andyay ithersway allyay itsyay adesshay; 
Ityay ieslay uprootedyay omfray itsyay enialgay edbay, 
Ayay ovelylay uinray ownay efacedday andyay eadday: 
Usthay youngyay, usthay eautifulbay, Euphorbusyay aylay, 
Ilewhay ethay iercefay Artanspay oretay ishay armsyay awayyay. 
Oudpray ofyay ishay eedday, andyay oriousglay inyay ethay izepray, 
Affrightedyay Oytray ethay oweringtay ictorvay iesflay: 
Iesflay, asyay eforebay omesay ountainmay ion’slay ireyay 
Ethay illagevay urscay andyay emblingtray ainssway etireray, 
Enwhay o’eryay ethay aughter’dslay ullbay eythay earhay imhay oarray, 
Andyay eesay ishay awsjay istilday ithway okingsmay oregay: 
Allyay alepay ithway earfay, atyay istanceday atter’dscay oundray, 
Eythay outshay incessantyay, andyay ethay alesvay esoundray. 
 
Eanwhilemay Apolloyay iew’dvay ithway enviousyay eyesyay, 
Andyay urgedyay eatgray Ectorhay otay isputeday ethay izepray; 
(Inyay Entes’may apeshay, eneathbay osewhay artialmay arecay 
Ethay oughray Iconianscay earn’dlay ethay adetray ofyay arway;)[247] 
“Orbearfay (Ehay ied)cray ithway uitlessfray eedspay otay asechay 
Achilles’yay ourserscay, ofyay etherealyay aceray; 
Eythay oopstay otnay, esethay, otay ortalmay an’smay ommandcay, 
Oryay oopstay otay onenay utbay eatgray Achilles’yay andhay. 
Ootay onglay amusedyay ithway ayay ursuitpay osay ainvay, 
Urntay, andyay eholdbay ethay avebray Euphorbusyay ainslay; 
Byay Artaspay ainslay! orfay everyay ownay uppress’dsay 
Ethay irefay ichwhay urn’dbay inyay atthay undauntedyay eastbray!” 
 
Usthay avinghay okespay, Apolloyay ing’dway ishay ightflay, 
Andyay ix’dmay ithway ortalsmay inyay ethay oilstay ofyay ightfay: 
Ishay ordsway infix’dyay unutterableyay arecay 
Eepday inyay eatgray Ector’shay oulsay: oughthray allyay ethay arway 
Ehay artsday ishay anxiousyay eyeyay; andyay, instantyay, iew’dvay 
Ethay eathlessbray erohay inyay ishay oodblay imbuedyay, 
(Orthfay ellingway omfray ethay oundway, asyay onepray ehay ay)lay 
Andyay inyay ethay ictor’svay andshay ethay iningshay eypray. 
Eath’dshay inyay ightbray armsyay, oughthray eavingclay anksray ehay iesflay, 
Andyay endssay ishay oicevay inyay underthay otay ethay iesskay: 
Iercefay asyay ayay oodflay ofyay ameflay byay Ulcanvay entsay, 
Ityay ewflay, andyay iredfay ethay ationsnay asyay ityay entway. 
Atridesyay omfray ethay oicevay ethay ormstay ivinedday, 
Andyay usthay exploredyay ishay ownyay unconquer’dyay indmay: 
 
“Enthay allshay Iyay uitqay Atrocluspay onyay ethay ainplay, 
Ainslay inyay myay ausecay, andyay orfay myay onourhay ainslay! 
Esertday ethay armsyay, ethay elicsray, ofyay myay iendfray? 
Oryay inglysay, Ectorhay andyay ishay oopstray attendyay? 
Uresay erewhay uchsay artialpay avourfay eavenhay estow’dbay, 
Otay avebray ethay erohay ereway otay avebray ethay odgay: 
Orgivefay emay, Eecegray, ifyay onceyay Iyay uitqay ethay ieldfay; 
’Tis otnay otay Ectorhay, utbay otay eavenhay Iyay yieldyay. 
Yetyay, ornay ethay odgay, ornay eavenhay, ouldshay ivegay emay earfay, 
Idday utbay ethay oicevay ofyay Ajaxyay eachray myay earyay: 
Illstay ouldway eway urntay, illstay attlebay onyay ethay ainsplay, 
Andyay ivegay Achillesyay allyay atthay yetyay emainsray 
Ofyay ishay andyay ouryay Atroclus—pay” Isthay, onay oremay 
Ethay imetay allow’dyay: Oytray icken’dthay onyay ethay oreshay. 
Ayay ablesay enescay! Ethay errorstay Ectorhay edlay. 
Owslay ehay ecedesray, andyay ighingsay uitsqay ethay eadday. 
 
Osay omfray ethay oldfay ethay unwillingyay ionlay artspay, 
Orcedfay byay oudlay amoursclay, andyay ayay ormstay ofyay artsday; 
Ehay iesflay indeedyay, utbay eatensthray asyay ehay iesflay, 
Ithway earthay indignantyay andyay etortedray eyesyay. 
Ownay enter’dyay inyay ethay Artanspay anksray, ehay urn’dtay 
Ishay anlymay eastbray, andyay ithway ewnay uryfay urn’dbay; 
O’eryay allyay ethay ackblay attalionsbay entsay ishay iewvay, 
Andyay oughthray ethay oudclay ethay odlikegay Ajaxyay ewknay; 
Erewhay abouringlay onyay ethay eftlay ethay arriorway oodstay, 
Allyay imgray inyay armsyay, andyay over’dcay o’eryay ithway oodblay; 
Erethay eathingbray ouragecay, erewhay ethay odgay ofyay ayday 
Adhay unksay eachyay earthay ithway errortay andyay ismayday. 
 
Otay imhay ethay ingkay: “Ohyay Ajaxyay, ohyay myay iendfray! 
Astehay, andyay Atroclus’pay ovedlay emainsray efendday: 
Ethay odybay otay Achillesyay otay estoreray 
Emandsday ouryay arecay; alasyay, eway ancay onay oremay! 
Orfay akednay ownay, espoiledday ofyay armsyay, ehay ieslay; 
Andyay Ectorhay oriesglay inyay ethay azzlingday izepray.” 
Ehay aidsay, andyay ouch’dtay ishay earthay. Ethay agingray airpay 
Iercedpay ethay ickthay attlebay, andyay ovokepray ethay arway. 
Alreadyyay adhay ernstay Ectorhay eizedsay ishay eadhay, 
Andyay oom’dday otay Ojantray odsgay ethay unhappyyay eadday; 
Utbay oonsay asyay Ajaxyay ear’dray ishay ower-liketay ieldshay, 
Ungspray otay ishay arcay, andyay easuredmay ackbay ethay ieldfay, 
Ishay aintray otay Oytray ethay adiantray armouryay earbay, 
Otay andstay ayay ophytray ofyay ishay amefay inyay arway. 
 
Eanwhilemay eatgray Ajaxyay (Ishay oadbray ieldshay isplay’d)day 
Uardsgay ethay eadday erohay ithway ethay eadfuldray adeshay; 
Andyay ownay eforebay, andyay ownay ehindbay ehay oodstay: 
Usthay inyay ethay entrecay ofyay omesay oomyglay oodway, 
Ithway anymay ayay epstay, ethay ionesslay urroundssay 
Erhay awnytay youngyay, esetbay byay enmay andyay oundshay; 
Elateyay erhay earthay, andyay ousingray allyay erhay owerspay, 
Arkday o’eryay ethay ieryfay allsbay eachyay anginghay eyebrowyay ourslay. 
Astfay byay ishay idesay ethay enerousgay Artanspay owsglay 
Ithway eatgray evengeray, andyay eedsfay ishay inwardyay oesway. 
 
Utbay Aucusglay, eaderlay ofyay ethay Ianlycay aidsyay, 
Onyay Ectorhay owningfray, usthay ishay ightflay upbraidsyay: 
 
“Erewhay ownay inyay Ectorhay allshay eway Ectorhay indfay? 
Ayay anlymay ormfay, ithoutway ayay anlymay indmay. 
Isyay isthay, Oyay iefchay! ayay ero’shay oastedbay amefay? 
Owhay ainvay, ithoutway ethay eritmay, isyay ethay amenay! 
Incesay attlebay isyay enouncedray, thyay oughtsthay employyay 
Atwhay otheryay ethodsmay aymay eservepray thyay Oytray: 
’Tis imetay otay tryay ifyay Ilion’syay atestay ancay andstay 
Byay eethay aloneyay, ornay askyay ayay oreignfay andhay: 
Eanmay, emptyyay oastbay! utbay allshay ethay Ianslycay akestay 
Eirthay iveslay orfay youyay? osethay Ianslycay youyay orsakefay? 
Atwhay omfray thyay anklessthay armsyay ancay eway expectyay? 
Thyay iendfray Arpedonsay ovespray thyay asebay eglectnay; 
Aysay, allshay ouryay aughter’dslay odiesbay uardgay youryay allsway, 
Ilewhay unreveng’dyay ethay eatgray Arpedonsay allsfay? 
Evenyay erewhay ehay iedday orfay Oytray, youyay eftlay imhay erethay, 
Ayay eastfay orfay ogsday, andyay allyay ethay owlsfay ofyay airyay. 
Onyay myay ommandcay ifyay anyyay Ianlycay aitway, 
Encehay etlay imhay archmay, andyay ivegay upyay Oytray otay atefay. 
Idday uchsay ayay iritspay asyay ethay odsgay impartyay 
Impelyay oneyay Ojantray andhay oryay Ojantray earthay, 
(Uchsay asyay ouldshay urnbay inyay everyyay oulsay atthay awsdray 
Ethay ordsway orfay oryglay, andyay ishay ountry’scay ause)cay 
Evenyay yetyay ouryay utualmay armsyay eway ightmay employyay, 
Andyay agdray yonyay arcasecay otay ethay allsway ofyay Oytray. 
Ohyay! ereway Atrocluspay oursyay, eway ightmay obtainyay 
Arpedon’ssay armsyay andyay onour’dhay orsecay againyay! 
Eecegray ithway Achilles’yay iendfray ouldshay ebay epaidray, 
Andyay usthay ueday onourshay urchasedpay otay ishay adeshay. 
Utbay ordsway areyay ain—letvay Ajaxyay onceyay appearyay, 
Andyay Ectorhay emblestray andyay ecedesray ithway earfay; 
Outhay ar’stday otnay eetmay ethay errorstay ofyay ishay eyeyay; 
Andyay olay! alreadyyay outhay epar’stpray otay flyay.” 
 
Ethay Ojantray iefchay ithway ix’dfay esentmentray eyedyay 
Ethay Ianlycay eaderlay, andyay edatesay epliedray: 
 
“Aysay, isyay ityay ustjay, myay iendfray, atthay Ector’shay earyay 
Omfray uchsay ayay arriorway uchsay ayay eechspay ouldshay earhay? 
Iyay eem’dday eethay onceyay ethay isestway ofyay thyay indkay, 
Utbay illyay isthay insultyay uitssay ayay udentpray indmay. 
Iyay unshay eatgray Ajaxyay? Iyay esertday myay aintray? 
’Tis inemay otay ovepray ethay ashray assertionyay ainvay; 
Iyay oyjay otay inglemay erewhay ethay attlebay eedsblay, 
Andyay earhay ethay underthay ofyay ethay oundingsay eedsstay. 
Utbay Ove’sjay ighhay illway isyay everyay uncontroll’dyay, 
Ethay ongstray ehay ithersway, andyay onfoundscay ethay oldbay; 
Ownay ownscray ithway amefay ethay ightymay anmay, andyay ownay 
Ikesstray ethay eshfray arlandgay omfray ethay ictor’svay owbray! 
Omecay, oughthray yonyay uadronssqay etlay usyay ewhay ethay ayway, 
Andyay outhay ebay itnessway, ifyay Iyay earfay o-daytay; 
Ifyay yetyay ayay Eekgray ethay ightsay ofyay Ectorhay eaddray, 
Oryay yetyay eirthay erohay areday efendday ethay eadday.” 
 
Enthay urningtay otay ethay artialmay ostshay, ehay iescray: 
“Yeyay Ojanstray, Ardansday, Ianslycay, andyay alliesyay! 
Ebay enmay, myay iendsfray, inyay actionyay asyay inyay amenay, 
Andyay yetyay ebay indfulmay ofyay youryay ancientyay amefay. 
Ectorhay inyay oudpray Achilles’yay armsyay allshay ineshay, 
Orntay omfray ishay iendfray, byay ightray ofyay onquestcay inemay.” 
 
Ehay odestray alongyay ethay ieldfay, asyay usthay ehay aidsay: 
(Ethay ablesay umageplay oddednay o’eryay ishay eadhay:) 
Iftsway oughthray ethay aciousspay ainplay ehay entsay ayay ooklay; 
Oneyay instantyay awsay, oneyay instantyay overtookyay 
Ethay istantday andbay, atthay onyay ethay andysay oreshay 
Ethay adiantray oilsspay otay acredsay Ilionyay orebay. 
Erethay ishay ownyay ailmay unbracedyay ethay ieldfay estrow’dbay; 
Ishay aintray otay Oytray onvey’dcay ethay assymay oadlay. 
Ownay azingblay inyay ethay immortalyay armsyay ehay andsstay; 
Ethay orkway andyay esentpray ofyay elestialcay andshay; 
Byay agedyay Eleuspay otay Achillesyay ivengay, 
Asyay irstfay otay Eleuspay byay ethay ourtcay ofyay eavenhay: 
Ishay ather’sfay armsyay otnay onglay Achillesyay earsway, 
Orbidfay byay atefay otay eachray ishay ather’sfay yearsyay. 
 
Imhay, oudpray inyay iumphtray, itteringglay omfray afaryay, 
Ethay odgay osewhay underthay endsray ethay oubledtray airyay 
Eheldbay ithway itypay; asyay apartyay ehay atsay, 
Andyay, onsciouscay, ook’dlay oughthray allyay ethay enescay ofyay atefay. 
Ehay ookshay ethay acredsay onourshay ofyay ishay eadhay; 
Olympusyay embledtray, andyay ethay odheadgay aidsay; 
“Ahyay, etchedwray anmay! unmindfulyay ofyay thyay endyay! 
Ayay oment’smay oryglay; andyay atwhay atesfay attendyay! 
Inyay eavenlyhay anoplypay ivinelyday ightbray 
Outhay and’ststay, andyay armiesyay embletray atyay thyay ightsay, 
Asyay atyay Achilles’yay elfsay! eneathbay thyay artday 
Ieslay ainslay ethay eatgray Achilles’yay earerday artpay. 
Outhay omfray ethay ightymay eadday osethay armsyay asthay orntay, 
Ichwhay onceyay ethay eatestgray ofyay ankindmay adhay ornway. 
Yetyay ivelay! Iyay ivegay eethay oneyay illustriousyay ayday, 
Ayay azeblay ofyay oryglay ereyay outhay ad’stfay awayyay. 
Orfay ahyay! onay oremay Andromacheyay allshay omecay 
Ithway oyfuljay earstay otay elcomeway Ectorhay omehay; 
Onay oremay officiousyay, ithway endearingyay armschay, 
Omfray thyay iredtay imbslay unbraceyay Elides’pay armsyay!” 
 
Enthay ithway ishay ablesay owbray ehay avegay ethay odnay 
Atthay ealssay ishay ordway; ethay anctionsay ofyay ethay odgay. 
Ethay ubbornstay armsyay (Byay Ove’sjay ommandcay isposed)day 
Onform’dcay ontaneousspay, andyay aroundyay imhay osedclay: 
Ill’dfay ithway ethay odgay, enlargedyay ishay embersmay ewgray, 
Oughthray allyay ishay einsvay ayay uddensay igourvay ewflay, 
Ethay oodblay inyay iskerbray idestay eganbay otay ollray, 
Andyay Arsmay imselfhay amecay ushingray onyay ishay oulsay. 
Exhortingyay oudlay oughthray allyay ethay ieldfay ehay odestray, 
Andyay ook’dlay, andyay ovedmay, Achillesyay, oryay ayay odgay. 
Ownay Esthlesmay, Aucusglay, Edonmay, ehay inspiresyay, 
Ownay Orcysphay, Omiuschray, andyay Ippothoushay iresfay; 
Ethay eatgray Ersilochusthay ikelay uryfay oundfay, 
Asteropaeusyay indledkay atyay ethay oundsay, 
Andyay Ennomusyay, inyay auguryyay enown’dray. 
 
“Earhay, allyay yeyay ostshay, andyay earhay, unnumber’dyay andsbay 
Ofyay eighbouringnay ationsnay, oryay ofyay istantday andslay! 
’Twas otnay orfay atestay eway ummon’dsay youyay osay arfay, 
Otay oastbay ouryay umbersnay, andyay ethay omppay ofyay arway: 
Yeyay amecay otay ightfay; ayay aliantvay oefay otay asechay, 
Otay avesay ouryay esentpray, andyay ouryay uturefay aceray. 
Orfay isthay, ouryay ealthway, ouryay oductspray, youyay enjoyyay, 
Andyay eanglay ethay elicsray ofyay exhaustedyay Oytray. 
Ownay enthay, otay onquercay oryay otay ieday eparepray; 
Otay ieday oryay onquercay areyay ethay ermstay ofyay arway. 
Ateverwhay andhay allshay inway Atrocluspay ainslay, 
Oe’erwhay allshay agdray imhay otay ethay Ojantray aintray, 
Ithway Ector’shay elfsay allshay equalyay onourshay aimclay; 
Ithway Ectorhay artpay ethay oilspay, andyay areshay ethay amefay.” 
 
Iredfay byay ishay ordsway, ethay oopstray ismissday eirthay earsfay, 
Eythay oinjay, eythay ickenthay, eythay otendpray eirthay earsspay; 
Ullfay onyay ethay Eeksgray eythay ivedray inyay irmfay arrayyay, 
Andyay eachyay omfray Ajaxyay opeshay ethay oriousglay eypray: 
Ainvay opehay! atwhay umbersnay allshay ethay ieldfay o’erspreadyay, 
Atwhay ictimsvay erishpay oundray ethay ightymay eadday! 
 
Eatgray Ajaxyay ark’dmay ethay owinggray ormstay omfray arfay, 
Andyay usthay espokebay ishay otherbray ofyay ethay arway: 
“Ouryay atalfay ayday, alasyay! isyay omecay, myay iendfray; 
Andyay allyay ouryay arsway andyay oriesglay atyay anyay endyay! 
’Tis otnay isthay orsecay aloneyay eway uardgay inyay ainvay, 
Ondemn’dcay otay ulturesvay onyay ethay Ojantray ainplay; 
Eway ootay ustmay yieldyay: ethay amesay adsay atefay ustmay allfay 
Onyay eethay, onyay emay, erhapspay, myay iendfray, onyay allyay. 
Eesay atwhay ayay empesttay irefulday Ectorhay eadsspray, 
Andyay olay! ityay urstsbay, ityay understhay onyay ouryay eadshay! 
Allcay onyay ouryay Eeksgray, ifyay anyyay earhay ethay allcay, 
Ethay avestbray Eeksgray: isthay ourhay emandsday emthay allyay.” 
 
Ethay arriorway aisedray ishay oicevay, andyay ideway aroundyay 
Ethay ieldfay e-echoedray ethay istressfulday oundsay. 
“OYAY iefschay! Oyay incespray, otay osewhay andhay isyay ivengay 
Ethay uleray ofyay enmay; osewhay oryglay isyay omfray eavenhay! 
Omwhay ithway ueday onourshay othbay Atridesyay acegray: 
Yeyay uidesgay andyay uardiansgay ofyay ouryay Argiveyay aceray! 
Allyay, omwhay isthay ell-knownway oicevay allshay eachray omfray arfay, 
Allyay, omwhay Iyay eesay otnay oughthray isthay oudclay ofyay arway; 
Omecay allyay! etlay enerousgay ageray youryay armsyay employyay, 
Andyay avesay Atrocluspay omfray ethay ogsday ofyay Oytray.” 
 
Oileanyay Ajaxyay irstfay ethay oicevay obey’dyay, 
Iftsway asway ishay acepay, andyay eadyray asway ishay aidyay: 
Extnay imhay Idomeneusyay, oremay owslay ithway ageyay, 
Andyay Erionmay, urningbay ithway ayay ero’shay ageray. 
Ethay ong-succeedinglay umbersnay owhay ancay amenay? 
Utbay allyay ereway Eeksgray, andyay eageryay allyay orfay amefay. 
Iercefay otay ethay argechay eatgray Ectorhay edlay ethay ongthray; 
Olewhay Oytray embodiedyay ush’dray ithway outsshay alongyay. 
Usthay, enwhay ayay ountainmay illowbay oamsfay andyay avesray, 
Erewhay omesay olnsway iverray isemboguesday ishay avesway, 
Ullfay inyay ethay outhmay isyay opp’dstay ethay ushingray idetay, 
Ethay oilingbay oceanyay orksway omfray idesay otay idesay, 
Ethay iverray emblestray otay ishay utmostyay oreshay, 
Andyay istantday ocksray e-bellowray otay ethay oarray. 
 
Ornay esslay esolvedray, ethay irmfay Achaianyay andbay 
Ithway azenbray ieldsshay inyay orridhay irclecay andstay. 
Ovejay, ouringpay arknessday o’eryay ethay ingledmay ightfay, 
Oncealscay ethay arriors’way iningshay elmshay inyay ightnay: 
Otay imhay, ethay iefchay orfay omwhay ethay ostshay ontendcay 
Adhay ivedlay otnay atefulhay, orfay ehay ivedlay ayay iendfray: 
Eadday ehay otectspray imhay ithway uperiorsay arecay. 
Ornay oomsday ishay arcasecay otay ethay irdsbay ofyay airyay. 
 
 
[Illustrationyay: ] IGHTFAY ORFAY ETHAY ODYBAY OFYAY ATROCLUSPAY 
 
 
Ethay irstfay attackyay ethay Eciansgray arcescay ustainsay, 
Epulsedray, eythay yieldyay; ethay Ojanstray eizesay ethay ainslay. 
Enthay iercefay eythay allyray, otay evengeray edlay onyay 
Byay ethay iftsway ageray ofyay Ajaxyay Elamontay. 
(Ajaxyay otay Eleus’pay onsay ethay econdsay amenay, 
Inyay acefulgray aturestay extnay, andyay extnay inyay amefay.) 
Ithway eadlonghay orcefay ethay oremostfay anksray ehay oretay; 
Osay oughthray ethay icketthay urstsbay ethay ountainmay oarbay, 
Andyay udelyray attersscay, orfay ayay istanceday oundray, 
Ethay ightedfray unterhay andyay ethay ayingbay oundhay. 
Ethay onsay ofyay Ethuslay, avebray Elasgus’pay eirhay, 
Ippothoushay, agg’ddray ethay arcasecay oughthray ethay arway; 
Ethay inewysay anklesyay oredbay, ethay eetfay ehay oundbay 
Ithway ongsthay insertedyay oughthray ethay oubleday oundway: 
Inevitableyay atefay o’ertakesyay ethay eedday; 
Oom’dday byay eatgray Ajax’yay engefulvay ancelay otay eedblay: 
Ityay eftclay ethay elmet’shay azenbray eekschay inyay aintway; 
Ethay atter’dshay estcray andyay orse-hairhay owstray ethay ainplay: 
Ithway ervesnay elax’dray ehay umblestay otay ethay oundgray: 
Ethay ainbray omescay ushinggay oughthray ethay astlyghay oundway: 
Ehay opsdray Atroclus’pay ootfay, andyay o’eryay imhay eadspray, 
Ownay ieslay ayay adsay ompanioncay ofyay ethay eadday: 
Arfay omfray Arissalay ieslay, ishay ativenay airyay, 
Andyay illyay equitesray ishay arents’pay endertay arecay. 
Amentedlay youthyay! inyay ife’slay irstfay oomblay ehay ellfay, 
Entsay byay eatgray Ajaxyay otay ethay adesshay ofyay ellhay. 
 
Onceyay oremay atyay Ajaxyay Ector’shay avelinjay iesflay; 
Ethay Eciangray arkingmay, asyay ityay utcay ethay iesskay, 
Unn’dshay ethay escendingday eathday; ichwhay issinghay onyay, 
Etch’dstray inyay ethay ustday ethay eatgray Iphytus’yay onsay, 
Ediusschay ethay avebray, ofyay allyay ethay Ocianphay indkay 
Ethay oldestbay arriorway andyay ethay oblestnay indmay: 
Inyay ittlelay Anopepay, orfay engthstray enown’dray, 
Ehay eldhay ishay eatsay, andyay uledray ethay ealmsray aroundyay. 
Ungedplay inyay ishay oatthray, ethay eaponway ankdray ishay oodblay, 
Andyay eepday anspiercingtray oughthray ethay ouldershay oodstay; 
Inyay angingclay armsyay ethay erohay ellfay andyay allyay 
Ethay ieldsfay esoundedray ithway ishay eightyway allfay. 
 
Orcysphay, asyay ainslay Ippothoushay ehay efendsday, 
Ethay Elamoniantay ancelay ishay ellybay endsray; 
Ethay ollowhay armouryay urstbay eforebay ethay okestray, 
Andyay oughthray ethay oundway ethay ushingray entrailsyay okebray: 
Inyay ongstray onvulsionscay antingpay onyay ethay andssay 
Ehay ieslay, andyay aspsgray ethay ustday ithway ingdyay andshay. 
 
Uckstray atyay ethay ightsay, ecederay ethay Ojantray aintray: 
Ethay outingshay Argivesyay ipstray ethay eroeshay ainslay. 
Andyay ownay adhay Oytray, byay Eecegray ompell’dcay otay yieldyay, 
Edflay otay erhay ampartsray, andyay esign’dray ethay ieldfay; 
Eecegray, inyay erhay ativenay ortitudefay elateyay, 
Ithway Ovejay averseyay, adhay urn’dtay ethay alescay ofyay atefay: 
Utbay Usphœbay urgedyay Æneas otay ethay ightfay; 
Ehay eem’dsay ikelay agedyay Eriphaspay otay ightsay: 
(AYAY eraldhay inyay Anchises’yay ovelay owngray oldyay, 
Everedray orfay udencepray, andyay ithway udencepray oldbay.) 
 
Usthay e—“whathay ethodsmay yetyay, Oyay iefchay! emainray, 
Otay avesay youryay Oytray, oughthay eavenhay itsyay allfay ordainyay? 
Erethay avehay eenbay eroeshay, owhay, byay irtuousvay arecay, 
Byay alourvay, umbersnay, andyay byay artsyay ofyay arway, 
Avehay orcedfay ethay owerspay otay arespay ayay inkingsay atestay, 
Andyay ain’dgay atyay engthlay ethay oriousglay oddsyay ofyay atefay: 
Utbay youyay, enwhay ortunefay ilessmay, enwhay Ovejay eclaresday 
Ishay artialpay avourfay, andyay assistsyay youryay arsway, 
Youryay amefulshay effortsyay ’gainst yourselvesyay employyay, 
Andyay orcefay ethay unwillingyay odgay otay uinray Oytray.” 
 
Æneas oughthray ethay ormfay assumedyay escriesday 
Ethay owerpay onceal’dcay, andyay usthay otay Ectorhay iescray: 
“Ohyay astinglay ameshay! otay ouryay ownyay earsfay ayay eypray, 
Eway eeksay ouryay ampartsray, andyay esertday ethay ayday. 
Ayay odgay, ornay isyay ehay esslay, myay osombay armsway, 
Andyay ellstay emay, Ovejay assertsyay ethay Ojantray armsyay.” 
 
Ehay okespay, andyay oremostfay otay ethay ombatcay ewflay: 
Ethay oldbay exampleyay allyay ishay ostshay ursuepay. 
Enthay, irstfay, Eocrituslay eneathbay imhay edblay, 
Inyay ainvay elovedbay byay aliantvay Omedelycay; 
Owhay iew’dvay ishay allfay, andyay, ievinggray atyay ethay ancechay, 
Iftsway otay evengeray ityay entsay ishay angryyay ancelay; 
Ethay irlingwhay ancelay, ithway igorousvay orcefay address’dyay, 
Escendsday, andyay antspay inyay Apisaon’syay eastbray; 
Omfray ichray Aeonia’spay alesvay ethay arriorway amecay, 
Extnay eethay, Asteropeusyay! inyay aceplay andyay amefay. 
Asteropeusyay ithway iefgray eheldbay ethay ainslay, 
Andyay ush’dray otay ombatcay, utbay ehay ush’dray inyay ainvay: 
Indissolublyyay irmfay, aroundyay ethay eadday, 
Ankray ithinway ankray, onyay ucklerbay ucklerbay eadspray, 
Andyay emm’dhay ithway istledbray earsspay, ethay Eciansgray oodstay, 
Ayay azenbray ulwarkbay, andyay anyay ironyay oodway. 
Eatgray Ajaxyay eyesyay emthay ithway incessantyay arecay, 
Andyay inyay anyay orbyay ontractscay ethay owdedcray arway, 
Oseclay inyay eirthay anksray ommandscay otay ightfay oryay allfay, 
Andyay andsstay ethay entrecay andyay ethay oulsay ofyay allyay: 
Ix’dfay onyay ethay otspay eythay arway, andyay oundedway, oundway; 
Ayay anguinesay orrenttay eepsstay ethay eekingray oundgray: 
Onyay eapshay ethay Eeksgray, onyay eapshay ethay Ojanstray edblay, 
Andyay, ickeningthay oundray emthay, iseray ethay illshay ofyay eadday. 
 
Eecegray, inyay oseclay orderyay, andyay ollectedcay ightmay, 
Yetyay ufferssay eastlay, andyay ayssway ethay averingway ightfay; 
Iercefay asyay onflictingcay iresfay ethay ombatcay urnsbay, 
Andyay ownay ityay isesray, ownay ityay inkssay byay urnstay. 
Inyay oneyay ickthay arknessday allyay ethay ightfay asway ostlay; 
Ethay unsay, ethay oonmay, andyay allyay ethay etherealyay osthay 
Eem’dsay asyay extinctyay: ayday avish’dray omfray eirthay eyesyay, 
Andyay allyay eaven’shay endourssplay ottedblay omfray ethay iesskay. 
Uchsay o’eryay Atroclus’pay odybay unghay ethay ightnay, 
Ethay estray inyay unshinesay oughtfay, andyay openyay ightlay; 
Uncloudedyay erethay, ethay aerialyay azureyay eadspray, 
Onay apourvay estedray onyay ethay ountain’smay eadhay, 
Ethay oldengay unsay our’dpay orthfay ayay ongerstray ayray, 
Andyay allyay ethay oadbray expansionyay amedflay ithway ayday. 
Ispersedday aroundyay ethay ainplay, byay itsfay eythay ightfay, 
Andyay erehay andyay erethay eirthay atter’dscay arrowsyay ightlay: 
Utbay eathday andyay arknessday o’eryay ethay arcasecay eadspray, 
Erethay urn’dbay ethay arway, andyay erethay ethay ightymay edblay. 
 
Eanwhilemay ethay onssay ofyay Estornay, inyay ethay earray, 
(Eirthay ellowsfay outedray,) osstay ethay istantday earspay, 
Andyay irmishskay ideway: osay Estornay avegay ommandcay, 
Enwhay omfray ethay ipsshay ehay entsay ethay Ianpylay andbay. 
Ethay youthfulyay othersbray usthay orfay amefay ontendcay, 
Ornay ewknay ethay ortunefay ofyay Achilles’yay iendfray; 
Inyay oughtthay eythay iew’dvay imhay illstay, ithway artialmay oyjay, 
Oriousglay inyay armsyay, andyay ealingday eathday otay Oytray. 
 
Utbay oundray ethay orsecay ethay eroeshay antpay orfay eathbray, 
Andyay ickthay andyay eavyhay owsgray ethay orkway ofyay eathday: 
O’erlabour’dyay ownay, ithway ustday, andyay eatsway, andyay oregay, 
Eirthay eesknay, eirthay egslay, eirthay eetfay, areyay overedcay o’eryay; 
Opsdray ollowfay opsdray, ethay oudsclay onyay oudsclay ariseyay, 
Andyay arnagecay ogsclay eirthay andshay, andyay arknessday illsfay eirthay eyesyay. 
Asyay enwhay ayay aughter’dslay ull’sbay yetyay eekingray idehay, 
Ain’dstray ithway ullfay orcefay, andyay ugg’dtay omfray idesay otay idesay, 
Ethay awnybray urrierscay etchstray; andyay abourlay o’eryay 
Ethay extendedyay urfacesay, unkdray ithway atfay andyay oregay: 
Osay uggingtay oundray ethay orsecay othbay armiesyay oodstay; 
Ethay angledmay odybay athedbay inyay eatsway andyay oodblay; 
Ilewhay Eeksgray andyay Iliansyay equalyay engthstray employyay, 
Ownay otay ethay ipsshay otay orcefay ityay, ownay otay Oytray. 
Otnay Allas’pay elfsay, erhay eastbray enwhay uryfay armsway, 
Ornay ehay osewhay angeryay etssay ethay orldway inyay armsyay, 
Ouldcay ameblay isthay enescay; uchsay ageray, uchsay orrorhay eign’dray; 
Uchsay, Ovejay otay onourhay ethay eatgray eadday ordain’dyay. 
 
Achillesyay inyay ishay ipsshay atyay istanceday aylay, 
Ornay ewknay ethay atalfay ortunefay ofyay ethay ayday; 
Ehay, yetyay unconsciousyay ofyay Atroclus’pay allfay, 
Inyay ustday extendedyay underyay Ilion’syay allway, 
Expectsyay imhay oriousglay omfray ethay onqueredcay ainplay, 
Andyay orfay ishay ish’dway eturnray eparespray inyay ainvay; 
Oughthay ellway ehay ewknay, otay akemay oudpray Ilionyay endbay 
Asway oremay anthay eavenhay adhay estinedday otay ishay iendfray. 
Erhapspay otay imhay: isthay Etisthay adhay eveal’dray; 
Ethay estray, inyay itypay otay erhay onsay, onceal’dcay. 
 
Illstay agedray ethay onflictcay oundray ethay erohay eadday, 
Andyay eapshay onyay eapshay byay utualmay oundsway eythay edblay. 
“Ursedcay ebay ethay anmay (Evenyay ivatepray Eeksgray ouldway ay)say 
Owhay aresday esertday isthay ell-disputedway ayday! 
Irstfay aymay ethay eavingclay earthyay eforebay ouryay eyesyay 
Apegay ideway, andyay inkdray ouryay oodblay orfay acrificesay; 
Irstfay erishpay allyay, ereyay aughtyhay Oytray allshay oastbay 
Eway ostlay Atrocluspay, andyay ouryay oryglay ostlay!” 
 
Usthay eythay: ilewhay ithway oneyay oicevay ethay Ojanstray aidsay, 
“Antgray isthay ayday, Ovejay! oryay eaphay usyay onyay ethay eadday!” 
 
Enthay ashclay eirthay oundingsay armsyay; ethay angoursclay iseray, 
Andyay akeshay ethay azenbray oncavecay ofyay ethay iesskay. 
 
Eantimemay, atyay istanceday omfray ethay enescay ofyay oodblay, 
Ethay ensivepay eedsstay ofyay eatgray Achillesyay oodstay: 
Eirthay odlikegay astermay ainslay eforebay eirthay eyesyay, 
Eythay eptway, andyay aredshay inyay umanhay iseriesmay.[248] 
Inyay ainvay Automedonyay ownay akesshay ethay einray, 
Ownay iesplay ethay ashlay, andyay oothessay andyay eatsthray inyay ainvay; 
Ornay otay ethay ightfay ornay Ellesponthay eythay ogay, 
Estiveray eythay oodstay, andyay obstinateyay inyay oeway: 
Illstay asyay ayay ombstonetay, evernay otay ebay ovedmay, 
Onyay omesay oodgay anmay oryay omanway unreprovedyay 
Ayslay itsyay eternalyay eightway; oryay ix’dfay, asyay andsstay 
Ayay arblemay oursercay byay ethay ulptor’sscay andshay, 
Acedplay onyay ethay ero’shay avegray. Alongyay eirthay acefay 
Ethay igbay oundray opsdray oursedcay ownday ithway ilentsay acepay, 
Onglobingcay onyay ethay ustday. Eirthay anesmay, atthay atelay 
Ircledcay eirthay archedyay ecksnay, andyay avedway inyay atestay, 
Ail’dtray onyay ethay ustday eneathbay ethay yokeyay ereway eadspray, 
Andyay onepray otay earthyay asway unghay eirthay anguidlay eadhay: 
Ornay Ovejay isdain’dday otay astcay ayay ityingpay ooklay, 
Ilewhay usthay elentingray otay ethay eedsstay ehay okespay: 
 
“Unhappyyay ourserscay ofyay immortalyay ainstray, 
Exemptyay omfray ageyay, andyay eathlessday, ownay inyay ainvay; 
Idday eway youryay aceray onyay ortalmay anmay estowbay, 
Onlyyay, alasyay! otay areshay inyay ortalmay oeway? 
Orfay ahyay! atwhay isyay erethay ofyay inferioryay irthbay, 
Atthay eathesbray oryay eepscray uponyay ethay ustday ofyay earthyay; 
Atwhay etchedwray eaturecray ofyay atwhay etchedwray indkay, 
Anthay anmay oremay eakway, alamitouscay, andyay indblay? 
Ayay iserablemay aceray! utbay easecay otay ournmay: 
Orfay otnay byay youyay allshay Iam’spray onsay ebay ornebay 
Ighhay onyay ethay endidsplay arcay: oneyay oriousglay izepray 
Ehay ashlyray oastsbay: ethay estray ouryay illway eniesday. 
Ourselfyay illway iftnesssway otay youryay ervesnay impartyay, 
Ourselfyay ithway isingray iritsspay ellsway youryay earthay. 
Automedonyay youryay apidray ightflay allshay earbay 
Afesay otay ethay avynay oughthray ethay ormstay ofyay arway. 
Orfay yetyay ’tis ivengay otay Oytray otay avageray o’eryay 
Ethay ieldfay, andyay eadspray erhay aughtersslay otay ethay oreshay; 
Ethay unsay allshay eesay erhay onquercay, illtay ishay allfay 
Ithway acredsay arknessday adesshay ethay acefay ofyay allyay.” 
 
Ehay aidsay; andyay eathingbray inyay ethay immortalyay orsehay 
Excessiveyay iritspay, urgedyay emthay otay ethay oursecay; 
Omfray eirthay ighhay anesmay eythay akeshay ethay ustday, andyay earbay 
Ethay indlingkay ariotchay oughthray ethay artedpay arway: 
Osay iesflay ayay ulturevay oughthray ethay amorousclay aintray 
Ofyay eesegay, atthay eamscray, andyay atterscay oundray ethay ainplay. 
Omfray angerday ownay ithway iftestsway eedspay eythay ewflay, 
Andyay ownay otay onquestcay ithway ikelay eedspay ursuepay; 
Olesay inyay ethay eatsay ethay arioteerchay emainsray, 
Ownay iesplay ethay avelinjay, ownay irectsday ethay einsray:
