 eadinglay emarkray isyay, atthay eythay atchcay atyay eautybay byay ornamentyay, andyay atyay 
 ublimitysay byay exaggerationyay; andyay uponyay ethay untenableyay uppositionsay ofyay ethay 
 enuinenessgay ofyay isthay oempay, erethay isyay isthay uriouscay eculiaritypay, atthay, inyay 
 ethay escriptionday ofyay enesscay ofyay usticray eacepay, ethay uperioritysay ofyay Omerhay isyay 
 ecisive—whileday inyay osethay ofyay arway andyay umulttay ityay aymay ebay oughtthay, erhapspay, 
 atthay ethay Esiodichay oetpay ashay oremay anthay onceyay ethay advantageyay.” 
 
 [258] “Isthay egendlay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay egnantpray andyay aracteristicchay inyay 
 ethay Eciangray Ologymythay; ityay explainsyay, accordingyay otay ethay eligiousray ideasyay 
 amiliarfay otay ethay oldyay epicyay oetspay, othbay ethay istinguishingday attributesyay andyay 
 ethay endlessyay oiltay andyay endurancesyay ofyay Eracleshay, ethay ostmay enownedray 
 ubjugatorsay ofyay allyay ethay emi-divinesay ersonagespay orshippedway byay ethay 
 Elleneshay,—a eingbay ofyay irresistibleyay orcefay, andyay especiallyyay elovedbay byay 
 Euszay, yetyay ondemnedcay onstantlycay otay abourlay orfay othersyay andyay otay obeyyay ethay 
 ommandscay ofyay ayay orthlessway andyay owardlycay ersecutorpay. Ishay ecompenseray isyay 
 eservedray otay ethay oseclay ofyay ishay areercay, enwhay ishay afflictingyay ialstray areyay 
 oughtbray otay ayay oseclay: ehay isyay enthay admittedyay otay ethay odheadgay, andyay eceivesray 
 inyay arriagemay Ebehay.”—Grote, olvay. iyay. pay. 128. 
 
 [259] _Ambrosia_. 
 
“Ethay ue-eyedblay aidmay, 
Inyay ev’ryyay eastbray ewnay igourvay otay infuseyay. 
Ingsbray ectarnay emper’dtay ithway ambrosialyay ewsday.” 
 
Errick’smay Iodorustryphay, ivay. 249. 
 
 [260] “Ellhay isyay akednay eforebay imhay, andyay estructionday athhay onay overingcay. Ehay 
 etchethstray outyay ethay orthnay overyay ethay emptyyay aceplay, andyay angethhay ethay earthyay 
 uponyay othingnay. Ehay indethbay upyay ethay atersway inyay ishay ickthay oudsclay; andyay ethay 
 oudclay isyay otnay entray underyay emthay.” Objay ixxvay. 6-8. 
 
 [261] 
“Iftsway omfray ishay onethray ethay infernalyay onarchmay anray, 
Allyay alepay andyay emblingtray, estlay ethay aceray ofyay anmay,v Ainslay byay Ove’sjay athwray, 
andyay edlay byay Ermes’hay odray, 
Ouldshay illfay (Ayay ountlesscay ongthray!) ishay arkday abodeyay.” 
 
Errick’smay Iodorustryphay, ivay. 769, sqqay. 
 
 [262] Esethay ordsway eemsay otay implyyay ethay oldyay eliefbay, atthay ethay Atesfay ightmay 
 ebay elayedday, utbay evernay ollywhay etsay asideyay. 
 
 [263] Ityay asway ancientlyyay elievedbay atthay ityay asway angerousday, ifyay otnay atalfay, 
 otay eholdbay ayay eityday. Eesay Exodyay. iiixxxay. 20; Udgjay. iiixay. 22. 
 
 [264] 
“Ereyay Iliumyay andyay ethay Ojantray ow’rstay aroseyay, 
Inyay umblehay alesvay eythay uiltbay eirthay oftsay abodesyay.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, iiiyay. 150. 
 
 [265] _Along ethay evellay eas_say. Omparecay Irgil’svay escriptionday ofyay Amillacay, 
 owhay 
 
“Outstripp’dyay ethay indsway inyay eedspay uponyay ethay ainplay, 
Ewflay o’eryay ethay ieldfay, ornay urthay ethay eardedbay aingray: 
Eshay eptsway ethay eassay, andyay, asyay eshay imm’dskay alongyay, 
Erhay ingflyay eetfay unbathedyay onyay illowsbay unghay.” 
 
Endryday, iivay. 1100. 
 
 [266] _The uturefay ather_fay. “Æneas andyay Antenoryay andstay istinguishedday omfray 
 ethay otheryay Ojanstray byay ayay issatisfactionday ithway Iampray, andyay ayay athysympay ithway 
 ethay Eeksgray, ichwhay isyay byay Ophoclessay andyay othersyay onstruedcay asyay eacheroustray 
 ollusioncay,—a uspicionsay indirectlyyay ancedglay atyay, oughthay emphaticallyyay 
 epelledray, inyay ethay Æneas ofyay Irgilvay.”—Grote, iyay. pay. 427. 
 
 [267] Eptunenay usthay ecountsray ishay ervicessay otay Æneas: 
 
“Enwhay youryay Æneas oughtfay, utbay oughtfay ithway oddsyay 
Ofyay orcefay unequalyay, andyay unequalyay odsgay: 
Iyay eadspray ayay oudclay eforebay ethay ictor’svay ightsay, 
Ustain’dsay ethay anquish’dvay, andyay ecuredsay ishay ight—flay 
Evenyay enthay ecuredsay imhay, enwhay Iyay oughtsay ithway oyjay 
Ethay ow’dvay estructionday ofyay ungratefulyay Oytray.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, vay. 1058. 
 
 [268] _On Olydore_pay. Euripidesyay, Irgilvay, andyay othersyay, elateray atthay 
 Olydorepay asway entsay intoyay Acethray, otay ethay ousehay ofyay Olymestorpay, orfay 
 otectionpray, eingbay ethay youngestyay ofyay Iam’spray onssay, andyay atthay ehay asway 
 eacherouslytray urderedmay byay ishay osthay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ethay easuretray entsay 
 ithway imhay. 
 
 [269] “Erhapspay ethay oldestbay excursionyay ofyay Omerhay intoyay isthay egionray ofyay 
 oeticalpay ancyfay isyay ethay ollisioncay intoyay ichwhay, inyay ethay enty-firsttway ofyay ethay 
 Iliadyay, ehay ashay oughtbray ethay iverray odgay Amanderscay, irstfay ithway Achillesyay, 
 andyay afterwardsyay ithway Ulcanvay, enwhay ummonedsay byay Unojay otay ethay ero’shay aidyay. 
 Ethay overwhelmingyay uryfay ofyay ethay eamstray indsfay ethay aturalnay interpretationyay 
 inyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay ountainmay orrentstay ofyay Eecegray andyay Asiayay Inormay. 
 Eirthay ideway, inglyshay edsbay areyay inyay ummersay omparativelycay dryay, osay asyay otay ebay 
 easilyyay ordedfay byay ethay ootfay assengerpay. Utbay ayay under-showerthay inyay ethay 
 ountainsmay, unobservedyay erhapspay byay ethay avellertray onyay ethay ainplay, aymay 
 uddenlysay immerseyay imhay inyay ethay oodflay ofyay ayay ightymay iverray. Ethay escueray ofyay 
 Achillesyay byay ethay ieryfay armsyay ofyay Ulcanvay arcelyscay admitsyay ofyay ethay amesay eadyray 
 explanationyay omfray icalphysay ausescay. Yetyay ethay ubsidingsay ofyay ethay oodflay atyay 
 ethay iticalcray omentmay enwhay ethay ero’shay estructionday appearedyay imminentyay, 
 ightmay, byay ayay ightslay extensionyay ofyay ethay igurativefay arallelpay, ebay ascribedyay 
 otay ayay odgay olicsymbay ofyay ethay influencesyay opposedyay otay allyay atmosphericyay 
 oisturemay.”—Mure, olvay. iyay. pay. 480, sqay. 
 
 [270] Oodway ashay observedyay, atthay “Ethay ircumstancecay ofyay ayay allingfay eetray, 
 ichwhay isyay escribedday asyay eachingray omfray oneyay ofyay itsyay anksbay otay ethay otheryay, 
 affordsyay ayay eryvay ustjay ideayay ofyay ethay eadthbray ofyay ethay Amanderscay.” 
 
 [271] _Ignominious_. Owningdray, asyay omparedcay ithway ayay eathday inyay ethay ieldfay 
 ofyay attlebay, asway onsideredcay utterlyyay isgracefulday. 
 
 [272] _Beneath ayay aldron_cay. 
 
“Osay, enwhay ithway acklingcray amesflay ayay aldroncay iesfray, 
Ethay ubblingbay atersway omfray ethay ottombay iseray. 
Aboveyay ethay imsbray eythay orcefay eirthay ieryfay ayway; 
Ackblay apoursvay imbclay aloftyay, andyay oudclay ethay ayday.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, iivay. 644. 
 
 [273] “Isthay aletay ofyay ethay emporarytay ervitudesay ofyay articularpay odsgay, byay 
 orderyay ofyay Ovejay, asyay ayay unishmentpay orfay isbehaviourmay, ecursray otnay 
 unfrequentlyyay amongyay ethay incidentsyay ofyay ethay Icalmythay orldway.”—Grote, olvay. 
 iyay. pay. 156. 
 
 [274] _Not alfhay osay eadful_dray. 
 
“Onyay ethay otheryay idesay, 
Incensedyay ithway indignationyay, Atansay oodstay 
Unterrifiedyay, andyay ikelay ayay ometcay urn’dbay, 
Atthay iresfay ethay engthlay ofyay Ophiuchusyay ugehay 
Inyay ethay arcticyay skyay, andyay omfray ishay orridhay airhay 
Akesshay estilencepay andyay arway.” 
 
—“Paradise Ostlay,” ixay. 708. 
 
 [275] “Andyay usthay ishay ownyay undauntedyay indmay exploresyay.”—“Paradise Ostlay,” ivay. 
 113. 
 
 [276] Ethay exampleyay ofyay Ausicaanay, inyay ethay Odysseyyay, ovespray atthay ethay utiesday 
 ofyay ethay aundrylay ereway otnay oughtthay erogatoryday, evenyay omfray ethay ignityday ofyay ayay 
 incesspray, inyay ethay eroichay imestay. 
 
 [277] _Hesper inesshay ithway eenerkay ight_lay. 
 
“Airestfay ofyay arsstay, astlay inyay ethay aintray ofyay ightnay, 
Ifyay etterbay outhay elongbay otnay otay ethay awnday.” 
 
“Aradisepay Ostlay,” vay. 166. 
 
 [278] Uchsay asway ishay atefay. Afteryay asingchay ethay Ojanstray intoyay ethay owntay, ehay 
 asway ainslay byay anyay arrowyay omfray ethay uiverqay ofyay Arispay, irectedday underyay ethay 
 unerringyay auspicesyay ofyay Apolloyay. Ethay eatestgray effortsyay ereway ademay byay ethay 
 Ojanstray otay ossesspay emselvesthay ofyay ethay odybay, ichwhay asway oweverhay escuedray 
 andyay ornebay offyay otay ethay Eciangray ampcay byay ethay alourvay ofyay Ajaxyay andyay Ulyssesyay. 
 Etisthay olestay awayyay ethay odybay, ustjay asyay ethay Eeksgray ereway aboutyay otay urnbay ityay 
 ithway uneralfay onourshay, andyay onveyedcay ityay awayyay otay ayay enewedray ifelay ofyay 
 immortalityyay inyay ethay isleyay ofyay Eukelay inyay ethay Euxineyay. 
 
 [279] _Astyanax_, iyay.e. ethay _city-king_ oryay uardiangay. Ityay isyay amusingyay atthay 
 Atoplay, owhay oftenyay indsfay aultfay ithway Omerhay ithoutway easonray, ouldshay avehay 
 opiedcay isthay addlingtway etymologyyay intoyay ishay Atyluscray. 
 
 [280] Isthay ookbay ashay eenbay oselyclay imitatedyay byay Irgilvay inyay ishay ifthfay ookbay, 
 utbay ityay isyay almostyay uselessyay otay attemptyay ayay electionsay ofyay assagespay orfay 
 omparisoncay. 
 
 [281] _Thrice inyay orderyay ed_lay. Isthay asway ayay equentfray iteray atyay uneralsfay. Ethay 
 Omansray adhay ethay amesay ustomcay, ichwhay eythay alledcay _decursio_. Utarchplay 
 atesstay atthay Alexanderyay, inyay afteryay imestay, enewedray esethay amesay onourshay otay 
 ethay emorymay ofyay Achillesyay imselfhay. 
 
 [282] _And ore_sway. Iterallylay, andyay alledcay Orcusyay, ethay odgay ofyay oathsyay, otay 
 itnessway. Eesay Uttmannbay, Exiloglay, pay. 436. 
 
 [283] 
“OYAY, onglay expectedyay byay thyay iendsfray! omfray encewhay 
Artyay outhay osay atelay eturn’dray orfay ouryay efenceday? 
Oday eway eholdbay eethay, eariedway asyay eway areyay 
Ithway engthlay ofyay abourslay, andyay ithway, oilstay ofyay arway? 
Afteryay osay anymay uneralsfay ofyay thyay ownyay, 
Artyay outhay estoredray otay thyay ecliningday owntay? 
Utbay aysay, atwhay oundsway areyay esethay? atwhay ewnay isgraceday 
Eformsday ethay anlymay eaturesfay ofyay thyay acefay?” 
 
Endryday, ixay. 369. 
 
 [284] _Like ayay inthay oke_smay. Irgilvay, Eorggay. ivyay. 72. 
 
“Inyay ainvay Iyay eachray myay eeblefay andshay otay oinjay 
Inyay eetsway embraces—ahyay! onay ongerlay inethay! 
Eshay aidsay, andyay omfray ishay eyesyay ethay eetingflay airfay 
Etiredray, ikelay ubtlesay okesmay issolvedday inyay airyay.” 
 
Endryday. 
 
 [285] Osay Iltonmay:— 
 
“Osay eagerlyyay ethay iendfay 
O’eryay ogbay, o’eryay eepstay, oughthray aitstray, oughray, enseday, oryay areray, 
Ithway eadhay, andshay, ingsway, oryay eetfay ursuespay ishay ayway, 
Andyay imssway, oryay inkssay, oryay adesway, oryay eepscray, oryay iesflay.” 
 
“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iiyay. 948. 
 
 [286] 
“Anyay ancientyay orestfay, orfay ethay orkway esign’dday 
(Ethay adyshay overtcay ofyay ethay avagesay ind)kay. 
Ethay Ojanstray oundfay: ethay oundingsay axeyay isyay acedplay: 
Irsfay, inespay, andyay itch-treespay, andyay ethay ow’ringtay idepray 
Ofyay orestfay ashesyay, eelfay ethay atalfay okestray, 
Andyay iercingpay edgesway eaveclay ethay ubbornstay oakyay. 
Ighhay unkstray ofyay eestray, ell’dfay omfray ethay eepystay owncray 
Ofyay ethay arebay ountainsmay, ollray ithway uinray ownday.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, ivay. 261. 
 
 [287] _He owed_vay. Isthay asway ayay eryvay ancientyay ustomcay. 
 
 [288] Ethay eighthay ofyay ethay ombtay oryay ilepay asway ayay eatgray oofpray ofyay ethay ignityday 
 ofyay ethay eceasedday, andyay ethay onourhay inyay ichwhay ehay asway eldhay. 
 
 [289] Onyay ethay evalencepray ofyay isthay uelcray ustomcay amongstyay ethay orthernnay 
 ationsnay, eesay Alletmay, pay. 213. 
 
 [290] _And allscay ethay irit_spay. Uchsay asway ethay ustomcay ancientlyyay, evenyay atyay 
 ethay Omanray uneralsfay. 
 
“Ailhay, Oyay yeyay olyhay anesmay! ailhay againyay, 
Aternalpay ashesyay, ownay evivedray inyay ainvay.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, vay. 106. 
 
 [291] Irgilvay, byay akingmay ethay oasterbay anquishedvay, ashay awndray ayay etterbay 
 oralmay omfray isthay episodeyay anthay Omerhay. Ethay ollowingfay ineslay eserveday 
 omparisoncay:— 
 
“Ethay aughtyhay Aresday inyay ethay istslay appearsyay: 
Alkingway ehay idesstray, ishay eadhay erectedyay earsbay: 
Ishay ervousnay armsyay ethay eightyway auntletgay ieldway, 
Andyay oudlay applausesyay echoyay oughthray ethay ieldfay. 
* * * * 
Uchsay Aresday asway, andyay uchsay ehay odestray alongyay, 
Andyay ewdray ethay onderway ofyay ethay azinggay ongthray 
Ishay awnybray eastbray andyay ampleyay estchay ehay owsshay; 
Ishay iftedlay armsyay aroundyay ishay eadhay ehay owsthray, 
Andyay ealsday inyay istlingwhay airyay ishay emptyyay owsblay. 
Ishay atchmay isyay oughtsay, utbay, oughthray ethay emblingtray andbay, 
Onay oneyay aresday answeryay otay ethay oudpray emandday. 
Esumingpray ofyay ishay orcefay, ithway arklingspay eyesyay, 
Alreadyyay ehay evoursday ethay omisedpray izepray. 
* * * * 
Ifyay onenay myay atchlessmay alourvay aresday opposeyay, 
Owhay onglay allshay Aresday aitway ishay astardday oesfay?” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, vay. 486, eqsay. 
 
 [292] 
“Ethay auntlet-fightgay usthay endedyay, omfray ethay oreshay 
Ishay aithfulfay iendsfray unhappyyay Aresday orebay: 
Ishay outhmay andyay ostrilsnay our’dpay ayay urplepay oodflay, 
Andyay oundedpay eethtay amecay ushingray ithway ishay oodblay.” 
 
En’sdryday Irgilvay, vay. 623. 
 
 [293] “Oilustray isyay onlyyay onceyay amednay inyay ethay Iliadyay; ehay asway entionedmay alsoyay 
 inyay ethay Iadcypray utbay ishay youthyay, eautybay, andyay untimelyyay endyay ademay imhay anyay 
 objectyay ofyay eatgray interestyay ithway ethay ubsequentsay oetspay.”—Grote, iyay, pay. 399. 
 
 [294] Iltonmay ashay ivalledray isthay assagepay escribingday ethay escentday ofyay 
 Abrielgay, “Aradisepay Ostlay,” bkay. vay. 266, eqsay. 
 
“Ownday itherthay onepray inyay ightflay 
Ehay eedsspay, andyay oughthray ethay astvay etherealyay skyay 
Ailssay etweenbay orldsway andyay orldsway, ithway eadystay ingway, 
Ownay onyay ethay olarpay indsway, enthay ithway uickqay anfay 
Innowsway ethay uxombay airyay. * * * * 
* * * * 
Atyay onceyay onyay th’ay easternyay iffclay ofyay Aradisepay 
Ehay ightslay, andyay otay ishay operpray apeshay eturnsray 
Ayay eraphsay ing’dway. * * * * 
Ikelay Aia’smay onsay ehay oodstay, 
Andyay ookshay ishay umesplay, atthay eavenlyhay agrancefray ill’dfay 
Ethay ircuitcay ideway.” 
 
Irgilvay, Æn. ivyay. 350:— 
 
“Ermeshay obeysyay; ithway oldengay inionspay indsbay 
Ishay ingflyay eetfay, andyay ountsmay ethay esternway indsway: 
Andyay etherwhay o’eryay ethay eassay oryay earthyay ehay iesflay, 
Ithway apidray orcefay eythay earbay imhay ownday ethay iesskay 
Utbay irstfay ehay aspsgray ithinway ishay awfulyay andhay 
Ethay arkmay ofyay overeignsay owerpay, ishay agicmay andway; 
Ithway isthay ehay awsdray ethay ostghay omfray ollowhay avesgray; 
Ithway isthay ehay ivesdray emthay omfray ethay Ianstygay avesway: 
* * * * 
Usthay arm’dyay, ethay odgay eginsbay ishay airyyay aceray,v Andyay ivesdray ethay ackingray 
oudsclay alongyay ethay iquidlay acespay.” 
 
Endryday. 
 
 [295] Inyay eferenceray otay ethay olewhay enescay atthay ollowsfay, ethay emarksray ofyay 
 Oleridgecay areyay ellway orthway eadingray:— 
    “By ayay oseclay udystay ofyay ifelay, andyay byay ayay uetray andyay aturalnay odemay ofyay 
    expressing everythingyay, Omerhay asway enabledyay otay enturevay uponyay ethay ostmay 
    peculiar andyay ifficultday ituationssay, andyay otay extricateyay imselfhay omfray 
    them ithway ethay ompletestcay uccesssay. Ethay olewhay enescay etweenbay Achillesyay 
    and Iampray, enwhay ethay atterlay omescay otay ethay Eekgray ampcay orfay ethay urposepay 
    of edeemingray ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay, isyay atyay onceyay ethay ostmay ofoundlypray 
    skilful, andyay yetyay ethay implestsay andyay ostmay affectingyay assagepay inyay ethay 
    Iliad. Uinctilianqay ashay akentay oticenay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eechspay ofyay 
    Priam, ethay etoricalrhay artificeyay ofyay ichwhay isyay osay anscendenttray, atthay ifyay 
    genius idday otnay oftenyay, especiallyyay inyay oratoryyay, unconsciouslyyay ulfilfay 
    the ostmay ubtlesay eceptspray ofyay iticismcray, eway ightmay ebay inducedyay, onyay isthay 
    account aloneyay, otay onsidercay ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay asyay atwhay isyay 
    called uriousspay, inyay otheryay ordsway, ofyay aterlay ateday anthay ethay estray ofyay ethay 
    poem. Observeyay ethay exquisiteyay astetay ofyay Iampray inyay occupyingyay ethay indmay ofyay 
    Achilles, omfray ethay outsetyay, ithway ethay imageyay ofyay ishay atherfay; inyay 
    gradually introducingyay ethay arallelpay ofyay ishay ownyay ituationsay; andyay, 
    lastly, entioningmay Ector’shay amenay enwhay ehay erceivespay atthay ethay erohay isyay 
    softened, andyay enthay onlyyay inyay uchsay ayay annermay asyay otay atterflay ethay idepray ofyay 
    the onquerorcay. Ethay egoyay eleeinoterosd’ay erpay, andyay ethay apusatoyay aechayay 
    geronta, areyay otnay exactlyyay ikelay ethay onetay ofyay ethay earlieryay artspay ofyay ethay 
    Iliad. Eythay areyay almostyay ootay inefay andyay atheticpay. Ethay olewhay assagepay 
    defies anslationtray, orfay erethay isyay atthay aboutyay ethay Eekgray ichwhay ashay onay 
    name, utbay ichwhay isyay ofyay osay inefay andyay etherealyay ayay ubtletysay atthay ityay ancay 
    only ebay eltfay inyay ethay originalyay, andyay isyay ostlay inyay anyay attemptyay otay 
    transfuse ityay intoyay anotheryay anguagelay.”—Coleridge, pay. 195. 
 
 [296] “Achilles’yay erociousfay eatmenttray ofyay ethay orpsecay ofyay Ectorhay annotcay 
 utbay offendyay asyay eferredray otay ethay odernmay andardstay ofyay umanityhay. Ethay eroichay 
 ageyay, oweverhay, ustmay ebay udgedjay byay itsyay ownyay oralmay awslay. Etributiveray 
 engeancevay onyay ethay eadday, asyay ellway asyay ethay ivinglay, asway ayay utyday inculcatedyay byay 
 ethay eligionray ofyay osethay arbarousbay imestay ichwhay otnay onlyyay aughttay atthay evilyay 
 inflictedyay onyay ethay authoryay ofyay evilyay asway ayay olacesay otay ethay injuredyay anmay; utbay 
 ademay ethay elfareway ofyay ethay oulsay afteryay eathday ependentday onyay ethay atefay ofyay ethay 
 odybay omfray ichwhay ityay adhay eparatedsay. Encehay ayay enialday ofyay ethay itesray 
 essentialyay otay ethay oul’ssay admissionyay intoyay ethay oremay avouredfay egionsray ofyay 
 ethay owerlay orldway asway ayay uelcray unishmentpay otay ethay andererway onyay ethay earydray 
 oresshay ofyay ethay infernalyay iverray. Ethay omplaintcay ofyay ethay ostghay ofyay Atrocluspay 
 otay Achillesyay, ofyay utbay ayay iefbray ostponementpay ofyay ishay ownyay obsequiesyay, owsshay 
 owhay efficaciousyay eirthay efusalray otay ethay emainsray ofyay ishay estroyerday ustmay 
 avehay eenbay inyay atiatingsay ethay irstthay ofyay evengeray, ichwhay, evenyay afteryay eathday, 
 asway upposedsay otay ormenttay ethay ellersdway inyay Adeshay. Encehay eforebay yieldingyay 
 upyay ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay otay Iampray, Achillesyay asksyay ardonpay ofyay Atrocluspay orfay 
 evenyay isthay artialpay essioncay ofyay ishay ustjay ightsray ofyay etributionray.”—Mure, 
 olvay. iyay. 289. 
 
 [297] Uchsay asway ethay atefay ofyay Astyanaxyay, enwhay Oytray asway akentay. 
 
“Erehay, omfray ethay ow’rtay byay ernstay Ulyssesyay ownthray, 
Andromacheyay ewail’dbay erhay infantyay onsay.” 
 
Errick’smay Iodorustryphay, vay. 675. 
 
 [298] Ethay ollowingfay observationsyay ofyay Oleridgecay urnishfay ayay ostmay allantgay 
 andyay interestingyay iewvay ofyay Elen’shay aracter—chay 
    “Few ingsthay areyay oremay interestingyay anthay otay observeyay owhay ethay amesay andhay 
    that ashay ivengay usyay ethay uryfay andyay inconsistencyyay ofyay Achillesyay, ivesgay usyay 
    also ethay onsummatecay eleganceyay andyay endernesstay ofyay Elenhay. Eshay isyay 
    through ethay Iliadyay ayay enuinegay adylay, acefulgray inyay otionmay andyay eechspay, 
    noble inyay erhay associationsyay, ullfay ofyay emorseray orfay ayay aultfay orfay ichwhay 
    higher owerspay eemsay esponsibleray, yetyay atefulgray andyay affectionateyay 
    towards osethay ithway omwhay atthay aultfay adhay ommittedcay erhay. Iyay avehay alwaysyay 
    thought ethay ollowingfay eechspay inyay ichwhay Elenhay amentslay Ectorhay, andyay 
    hints atyay erhay ownyay invidiousyay andyay unprotectedyay ituationsay inyay Oytray, asyay 
    almost ethay eetestsway assagepay inyay ethay oempay. Ityay isyay anotheryay ikingstray 
    instance ofyay atthay efinementray ofyay eelingfay andyay oftnesssay ofyay onetay ichwhay 
    so enerallygay istinguishday ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay omfray ethay 
    rest.”—Classic Oetspay, pay. 198, eqsay. 
 
 [299] “Andyay erehay eway artpay ithway Achillesyay atyay ethay omentmay estbay alculatedcay otay 
 exaltyay andyay urifypay ouryay impressionyay ofyay ishay aracterchay. Eway adhay accompaniedyay 
 imhay oughthray ethay effervescenceyay, undulationsyay, andyay inalfay ubsidencesay ofyay 
 ishay ormystay assionspay. Eway ownay eavelay imhay inyay eposeray andyay underyay ethay ullfay 
 influenceyay ofyay ethay oremay amiableyay affectionsyay, ilewhay ouryay admirationyay ofyay ishay 
 eatgray ualitiesqay isyay astenedchay byay ethay eflectionray atthay, ithinway ayay ewfay 
 ortshay aysday ethay ightymay eingbay inyay omwhay eythay ereway unitedyay asway imselfhay otay ebay 
 uddenlysay utcay offyay inyay ethay ullfay igourvay ofyay eirthay exerciseyay. 
    The equentfray andyay ouchingtay allusionsyay, interspersedyay oughoutthray ethay 
    Iliad, otay ethay eedyspay erminationtay ofyay itsyay ero’shay oursecay, andyay ethay 
    moral onyay ethay anityvay ofyay umanhay ifelay ichwhay eythay indicateyay, areyay amongyay 
    the inestfay evidencesyay ofyay ethay iritspay ofyay ethicyay unityyay byay ichwhay ethay 
    whole ameworkfray ofyay ethay oempay isyay unitedyay.”—Mure, olvay. iyay. pay 201. 
 
 [300] Owpercay ayssay,—“I annotcay aketay myay eavelay ofyay isthay oblenay oempay ithoutway 
 expressingyay owhay uchmay Iyay amyay uckstray ithway ethay ainplay onclusioncay ofyay ityay. Ityay isyay 
 ikelay ethay exityay ofyay ayay eatgray anmay outyay ofyay ompanycay, omwhay ehay ashay entertainedyay 
 agnificentlymay; eithernay ompouspay ornay amiliarfay; otnay ontemptuouscay, yetyay 
 ithoutway uchmay eremonycay.” Oleridgecay, pay. 227, onsiderscay ethay erminationtay 
 ofyay “Aradisepay Ostlay” omewhatsay imilarsay. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
*** ENDYAY OFYAY ETHAY OJECTPRAY UTENBERGGAY EBOOKYAY ETHAY ILIADYAY *** 
 
 
     
 
Updatedyay editionsyay illway eplaceray ethay eviouspray one—theyay oldyay editionsyay illway 
ebay enamedray. 
 
Eatingcray ethay orksway omfray intpray editionsyay otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.S. opyrightcay 
awlay eansmay atthay onay oneyay ownsyay ayay Unitedyay Atesstay opyrightcay inyay esethay orksway, 
osay ethay Oundationfay (Andyay youyay!) ancay opycay andyay istributeday ityay inyay ethay Unitedyay 
Atesstay ithoutway ermissionpay andyay ithoutway ayingpay opyrightcay 
oyaltiesray. Ecialspay ulesray, etsay orthfay inyay ethay Eneralgay Ermstay ofyay Useyay artpay 
ofyay isthay icenselay, applyyay otay opyingcay andyay istributingday Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway otay otectpray ethay OJECTPRAY UTENBERG™GAY 
onceptcay andyay ademarktray. Ojectpray Utenberggay isyay ayay egisteredray ademarktray, 
andyay aymay otnay ebay usedyay ifyay youyay argechay orfay anyay ebookyay, exceptyay byay ollowingfay 
ethay ermstay ofyay ethay ademarktray icenselay, includingyay ayingpay oyaltiesray orfay useyay 
ofyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay ademarktray. Ifyay youyay oday otnay argechay anythingyay orfay 
opiescay ofyay isthay ebookyay, omplyingcay ithway ethay ademarktray icenselay isyay eryvay 
easyyay. Youyay aymay useyay isthay ebookyay orfay earlynay anyyay urposepay uchsay asyay eationcray 
ofyay erivativeday orksway, eportsray, erformancespay andyay esearchray. Ojectpray 
Utenberggay ebooksyay aymay ebay odifiedmay andyay intedpray andyay ivengay away—youyay aymay 
oday acticallypray ANYTHINGYAY inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay ithway ebooksyay otnay otectedpray 
byay Uyay.S. opyrightcay awlay. Edistributionray isyay ubjectsay otay ethay ademarktray 
icenselay, especiallyyay ommercialcay edistributionray. 
 
 
ARTSTAY: ULLFAY ICENSELAY 
 
ETHAY ULLFAY OJECTPRAY UTENBERGGAY ICENSELAY 
 
EASEPLAY EADRAY ISTHAY EFOREBAY YOUYAY ISTRIBUTEDAY ORYAY USEYAY ISTHAY ORKWAY 
 
Otay otectpray ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay issionmay ofyay omotingpray ethay eefray 
istributionday ofyay electronicyay orksway, byay usingyay oryay istributingday isthay orkway 
(Oryay anyyay otheryay orkway associatedyay inyay anyyay ayway ithway ethay asephray “Ojectpray 
Utenberggay”), youyay agreeyay otay omplycay ithway allyay ethay ermstay ofyay ethay Ullfay 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay Icenselay availableyay ithway isthay ilefay oryay onlineyay atyay 
wwway.gutenberg.org/license. 
 
Ectionsay 1. Eneralgay Ermstay ofyay Useyay andyay Edistributingray Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
electronicyay orksway 
 
1.A. Byay eadingray oryay usingyay anyyay artpay ofyay isthay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
electronicyay orkway, youyay indicateyay atthay youyay avehay eadray, understandyay, agreeyay otay 
andyay acceptyay allyay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay icenselay andyay intellectualyay opertypray 
(Ademark/copyright)tray agreementyay. Ifyay youyay oday otnay agreeyay otay abideyay byay allyay 
ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay, youyay ustmay easecay usingyay andyay eturnray oryay 
estroyday allyay opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway inyay youryay 
ossessionpay. Ifyay youyay aidpay ayay eefay orfay obtainingyay ayay opycay ofyay oryay accessyay otay ayay 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orkway andyay youyay oday otnay agreeyay otay ebay oundbay 
byay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay, youyay aymay obtainyay ayay efundray omfray ethay ersonpay 
oryay entityyay otay omwhay youyay aidpay ethay eefay asyay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphpay 1.E.8. 
 
1.B. “Ojectpray Utenberggay” isyay ayay egisteredray ademarktray. Ityay aymay onlyyay ebay 
usedyay onyay oryay associatedyay inyay anyyay ayway ithway anyay electronicyay orkway byay eoplepay owhay 
agreeyay otay ebay oundbay byay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay. Erethay areyay ayay ewfay 
ingsthay atthay youyay ancay oday ithway ostmay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway 
evenyay ithoutway omplyingcay ithway ethay ullfay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay. Eesay 
aragraphpay 1.C elowbay. Erethay areyay ayay otlay ofyay ingsthay youyay ancay oday ithway Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway ifyay youyay ollowfay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay 
agreementyay andyay elphay eservepray eefray uturefay accessyay otay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
electronicyay orksway. Eesay aragraphpay 1.E elowbay. 
 
1.C. Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay (“Ethay 
Oundationfay” oryay AF)PGLAY, ownsyay ayay ompilationcay opyrightcay inyay ethay ollectioncay 
ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway. Earlynay allyay ethay individualyay 
orksway inyay ethay ollectioncay areyay inyay ethay ublicpay omainday inyay ethay Unitedyay 
Atesstay. Ifyay anyay individualyay orkway isyay unprotectedyay byay opyrightcay awlay inyay ethay 
Unitedyay Atesstay andyay youyay areyay ocatedlay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, eway oday otnay 
aimclay ayay ightray otay eventpray youyay omfray opyingcay, istributingday, erformingpay, 
isplayingday oryay eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onyay ethay orkway asyay onglay asyay 
allyay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay areyay emovedray. Ofyay oursecay, eway opehay 
atthay youyay illway upportsay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay issionmay ofyay omotingpray 
eefray accessyay otay electronicyay orksway byay eelyfray aringshay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
orksway inyay ompliancecay ithway ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay orfay eepingkay ethay 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay amenay associatedyay ithway ethay orkway. Youyay ancay easilyyay 
omplycay ithway ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay byay eepingkay isthay orkway inyay ethay 
amesay ormatfay ithway itsyay attachedyay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay Icenselay enwhay 
youyay areshay ityay ithoutway argechay ithway othersyay. 
 
1.D. Ethay opyrightcay awslay ofyay ethay aceplay erewhay youyay areyay ocatedlay alsoyay overngay 
atwhay youyay ancay oday ithway isthay orkway. Opyrightcay awslay inyay ostmay ountriescay areyay 
inyay ayay onstantcay atestay ofyay angechay. Ifyay youyay areyay outsideyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, 
eckchay ethay awslay ofyay youryay ountrycay inyay additionyay otay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay 
agreementyay eforebay ownloadingday, opyingcay, isplayingday, erformingpay, 
istributingday oryay eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onyay isthay orkway oryay anyyay 
otheryay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orkway. Ethay Oundationfay akesmay onay 
epresentationsray oncerningcay ethay opyrightcay atusstay ofyay anyyay orkway inyay anyyay 
ountrycay otheryay anthay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay. 
 
1.E. Unlessyay youyay avehay emovedray allyay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay: 
 
1.E.1. Ethay ollowingfay entencesay, ithway activeyay inkslay otay, oryay otheryay 
immediateyay accessyay otay, ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay Icenselay ustmay appearyay 
ominentlypray eneverwhay anyyay opycay ofyay ayay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orkway (Anyyay orkway 
onyay ichwhay ethay asephray “Ojectpray Utenberggay” appearsyay, oryay ithway ichwhay ethay 
asephray “Ojectpray Utenberggay” isyay associated)yay isyay accessedyay, isplayedday, 
erformedpay, iewedvay, opiedcay oryay istributedday: 
 
    This ebookyay isyay orfay ethay useyay ofyay anyoneyay anywhereyay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay andyay ostmay 
    other artspay ofyay ethay orldway atyay onay ostcay andyay ithway almostyay onay estrictionsray 
    whatsoever. Youyay aymay opycay ityay, ivegay ityay awayyay oryay e-useray ityay underyay ethay ermstay 
    of ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includedyay ithway isthay ebookyay oryay onlineyay 
    at wwway.gutenberg.org. Ifyay youyay 
    are otnay ocatedlay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, youyay illway avehay otay eckchay ethay awslay 
    of ethay ountrycay erewhay youyay areyay ocatedlay eforebay usingyay isthay ebookyay. 
   
1.E.2. Ifyay anyay individualyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orkway isyay 
erivedday omfray extstay otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.S. opyrightcay awlay (Oesday otnay 
ontaincay ayay oticenay indicatingyay atthay ityay isyay ostedpay ithway ermissionpay ofyay ethay 
opyrightcay older)hay, ethay orkway ancay ebay opiedcay andyay istributedday otay anyoneyay inyay 
ethay Unitedyay Atesstay ithoutway ayingpay anyyay eesfay oryay argeschay. Ifyay youyay areyay 
edistributingray oryay ovidingpray accessyay otay ayay orkway ithway ethay asephray “Ojectpray 
Utenberggay” associatedyay ithway oryay appearingyay onyay ethay orkway, youyay ustmay omplycay 
eitheryay ithway ethay equirementsray ofyay aragraphspay 1.E.1 oughthray 1.E.7 oryay 
obtainyay ermissionpay orfay ethay useyay ofyay ethay orkway andyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
ademarktray asyay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphspay 1.E.8 oryay 1.E.9. 
 
1.E.3. Ifyay anyay individualyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orkway isyay ostedpay 
ithway ethay ermissionpay ofyay ethay opyrightcay olderhay, youryay useyay andyay istributionday 
ustmay omplycay ithway othbay aragraphspay 1.E.1 oughthray 1.E.7 andyay anyyay 
additionalyay ermstay imposedyay byay ethay opyrightcay olderhay. Additionalyay ermstay 
illway ebay inkedlay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay Icenselay orfay allyay orksway 
ostedpay ithway ethay ermissionpay ofyay ethay opyrightcay olderhay oundfay atyay ethay 
eginningbay ofyay isthay orkway. 
 
1.E.4. Oday otnay unlinkyay oryay etachday oryay emoveray ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
Icenselay ermstay omfray isthay orkway, oryay anyyay ilesfay ontainingcay ayay artpay ofyay isthay 
orkway oryay anyyay otheryay orkway associatedyay ithway Ojectpray Utenberg™gay. 
 
1.E.5. Oday otnay opycay, isplayday, erformpay, istributeday oryay edistributeray isthay 
electronicyay orkway, oryay anyyay artpay ofyay isthay electronicyay orkway, ithoutway 
ominentlypray isplayingday ethay entencesay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphpay 1.E.1 ithway 
activeyay inkslay oryay immediateyay accessyay otay ethay ullfay ermstay ofyay ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay Icenselay. 
 
1.E.6. Youyay aymay onvertcay otay andyay istributeday isthay orkway inyay anyyay inarybay, 
ompressedcay, arkedmay upyay, onproprietarynay oryay oprietarypray ormfay, includingyay 
anyyay ordway ocessingpray oryay ertexthypay ormfay. Oweverhay, ifyay youyay ovidepray accessyay 
otay oryay istributeday opiescay ofyay ayay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orkway inyay ayay ormatfay 
otheryay anthay “Ainplay Anillavay ASCIIYAY” oryay otheryay ormatfay usedyay inyay ethay officialyay 
ersionvay ostedpay onyay ethay officialyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ebsiteway 
(Wwway.gutenberg.org), youyay ustmay, atyay onay additionalyay ostcay, eefay oryay expenseyay 
otay ethay useryay, ovidepray ayay opycay, ayay eansmay ofyay exportingyay ayay opycay, oryay ayay eansmay 
ofyay obtainingyay ayay opycay uponyay equestray, ofyay ethay orkway inyay itsyay originalyay “Ainplay 
Anillavay ASCIIYAY” oryay otheryay ormfay. Anyyay alternateyay ormatfay ustmay includeyay ethay 
ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay Icenselay asyay ecifiedspay inyay aragraphpay 1.E.1. 
 
1.E.7. Oday otnay argechay ayay eefay orfay accessyay otay, iewingvay, isplayingday, 
erformingpay, opyingcay oryay istributingday anyyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orksway 
unlessyay youyay omplycay ithway aragraphpay 1.E.8 oryay 1.E.9. 
 
1.E.8. Youyay aymay argechay ayay easonableray eefay orfay opiescay ofyay oryay ovidingpray 
accessyay otay oryay istributingday Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway 
ovidedpray atthay: 
 
    • Youyay aypay ayay oyaltyray eefay ofyay 20% ofyay ethay ossgray ofitspray youyay eriveday omfray 
        the useyay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orksway alculatedcay usingyay ethay ethodmay 
        you alreadyyay useyay otay alculatecay youryay applicableyay axestay. Ethay eefay isyay owedyay 
        to ethay owneryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ademarktray, utbay ehay ashay 
        agreed otay onateday oyaltiesray underyay isthay aragraphpay otay ethay Ojectpray 
        Gutenberg Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay. Oyaltyray aymentspay ustmay ebay aidpay 
        within 60 aysday ollowingfay eachyay ateday onyay ichwhay youyay eparepray (Oryay areyay 
        legally equiredray otay epare)pray youryay eriodicpay axtay eturnsray. Oyaltyray 
        payments ouldshay ebay earlyclay arkedmay asyay uchsay andyay entsay otay ethay Ojectpray 
        Gutenberg Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay atyay ethay addressyay ecifiedspay inyay 
        Section 4, “Informationyay aboutyay onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay 
        Literary Archiveyay Oundationfay.” 
     
    • Youyay ovidepray ayay ullfay efundray ofyay anyyay oneymay aidpay byay ayay useryay owhay otifiesnay 
        you inyay itingwray (Oryay byay e-mail)yay ithinway 30 aysday ofyay eceiptray atthay es/hay 
        does otnay agreeyay otay ethay ermstay ofyay ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
        License. Youyay ustmay equireray uchsay ayay useryay otay eturnray oryay estroyday allyay 
        copies ofyay ethay orksway ossessedpay inyay ayay icalphysay ediummay andyay iscontinueday 
        all useyay ofyay andyay allyay accessyay otay otheryay opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
        works. 
     
    • Youyay ovidepray, inyay accordanceyay ithway aragraphpay 1.F.3, ayay ullfay efundray ofyay 
        any oneymay aidpay orfay ayay orkway oryay ayay eplacementray opycay, ifyay ayay efectday inyay ethay 
        electronic orkway isyay iscoveredday andyay eportedray otay youyay ithinway 90 aysday ofyay 
        receipt ofyay ethay orkway. 
     
    • Youyay omplycay ithway allyay otheryay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay orfay eefray 
        distribution ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orksway. 
     
 
1.E.9. Ifyay youyay ishway otay argechay ayay eefay oryay istributeday ayay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay electronicyay orkway oryay oupgray ofyay orksway onyay ifferentday ermstay anthay 
areyay etsay orthfay inyay isthay agreementyay, youyay ustmay obtainyay ermissionpay inyay itingwray 
omfray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay, ethay anagermay ofyay 
ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ademarktray. Ontactcay ethay Oundationfay asyay etsay 
orthfay inyay Ectionsay 3 elowbay. 
 
1.F. 
 
1.F.1. Ojectpray Utenberggay olunteersvay andyay employeesyay expendyay onsiderablecay 
effortyay otay identifyyay, oday opyrightcay esearchray onyay, anscribetray andyay oofreadpray 
orksway otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.S. opyrightcay awlay inyay eatingcray ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay ollectioncay. Espiteday esethay effortsyay, Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
electronicyay orksway, andyay ethay ediummay onyay ichwhay eythay aymay ebay oredstay, aymay 
ontaincay “Efectsday,” uchsay asyay, utbay otnay imitedlay otay, incompleteyay, inaccurateyay 
oryay orruptcay ataday, anscriptiontray errorsyay, ayay opyrightcay oryay otheryay 
intellectualyay opertypray infringementyay, ayay efectiveday oryay amagedday iskday oryay 
otheryay ediummay, ayay omputercay irusvay, oryay omputercay odescay atthay amageday oryay 
annotcay ebay eadray byay youryay equipmentyay. 
 
1.F.2. IMITEDLAY ARRANTYWAY, ISCLAIMERDAY OFYAY AMAGESDAY - Exceptyay orfay ethay “Ightray 
ofyay Eplacementray oryay Efundray” escribedday inyay aragraphpay 1.F.3, ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay, ethay owneryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay ademarktray, andyay anyyay otheryay artypay istributingday ayay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay electronicyay orkway underyay isthay agreementyay, isclaimday allyay 
iabilitylay otay youyay orfay amagesday, ostscay andyay expensesyay, includingyay egallay 
eesfay. YOUYAY AGREEYAY ATTHAY YOUYAY AVEHAY ONAY EMEDIESRAY ORFAY EGLIGENCENAY, ICTSTRAY 
IABILITYLAY, EACHBRAY OFYAY ARRANTYWAY ORYAY EACHBRAY OFYAY ONTRACTCAY EXCEPTYAY OSETHAY 
OVIDEDPRAY INYAY ARAGRAPHPAY 1.F.3. YOUYAY AGREEYAY ATTHAY ETHAY OUNDATIONFAY, ETHAY 
ADEMARKTRAY OWNERYAY, ANDYAY ANYYAY ISTRIBUTORDAY UNDERYAY ISTHAY AGREEMENTYAY ILLWAY OTNAY EBAY 
IABLELAY OTAY YOUYAY ORFAY ACTUALYAY, IRECTDAY, INDIRECTYAY, ONSEQUENTIALCAY, UNITIVEPAY ORYAY 
INCIDENTALYAY AMAGESDAY EVENYAY IFYAY YOUYAY IVEGAY OTICENAY OFYAY ETHAY OSSIBILITYPAY OFYAY UCHSAY 
AMAGEDAY. 
 
1.F.3. IMITEDLAY IGHTRAY OFYAY EPLACEMENTRAY ORYAY EFUNDRAY - Ifyay youyay iscoverday ayay 
efectday inyay isthay electronicyay orkway ithinway 90 aysday ofyay eceivingray ityay, youyay ancay 
eceiveray ayay efundray ofyay ethay oneymay (Ifyay any)yay youyay aidpay orfay ityay byay endingsay ayay 
ittenwray explanationyay otay ethay ersonpay youyay eceivedray ethay orkway omfray. Ifyay youyay 
eceivedray ethay orkway onyay ayay icalphysay ediummay, youyay ustmay eturnray ethay ediummay 
ithway youryay ittenwray explanationyay. Ethay ersonpay oryay entityyay atthay ovidedpray youyay 
ithway ethay efectiveday orkway aymay electyay otay ovidepray ayay eplacementray opycay inyay 
ieulay ofyay ayay efundray. Ifyay youyay eceivedray ethay orkway electronicallyyay, ethay ersonpay 
oryay entityyay ovidingpray ityay otay youyay aymay oosechay otay ivegay youyay ayay econdsay 
opportunityyay otay eceiveray ethay orkway electronicallyyay inyay ieulay ofyay ayay efundray. Ifyay 
ethay econdsay opycay isyay alsoyay efectiveday, youyay aymay emandday ayay efundray inyay itingwray 
ithoutway urtherfay opportunitiesyay otay ixfay ethay oblempray. 
 
1.F.4. Exceptyay orfay ethay imitedlay ightray ofyay eplacementray oryay efundray etsay orthfay 
inyay aragraphpay 1.F.3, isthay orkway isyay ovidedpray otay youyay ‘AS-IS’, ITHWAY ONAY 
OTHERYAY ARRANTIESWAY OFYAY ANYYAY INDKAY, EXPRESSYAY ORYAY IMPLIEDYAY, INCLUDINGYAY UTBAY OTNAY 
IMITEDLAY OTAY ARRANTIESWAY OFYAY ERCHANTABILITYMAY ORYAY ITNESSFAY ORFAY ANYYAY URPOSEPAY. 
 
1.F.5. Omesay atesstay oday otnay allowyay isclaimersday ofyay ertaincay impliedyay 
arrantiesway oryay ethay exclusionyay oryay imitationlay ofyay ertaincay estypay ofyay 
amagesday. Ifyay anyyay isclaimerday oryay imitationlay etsay orthfay inyay isthay agreementyay 
iolatesvay ethay awlay ofyay ethay atestay applicableyay otay isthay agreementyay, ethay 
agreementyay allshay ebay interpretedyay otay akemay ethay aximummay isclaimerday oryay 
imitationlay ermittedpay byay ethay applicableyay atestay awlay. Ethay invalidityyay oryay 
unenforceabilityyay ofyay anyyay ovisionpray ofyay isthay agreementyay allshay otnay oidvay ethay 
emainingray ovisionspray. 
 
1.F.6. INDEMNITYYAY - Youyay agreeyay otay indemnifyyay andyay oldhay ethay Oundationfay, ethay 
ademarktray owneryay, anyyay agentyay oryay employeeyay ofyay ethay Oundationfay, anyoneyay 
ovidingpray opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway inyay 
accordanceyay ithway isthay agreementyay, andyay anyyay olunteersvay associatedyay ithway ethay 
oductionpray, omotionpray andyay istributionday ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
electronicyay orksway, armlesshay omfray allyay iabilitylay, ostscay andyay expensesyay, 
includingyay egallay eesfay, atthay ariseyay irectlyday oryay indirectlyyay omfray anyyay ofyay 
ethay ollowingfay ichwhay youyay oday oryay ausecay otay occuryay: (A)yay istributionday ofyay isthay 
oryay anyyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orkway, (B)ay alterationyay, odificationmay, oryay 
additionsyay oryay eletionsday otay anyyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay orkway, andyay (C)ay anyyay 
Efectday youyay ausecay. 
 
Ectionsay 2. Informationyay aboutyay ethay Issionmay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay 
 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay isyay onymoussynay ithway ethay eefray istributionday ofyay 
electronicyay orksway inyay ormatsfay eadableray byay ethay idestway arietyvay ofyay 
omputerscay includingyay obsoleteyay, oldyay, iddle-agedmay andyay ewnay omputerscay. Ityay 
existsyay ecausebay ofyay ethay effortsyay ofyay undredshay ofyay olunteersvay andyay onationsday 
omfray eoplepay inyay allyay alksway ofyay ifelay. 
 
Olunteersvay andyay inancialfay upportsay otay ovidepray olunteersvay ithway ethay 
assistanceyay eythay eednay areyay iticalcray otay eachingray Ojectpray Utenberg™’sgay 
oalsgay andyay ensuringyay atthay ethay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ollectioncay illway 
emainray eelyfray availableyay orfay enerationsgay otay omecay. Inyay 2001, ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay asway eatedcray otay ovidepray ayay ecuresay 
andyay ermanentpay uturefay orfay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay andyay uturefay 
enerationsgay. Otay earnlay oremay aboutyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay 
Archiveyay Oundationfay andyay owhay youryay effortsyay andyay onationsday ancay elphay, eesay 
Ectionssay 3 andyay 4 andyay ethay Oundationfay informationyay agepay atyay wwway.gutenberg.org. 
 
Ectionsay 3. Informationyay aboutyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay 
 
Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay isyay ayay on-profitnay 
501(c)(3) educationalyay orporationcay organizedyay underyay ethay awslay ofyay ethay 
atestay ofyay Ississippimay andyay antedgray axtay exemptyay atusstay byay ethay Internalyay 
Evenueray Ervicesay. Ethay Oundation’sfay EINYAY oryay ederalfay axtay identificationyay 
umbernay isyay 64-6221541. Ontributionscay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay 
Archiveyay Oundationfay areyay axtay eductibleday otay ethay ullfay extentyay ermittedpay byay 
Uyay.S. ederalfay awslay andyay youryay ate’sstay awslay. 
 
Ethay Oundation’sfay usinessbay officeyay isyay ocatedlay atyay 809 Orthnay 1500 Estway, 
Altsay Akelay Itycay, UTYAY 84116, (801) 596-1887. Emailyay ontactcay inkslay andyay upyay 
otay ateday ontactcay informationyay ancay ebay oundfay atyay ethay Oundation’sfay ebsiteway 
andyay officialyay agepay atyay wwway.gutenberg.org/contact 
 
Ectionsay 4. Informationyay aboutyay Onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay 
Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay 
 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ependsday uponyay andyay annotcay urvivesay ithoutway idespreadway 
ublicpay upportsay andyay onationsday otay arrycay outyay itsyay issionmay ofyay 
increasingyay ethay umbernay ofyay ublicpay omainday andyay icensedlay orksway atthay ancay ebay 
eelyfray istributedday inyay achine-readablemay ormfay accessibleyay byay ethay idestway 
arrayyay ofyay equipmentyay includingyay outdatedyay equipmentyay. Anymay allsmay onationsday 
($1 otay $5,000) areyay articularlypay importantyay otay aintainingmay axtay exemptyay 
atusstay ithway ethay IRSYAY. 
 
Ethay Oundationfay isyay ommittedcay otay omplyingcay ithway ethay awslay egulatingray 
aritieschay andyay aritablechay onationsday inyay allyay 50 atesstay ofyay ethay Unitedyay 
Atesstay. Ompliancecay equirementsray areyay otnay uniformyay andyay ityay akestay ayay 
onsiderablecay effortyay, uchmay aperworkpay andyay anymay eesfay otay eetmay andyay eepkay upyay 
ithway esethay equirementsray. Eway oday otnay olicitsay onationsday inyay ocationslay 
erewhay eway avehay otnay eceivedray ittenwray onfirmationcay ofyay ompliancecay. Otay ENDSAY 
ONATIONSDAY oryay etermineday ethay atusstay ofyay ompliancecay orfay anyyay articularpay atestay 
isitvay wwway.gutenberg.org/donate. 
 
Ilewhay eway annotcay andyay oday otnay olicitsay ontributionscay omfray atesstay erewhay eway 
avehay otnay etmay ethay olicitationsay equirementsray, eway owknay ofyay onay ohibitionpray 
againstyay acceptingyay unsolicitedyay onationsday omfray onorsday inyay uchsay atesstay owhay 
approachyay usyay ithway offersyay otay onateday. 
 
Internationalyay onationsday areyay atefullygray acceptedyay, utbay eway annotcay akemay 
anyyay atementsstay oncerningcay axtay eatmenttray ofyay onationsday eceivedray omfray 
outsideyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay. Uyay.S. awslay aloneyay ampsway ouryay allsmay affstay. 
 
Easeplay eckchay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay ebway agespay orfay urrentcay onationday 
ethodsmay andyay addressesyay. Onationsday areyay acceptedyay inyay ayay umbernay ofyay otheryay 
aysway includingyay eckschay, onlineyay aymentspay andyay editcray ardcay onationsday. Otay 
onateday, easeplay isitvay: wwway.gutenberg.org/donate. 
 
Ectionsay 5. Eneralgay Informationyay Aboutyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay electronicyay orksway 
 
Ofessorpray Ichaelmay Say. Arthay asway ethay originatoryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray 
Utenberg™gay onceptcay ofyay ayay ibrarylay ofyay electronicyay orksway atthay ouldcay ebay 
eelyfray aredshay ithway anyoneyay. Orfay ortyfay yearsyay, ehay oducedpray andyay 
istributedday Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ebooksyay ithway onlyyay ayay ooselay etworknay ofyay 
olunteervay upportsay. 
 
Ojectpray Utenberg™gay ebooksyay areyay oftenyay eatedcray omfray everalsay intedpray 
editionsyay, allyay ofyay ichwhay areyay onfirmedcay asyay otnay otectedpray byay opyrightcay inyay 
ethay Uyay.S. unlessyay ayay opyrightcay oticenay isyay includedyay. Usthay, eway oday otnay 
ecessarilynay eepkay ebooksyay inyay ompliancecay ithway anyyay articularpay aperpay 
editionyay. 
 
Ostmay eoplepay artstay atyay ouryay ebsiteway ichwhay ashay ethay ainmay PGAY earchsay 
acilityfay: wwway.gutenberg.org. 
 
Isthay ebsiteway includesyay informationyay aboutyay Ojectpray Utenberg™gay, 
includingyay owhay otay akemay onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay 
Archiveyay Oundationfay, owhay otay elphay oducepray ouryay ewnay ebooksyay, andyay owhay otay 
ubscribesay otay ouryay emailyay ewsletternay otay earhay aboutyay ewnay ebooksyay.
